name: Apiwood
description: Though it's very grainy, Apiwood is quite popular with sculptors. They can turn a single branch of this useless stuff into table and chairs overnight. Fantastic!

name: Birch Wood
description: The bakers adore it: it gives that authentic natural flavor to their Api Pies.

name: Ash Wood
description: Ash Wood has proven anti-aging properties. You just have to be able to put up with the diuretic effects.

name: Hazel Wood
description: Hazel Wood smells just like Hazelnut, oddly enough. It also has the same texture. The only difference is that you won't lose any teeth biting into a Hazelnut.

name: Api
description: "Eat up your Apiz." Ah yes, everyone remembers that Bontarian chef's catchphrase. Some say he was the greatest troop motivator ever to scream a repetitive non-sequitur. Another favorite of his was "An Api a day keeps the undertaker away."

name: Hazelnut
description: Amaknians love these little hazelnuts so much that being known as the village nutcase has become a matter of intense pride.

name: Barley Grain
description: It's amazing what you can make with a bit of barley grain: bread, syrup, a mess... The possibilities are almost endless!

name: Wheat Grain
description: Wheat can be found pretty much everywhere and it's become a staple in cooking recipes. So much so, that you'll run out of things to do with it and might start throwing it out of the window at unsuspecting passers-by for fun.

name: Puffball
description: This exquisite little mushroom tastes best when cut into fine strips.

name: Gorsegoyle Berry
description: Don't be fooled by the inviting, juicy, delicious, alluring color of these Gorsegoyle Berries... They're disgusting!

name: Iron Ore
description: Smashing rocks all day is great exercise and it builds an iron constitution.

name: Rugged Quartz
description: Quartz is widely used for making weapons and mechanical clocks.

name: Copper Ore
description: Copper Ore gets its color from its excellent thermal conductivity. Perfect for taking your temperature when you're in the company of an attractive adventurer.

name: Royal Bauxite
description: Royal Bauxite is a prized component for any weapons master interested in creating heavy weapons.

name: Ruby Stone
description: Rubies are a forger's dream: This is where the expression "taking rubies for spinel" comes from.

name: Artichoke
description: The artichoke is known for its energizing properties. It's highly sought-after by Sadidas who've just woken up from a deep sleep... and those in need of one.

name: Babbage
description: Babbage: the one true love of Snailmets and Larvae.

name: Gobball Amulet
description: Watch out ladies, it seems this thing chews everything it comes across! Lacy shawls, woolly sweaters, and even leather clavicle-warmers have all been known to get a nibbling. Or is it all just tall talk?

name: Bouze Lite Yeah's Ring
description: This ring once belonged to the renowned Bouze Lite Yeah, the savior of the ancient World. His favorite sentence was about some Inn or another called the "Finity and Beyond."

name: Gobboots
description: With these boots, you no longer have to worry about stepping in Gobball dung. The smell will be exactly the same, either way.

name: Gobball Belt
description: This puffy and soft belt is a real temptation... Less secure adventurers benefit from the extra padding to make others believe they're better equipped than they are.

name: Gobbhammer
description: This hammer doesn't just like to smash things, it likes to bite them, too. And, if you believe that, you must need your head looking at...

name: Tofu Amulet
description: If you manage to get this amulet around your waist you will unleash its true powers.

name: Tofu Ring
description: The height of class for the Tofoones. But are you a Tofoone though?

name: Tofu Sword
description: It is rumored that this sword was forged by a tofu! He must have been very talented indeed! Almost as talented as you are gullible, in fact...

name: Tofu Cloak
description: Light, useful, and a soft yellow... Tofu feathers exist for the sole purpose of making this cloak!

name: Tofu Belt
description: This belt is scarily light. It seems anything hidden behind it becomes weightless...

name: Helmetofu
description: This Tofu skull becomes you perfectly. Too bad you didn’t remove the eyes, it looks a little too cheeky...

name: Tofu Boots
description: Mad races across spring fields, stampeding like a thousand rutting Tofus! It's good not to be afraid of looking silly.

name: Gobbshield
description: This shield is so light you sometimes forget it's there to protect you! Though maybe that's because it's not doing such a great job of it...

name: Gobblette Wand
description: This is an improved version of the Shepherd's Staff. This wand now has even more ways of driving your flock to chop up your enemies.

name: Tofu Epaulettes
description: If you see Tofus running after you when you're wearing these epaulettes, fear not! They just think you're one of them!

name: Tofu Shield
description: Ah, this shield has clearly already taken one victim...

name: Little Tofu Hand
description: This small, pointy clock hand was carved in Tofu bone. Please don't confuse it with actual Tofu on the Bone, which is a culinary specialty.

name: Basic Plank
description: This plank is just fantastic, a pure wooden specimen. And very flat too.

name: Gobball Wool
description: White isn't the first word that springs to mind when you see this wool, but don't forget that Gobballs are very sensitive creatures...

name: Coarse Leather
description: This skin still smells bad, but that doesn't stop it being a much sought-after resource in the crafting of shields.

name: Tofu Feather
description: A cute yellow feather. Tickle your friends for pleasure or your enemies for torture.

name: Coarse Plank
description: A tree reduced to two dimensions... A plank.

name: Coarse Flour
description: You'll knead this flower to make bread and cakes.

name: Scythe
description: This scythe's handle is about as sturdy as a piece of paper. You should just about manage to harvest some Wheat with it.

name: Pick
description: Enutrof expressions have a unique simplicity... for example 'Make sure you bring a pick with you when you go digging.' Simple but true. Oh so true.

name: Purple Piwat
description: Piwis were not only hurt, they were killed to make this human-scale representation of a Piwi's noggin.

name: Green Piwat
description: Piwis were not only hurt, they were killed to make this human-scale representation of a Piwi's noggin.

name: Purple Capiwin
description: This cloak is light, very light. In fact, it weighs about the same as a Piwi brain!

name: Green Capiwin
description: This cloak is light, very light. In fact, it weighs about the same as a Piwi brain!

name: Red Piwi Belt
description: This belt was made with love. The tuft of plumes is just to add a touch of glamour.

name: Purple Piwi Belt
description: This belt was made with love. The tuft of plumes is just to add a touch of glamour.

name: Green Piwi Belt
description: This belt was made with love. The tuft of plumes is just to add a touch of glamour.

name: Red Piwi Claw Slippers
description: These Piwi claws have somehow been mysteriously expanded to fit your feet. Now, you can sit on branches, if they'll hold your weight.

name: Purple Piwi Claw Slippers
description: These Piwi claws have somehow been mysteriously expanded to fit your feet. Now, you can sit on branches, if they'll hold your weight.

name: Green Piwi Claw Slippers
description: These Piwi claws have somehow been mysteriously expanded to fit your feet. Now, you can sit on branches, if they'll hold your weight.

name: Bucket o' Water
description: Harvested straight from nature, this pure, soft water will please even the most delicate of palates. Just make sure a Gobball hasn't peed in it, or worse...

name: Finest Sea Salt
description: This magic powder has many uses... You can catch Piwis with it by placing a single grain on one of their tails or cast strange voodoo spells by tossing it over your left shoulder. Some people even use it to flavor their food. Imagine that!

name: Mimilk
description: Hardy and strong of taste, Mimilk is rich in calcium and protein.

name: Popourri Hat
description: Its woodland scent follows you everywhere. It's very practical for covering up that wild odor certain Sadidas give off!

name: Wooden Hatchet
description: About as sharp as a sack of wet mice, but just as heavy.

name: Crowned Thistle
description: The thistle stings a bit, but this aggressive side doesn't make it any less charming. They're also good for the digestive system. Is there anything they can't do?

name: Exeter Rats
description: We could go on and on about these epaulettes…

name: Twiggy Club
description: It looks like an old piece of wood picked up off the forest floor, but it’s strong enough for you to defend yourself with.

name: Mad Hammer
description: Who would have thought that a Tofu trapped in his own guano could make such a strong hammer? Who would have thought it could make a hammer at all?

name: Larva Mucus
description: Slimy, dripping, tinged with greenish hues that make you think you would have done better to leave it on the ground...

name: Piwi Egg
description: Piwi Eggs are very small. So small that you’d better get used to the taste of the shell if you ever want to get a meal!

name: Piwi Beak
description: Whether you use it as a coatrack or door wedge, or keep it as an ornament on your mantelpiece, this Piwi Beak will always be in very bad taste.

name: Gobball Leg
description: Cooked with fresh Gobbette cream, this thigh will be a real treat!

name: Tofu Gizzards
description: Remove the legs of a Tofu and you get ready made meatballs! Voila! A delicious Tofu Burger for your children.

name: Smoothitch O'Bal
description: This amulet is, in fact, a piece of candy. Before you go putting it in your mouth, though, you might like to know that it was made by being rolled under the armpits of 36 generations of female Bworks in heat.

name: The Gougnole
description: The Gougnole is made from the moon stone, which had been soaking in a barrel of root beer for 5000 years. As a result, it's awfully powerful.

name: Twiggy Amulet
description: This amulet, made exclusively of wood, is prized by lumberjacks who think it can do things it couldn’t possibly do.

name: Shrink Ring
description: This ring makes the finger wearing it much smaller and daintier.

name: Rat Moustache
description: When correctly sharpened, a Rat Moustache can be a formidable weapon, ideal for tickling your enemies' feet.

name: War Chief Axe
description: Wield this axe and you will immediately feel like a true 'leader of troops'. If opinion on this is divided, let it fall upon the heads of the unruly. At least you'll be the only one left with any say.

name: Hidsad Bow
description: The man who created this bow, a certain Marc Hidsad, never really knew how to use it. He usually hurt himself just as much as his enemies.

name: Cape Huccino
description: This cape was made with just one goal in mind: It had to be able to keep its owner awake for a few days running.

name: Grilled Arachnee Legs
description: Light and crisp, these Arachnee legs delight the palate of experimental cuisine lovers. Arachneephobes better stick to frogs' legs.

name: Gobbcards
description: To guarantee a more comfortable grip, the edges of these cards have been covered with Gobball wool. It's sweet, but unbelievably smelly.

name: Loyalty Cards
description: The female Ecaflips use these cards to avenge the infidelity of their partner... by cutting off a body part...  the hands, I’m sure.

name: Lass Sword
description: Once again you failed to control your urge… Another sword you’ll never use! Stop saying that this is the last: No one believes you!

name: Tofu Dumpling
description: If you love filling yet balanced dishes...you should know that the Tofu Dumpling is not for you!

name: Country Root
description: Here's some friendly advice: don't eat it! Not that it looks particularly appetizing anyway…

name: Country Scalp
description: Because you're worth it.

name: Country Slobber
description: Field Plant spit now comes in bottles. Yummy!

name: Crackler's Gold Tooth
description: Make no mistake: Cracklers don't have gold teeth because of poor dental hygiene, but because they love their bling.

name: Nickelbow
description: Now that you have it, it’s the most important thing in your life. Your enemies will not hesitate to obey their master - now you call the shots...

name: Twiggy Cards
description: Beautiful cards engraved in wood, enough to make a Tofu tremble in fear!

name: Shepherd's Staff
description: With its gobball-shaped pommel, this staff really commands respect. When hit someone with it, the only noise to break the awe-struck silence will be an "ow"!

name: Inn Shield
description: This shield, made from a tavern sign, will make sure you don't get any headaches, but that's about it.

name: Authentic Bowisse Boots
description: These boots (or their odor, at least) were inspired by a famous model. Put them on and you'll feel so sure of yourself that you'll actually be faster and more resistant than before.

name: Capeoeira
description: This cloak is so liquid and light it will hang on to your back through all your Chackie Jan moments

name: Daudgee
description: The Daudgee is made from Ouginak remains and various other refuse. Worn by Gourlo the Terrible for a long time, the Daudgee is the image of desolation.

name: Mine Helmet
description: For miners who are hungry for ore.

name: Wheat Straw
description: Once they've harvest their wheat, some farmers find themselves clutching at straws.

name: Barley Straw
description: Barley Straws are used to make baskets...  in which you can carry drinks concocted from barley grains...

name: Consumables Display Window
description: The ideal showcase for all those who consume without moderation!

name: Flax Flower
description: This flower is so light you'll have a hard time believing just how rigid and resistant it is.

name: Reed Stem
description: Master Kano always said: "The Reed may bend, but it never breaks". Pandawas prefer to use a strong bamboo stick, just to be on the safe side.

name: Quest Items Display Window
description: This display can contain quite fascinating objects: magic scrolls, mysterious keys... A real little miracle of ingenuity and the latest technology!

name: Raysting Hand
description: This clock hand can burrow its own way into your enemy's orifices.

name: Thettle Ring
description: Thistle and Nettle fibers woven together, and what an effect! Even the most demanding of Osas will love it!

name: Thistle Broth
description: Thistle Broth is good. Well... edible, that is. Ok, it's disgusting.

name: Swiffer Wand
description: This wand is behind the emancipation of Eniripsa housewives. It's excellent for getting rid of both monsters and dust. Practical, no?

name: Gobball Breastplate
description: It's soft, it's new, and it’s clean... Oh sorry, it's not clean.

name: Gobball Epaulettes
description: The first woolen shoulder pads that can kill...  annihilation by odor, that is.

name: Tofu Breastplate
description: Have you ever been told that yellow suits you? Yes? Amazing...

name: Larva Skin
description: In times gone by, lady Enutrofs used to apply dried larva skin to their faces. Within seconds, their wrinkles disappeared. Along with the rest of it...

name: Citronana
description: Na na na na, Na na na... Citronana! Whoooo!

name: Pooplar Wood
description: Pooplar Wood is light and bendy.

name: Crobak Feather
description: Know that every hunter thrives at the expense of the creature he murders. This lesson is well worth a feather, no doubt.

name: Crobak Egg
description: Crobaks in the fields, feed, feed, Crobaks in the fields, feed their babies...

name: Crobak Beak
description: So you too like all that tom peckery after all.

name: Crow Claws
description: With this acidic claw, you won't have to worry about losing your grip on your enemies!

name: Crow Gizzards
description: These Crow innards are firm and rich in taste. To appreciate the flavor fully, avoid thinking about all the filth the animal has swallowed in its lifetime.

name: Scented Clover
description: The leaves of this clover are soft and scented, of triple thickness...  just in case you need such a thing. Ideal replacement for ivy leaves.

name: Corn
description: Everyone loves corn, with its characteristic crunch and naturally sweet taste!

name: Crackler Heart
description: Now you have proof that Cracklers have a heart of stone!

name: Hazy Lead Ore
description: This ore is not easy to mine. Recover clods of soil with traces of lead ore, rinse copiously, and then melt the whole lot. Phew, you better start cancelling appointments...

name: Boowolf Scalp
description: This fur will be the envy of all the Enutrofettes for miles around. Don’t wear in the presence of Rigide Barjo.

name: Moowolf Fang
description: If someone comes to bother you, don’t hesitate to bare your fangs! Just the trick...

name: Lobstery Cwab Claw
description: Does it snip or pinch? As long as it doesn’t clip, it’s okay by me.

name: Conquered Raziel
description: The flood seems to have been hugely beneficial to this blessed sword, which has drawn a new and vengeful power from the water.

name: King of Borins' Bow
description: This unconventional bow was designed specifically for the self-proclaimed king of a village of peasants, who loved showing off by firing two arrows simultaneously.

name: Truffle Shovel
description: The Truffle Shovel will make the people around you laugh. At you, though, not with you.

name: Starry Shield
description: Would you look at that! This huge star has taken a liking to your shield!

name: Boowolf String
description: Yes, Boowolwes also wear Strings, so what? Everyone is entitled to their share of femininity!

name: Gobbsword
description: A sword made from solidified Gobball grime. In other words, a formidable weapon.

name: Hornbeam Wood
description: There's never been such a good opportunity to polish your wood.

name: Bow Meow Hairs
description: These hairs are much less soft than those of the females. It’s understandable why some are allergic to them!

name: Tofu Pheromones
description: These pheromones became fashionable when Jean-Trool Grospied used them for his famous perfume 'Le Mal.'

name: Larva Brains
description: Contrary to popular belief, this brain is larger than what you’d find in a Iop's skull.

name: Humus
description: This soil is fertile, but it doesn't smell very good at all. Don't get it mixed up with your lunch and dip bread into it, okay?

name: A La Cards
description: These cards allow you to choose exactly which parts of your enemy you'd like to have for dinner.

name: Tofu Staff
description: It would have been wise to make sure the egg was empty before making this weapon...

name: Tofu Wand
description: This wand will go perfectly with all the brightly-colored feathery underwear you own. Oh don’t act all innocent!

name: Tofu Shovel
description: The process that made this Tofu beak flat remains a secret. All we can tell you is that we had a lot of help from Mama Bworks.

name: The Country
description: Aaaah! You've finally decided to let him slip his ring over your finger!

name: Equipment Display Window
description: Instead of getting your gear out for every girl who asks to see it, display it in this case!

name: Kit Display Window
description: How bazaar? Mda da da da da da, mmda da da, how Bazaar...

name: Fwesh Drink
description: A fwesh stawt! It quenches thirst and... that’s about it. But as they say, it’s a good start.

name: Cawwot
description: Many people don’t like their Cawwots cooked. But they’re tastiest this way!

name: Piwi Dagger
description: Is this the type of knife you'll want to keep by your side forever, or just for a day?

name: Piwi Wand
description: Well, what? Look at it. It's a wand. It's not rocket science!

name: Piwi Hammer
description: Those who don’t like violence can use it to hammer nails. Those who love violence will use it to hammer nails into the skulls of their opponents.

name: Piwi Sword
description: Too bad you’re terrible with a sword...

name: Piwi Hand
description: This clock hand will give your opponents the rope to hang themselves with...

name: Pureed Boowolf Steak
description: This is a dish that will delight the most refined palates! Provided, of course, you remove the foil before eating!

name: Tofu Seed
description: An experienced trapper toiled tirelessly to collect the sticky substance contained in this flask! A few drops should suffice.

name: Field Plant Seed
description: An experienced trapper toiled tirelessly to collect the sticky substance contained in this flask! A few drops should suffice.

name: Gobball Seed
description: An experienced trapper toiled tirelessly to collect the sticky substance contained in this flask! A few drops should suffice.

name: Pandawan Kimono
description: We told you it wouldn't be the last…

name: Pandawan Hat
description: This must be the hat Magalouf was talking about in his rhyme 'eenie meenie hatty ho.' This information is completely useless. Much like yourself.

name: Pandawan Belt
description: This is the famous belt that Pandawans tend to take off when they’ve drunk too much. Let's just say they don't wear it too often.

name: Golden Wheat Grain
description: A brilliant and beautiful grain.

name: Api Black Pudding
description: If the pudding is black and tastes as strong as it smells, it has been made from Crobak's Blood. Luckily, the Api is there to hide the taste.

name: Piwi Feather
description: When Piwi feathers are pulled out of a living specimen, they turn purple. This symbolizes the anger of the defeathered Piwi.

name: Farle Bread
description: This Farle bread is selling like...  Uh hot Farle bread!

name: Piwibread
description: Piwi-stuffed bread. Bread-stuffed Piwi? Depends who you’re talking to.

name: Cutlass
description: This cutlass is actually a piece of Crackler that was found on the floor and decorated with rock art to make it appear more manly.

name: Billhook
description: A tool cleverly designed to...  Cut. Yes, but with two blades, for greater accuracy and closeness!

name: Gobbread
description: If you don't eat it straight away, a Gobball will do that for you!

name: Blonde Loaf
description: Despite its generous curves, you’ll end up tiring of this Blonde Loaf. Don’t be taken in by appearances!

name: Painstry
description: This Painstry is so good, it can awaken all your senses! Some people would even kill for a bite.

name: Felch Bread
description: Not to be confused with Gingerhead Men.

name: Foccacia
description: Forget the name and let yourself be overcome by the taste of hazelnut.

name: Round Bread
description: Round Bread is so compact that it’s often used to play bowling if it sits out too long!

name: Pooplar Cutting
description: They always say that a Pooplar is most at home in a moist hole.

name: Fishing Rod
description: Do they bite? Not a bite? Ohh! I got a Chefish!

name: Crushed Dandelion
description: Now here's a plant that pushes up its own daisies.

name: Starry Tentacle
description: Cutting off a star fish's tentacle is a barbaric act. It will grow back though, so don't feel too guilty.

name: Boowolf Paw
description: Boowolf Paws are used by Bonta's young rebels to carry out their deadly hoaxes.

name: Crummon
description: Burnt, yes, but served with love.

name: Small Bun
description: A slight, light brioche! So delicious that it will have appeared on your hips before it's even finished melting in your mouth. Yummmmm!

name: Sturgeon
description: This sturgeon is massive... if you don’t like fish you can always use it as a weapon!

name: Breaded Fish
description: When he was a cook, Captain Igloute loved to prepare Breaded Fish!

name: Bow Meow Fish
description: Who said Bow Meows didn’t like water?

name: Crabby Anchovy
description: It is well known that anchovies have terrible tempers. That's probably why they taste so bitter.

name: Hairy Ray
description: Who has never dreamed of touching something as soft as Hairy Ray?

name: Grawn
description: This Grawn looks wealy tired... It’s pwetty *yawn* obvious.

name: Salamon
description: It is said that Salamon is an endangered species. Try not to think about that as you swallow...

name: Moonfish
description: This fish's name derives from the old fishing tradition of lowering your trousers and mooning fishermen in other boats when you got a good catch.

name: Dragocarp
description: Forget it! This Dragocarp is in no way related to Dragoturkeys. It is much more intelligent, it lives in water and, unfortunately, no, you can't ride it...

name: Loot
description: Loots come in all sizes. Yours is huge.

name: Perch
description: Hot or cold, sliced or whole, with sauce or chips, Perch is the new fad and everyone wants a piece!

name: Marine Creature Flesh
description: Commander Koosto himself has never been able to say which creature kindly grew this flesh...

name: Miscellaneous Display Window
description: This is very practical! You can display your Gobbette Milk, your slippers, another display window, your Bow Meow... Pretty much anything you don't know where else to put, basically.

name: Old Pair of Underpants
description: The first underpants with integrated ventilation. Ideal for those who love weeing in the wind.

name: Weeping Willow Wood
description: Now it has a good reason to cry!

name: Chefish
description: What can it be used for?

name: Roll Sling
description: An ancient custom which consists of fighting in the middle of the ring using this soft, round bap. It's the best thing since sliced bread!

name: Golden Bun
description: Remember dreaming of those freshly baked cakes from the local bakery...

name: Bag of Bretzels
description:
This one time, at band camp, I nearly choked on a Bretzel! 
- Jack Lumber

name: Thwee Kings Cake
description: Made from gold, frankincense and... urgh...

name: Breadala
description: Contrary to what one might expect, Schwoops isn’t used to make this bread.

name: Mellow Bread
description: Don’t be fooled by its name, this treat is really popular at school!

name: Whole Bread
description: Whole bread is for those who wish they were as skinny as young Sadida girls.

name: Brick Bread
description: This bread isn't very easy to digest. Which makes it a fearful weapon.

name: Captain Cockle
description: "Captain Cockle, you're not from our bakery, but from the depths of the night! Captain Cockle!"

name: Humble Pie
description: Davit Peckham once said to his wife: "Honey, your Humble Pie is a real kick in the balls." Little did he know that this dish is often prepared by those who can't tolerate their husband's infidelities.

name: Creamed Shushu
description: It's proven! Contrary to popular belief, Shushus can be really sweet.

name: Fish Soup
description: Hmmm... To tell the truth, now that it's boiled, it's hard to be sure it's a fish...

name: Breaded Piwipette
description: This recipe existed long before Captain Eyebirds was born.

name: Marine Tartar
description: Sensitive noses should keep away! This sushi is good... but it really stinks!

name: Slime Ray with Herbs
description: This Ray may not give off the most appetizing odor, but when it's well-prepared, its flesh opens up and becomes quite succulent. Do you dare to taste it?

name: Grawn Cocktail
description: If you don't want to have fish breath, chew a Mint Jelly after your meal.

name: Salamon à la Cwème
description: Not to be confused with the Bwork antiseptic cream, Salvon.

name: Black Crow's Boots
description: These boots are in impeccable condition. It's not surprising for someone who did most of his traveling by air!

name: Black Crow's Ring
description: The best way to keep track of a bird is to ring it!

name: Black Crow's Cloak
description: A needle, some thread and a few feathers taken from a decomposing Crobak... and now you have one of the most fashionable capes in the World of Twelve!

name: Croboots
description: These Croboots emit a Crow squawk with every step you take. You can make the enemy flee just by warning them of your imminent arrival.

name: Crobak Breastplate
description: A feathery thing that you can take great pleasure in showing off in the most squalid tavern in town.

name: Crobelt
description: This belt is supposed to improve back trouble. Or is that the other way round? You won't know until you try it on!

name: Wooden Fishing Rod
description: A wooden rod is better than a bamboo one because it fishes further... You can do even better, though!

name: Coonan Cutlass
description: Tiger! Upper Cutlass!

name: Broocefore Scythe
description: Nice to scythe you, to scythe you nice! This scythe will allow you to collect A FEW more grains per harvest.

name: Lumberjack Hatchet
description: Your last one was better at crushing than cutting, and this one's better at smashing than crushing...

name: Goldigger's Pick
description: Mine, pick, then, as you carry the fruits of your labor home, sing: "Hi-ho, hi-ho, it's home from work we go!"

name: Esk Billhook
description: It is claimed that Getafiks used this billhook to harvest his own nasal hair. No one knows what he did with it...

name: Xav the Baker's Bread
description: Kneaded and baked with love, these superb baps will get more than one person excited.

name: Bow Meow Statue
description: At least this one won't answer back when you try out your new spells. What's more, he doesn't eat, and you don't have to change his litter box.

name: Beltrool
description: Trool slayers normally wear their belts as a trophy. Well, the biggest ones do.

name: Trool Scalp
description: With this scalp on your head, you're going to have so much fun! You might even manage to seduce a female Trool...

name: Trool Boots
description: Let's hope these boots are as solid as they are smelly...

name: Boowolf Breastplate
description: Since this breastplate arrived on the market, a new fighting technique has been seen on the battlefield. It's known as 'tufting.'

name: Api Juice
description: An Api a day keeps the Doctor away!

name: Cloudy Cotton
description: Silky and soft, this cotton with take you to cloud 9! You can find some in the mimic chests in Nation dungeons.

name: Starry-Eyed
description: Now that's what you call having stars in your eyes!

name: Canoon Powder
description: I have three seconds to tell you that this Canoon Powder is the boooooomb!

name: Poke Cards
description: In the past, these cards were part of a much loved game in the World of Twelve. Nowadays, they're fearful weapons.

name: KenKO
description: Full of beans - that's the slogan for this drink that can awaken the dead.

name: Amakna Root Beer
description: Hold your nose when drinking this: not only is it an Amaknian tradition, it also masks the aftertaste of Bow Meow pee...

name: Royal Gobbsword
description: This sword absolutely stinks, but try not to let it show! It's not a great idea to tell a Royal Gobball he smells...

name: Royal Wool
description: With such a fine fleece, you can understand why all the Gobblettes are so keen to get their hands on the Royal Gobball!

name: Royal Gobball Amulet
description: Smelly, but royal, this amulet will make your regal friends very jealous.

name: Tuberbulb
description: If you really want to make people laugh, you should try saying "Tuberbulb" over and over again with a Citranana in your mouth.

name: Orchid Flower
description: This flower is so hardcore that it doesn't need to be watered every day.

name: Kawfy Wand
description: You know, like the drink, but not spelled the same.

name: Barnacle Getas
description: In certain areas of the world, Barnacle Getas are thrown down to provoke duels.

name: The Resilient
description: This magnificent belt will make you look super sharp. Unless you're a Iop, of course.

name: The Urnin
description: This large bag might not be much to write home about. However, all you have to do is put things in it and you can take them with you anywhere!

name: Heartrait Bag
description: This large bag might not be much to write home about. However, all you have to do is put things in it and you can take them with you anywhere!

name: Twiggy Cloak
description: This cloak is ideal for learning to skateboard.

name: Yamato's Rope
description: Yamato's Rope has made more than one monster's heart beat a little faster. A finely tuned weapon, it can direct arrows to even the most well-hidden targets.

name: Amufafah
description: Wearers usually find this necklace really irritating, thanks to its decorative moustaches which tend to tickle the chest.

name: Bread Wand
description: Just because it was cooked in a bread oven, that doesn't mean this wand's edible. The lingering odor of baking powder will fool the hungriest Iops, though.

name: Kanniball Staff
description: Far from its Caniball, this exotic staff can feel quite homesick. That's why it's advisable to fight facing the sea, underneath a palm tree, to get the best out of it.

name: Ecalisor
description: A long time ago, King Allister gave this ring to Isidor, a smart cat, renowned for his incomparable agility.

name: Kings' Staff
description: Don't be fooled by its simplistic appearance: this staff has already put more than one herd of Gobballs in its place.

name: Intkisser Club
description: This weapon's owners can be easily recognized by their typical North Amakna accent and their battle cry, "Pow! Right in't Kisser!"

name: Dafturkey Club
description: This weapon has the power to make you look a fool. Don't say we didn't warn you!

name: Lidd Ihl
description: The collar of this particularly supple breastplate expands to let its owner put it on more easily.

name: The Astro
description: If you feel you're a superhero at heart, this axe is made for you. All you need now is an assortment of colored armor.

name: Militiaman Eater
description: This axe doesn't really eat militiamen. It does reduce them to mush though, which gives the impression that they've been chewed.

name: Boulgourde of the Glades
description: An axe which used to belong to Brouce Boulgoure, the famous lumberjack. This weapon allowed him to defend himself when he went out to chop down whole forests at night.

name: Ibo-Nanga Mace
description: If you listen closely, you might notice that this mace is permanently whistling a little tune that gets stuck in your head.

name: Outar Hammer
description: Outar Great Bwork ordered these fearsome hammers from a village of Xelors with the promise of sparing the townspeople if the hammers were well made. When he received the hammers, he destroyed the village. He needed to try his new weapons after all.

name: Twiggy Daggers
description: These aren't the best daggers in the World. They're certainly not the stuff of legends.

name: Penn Knives
description: These superb daggers used to belong to Penn the Amaknian scribe. He used them to engrave his stone notebooks.

name: Feti Daggers
description: Don't worry about where these daggers came from, or the fact that their handles seem to be a bit "slippery"!

name: Crate
description: If Euclidian geometry is to be believed, this crate is a prism of which all the faces are squares. Or rectangles. Or... whatever... You get the picture.

name: Smelly Plant
description: This delicate plant masks bad smells. It's perfect for when you take your Gobboots off.

name: Pile of Books
description: Sick of having to create your own disorder? What you need is the Pile of Books, which will mask your excessive tidiness of your abode. A must-have!

name: Arach Brush
description: Made from an Arachnee with a particularly rough and resistant skin, this brush is very useful for getting rid of bad smells and dirty marks.

name: Red Barrel
description: Yes, ok... well you can’t be good at everything!

name: Cra Target
description: Probably made by a very frustrated Cra, the bull's eye at the center is considerably larger than usual.

name: Empty Barrel
description: Looks like the Pandawas are drinking the root beer faster than they can make it!

name: Yumami Phu Quoc
description: Some people spread the unpleasant rumor that this dish is made from Bow Wows...

name: The Goultard
description: The Goultard was soaked in a Dragon Pig's blood. Any hero who can bear the stench given off by the sword will have earnt the right to use it in battle.

name: Shrub
description: A real shrub that looks... Fake.

name: Three Pistes Barrel
description: This is a welcome addition to any Ghostof party. And since they're dead, they don't do much else.

name: Iop Table
description: The sword planted in this bent table is not the remains of some badly turned duel. No, it's kind of like a fourth leg. You know, to stabilize it. That's Iop thinking, that is.

name: Mishmashovel
description: With this shovel, you won't just be able weed your own daisies, you can make sure your enemies push up theirs as well.

name: Munster Shovel
description: A good shovel from the east. Its made from Moogrr milk, which explains its rather delicate perfume.

name: Mechba Shovel
description: This shovel isn't just used by Enutrofs to harvest fruit from their trees, but also as a formidable weapon.

name: Adventurer Hat
description: Aside from making the ladies run away, this hat is mostly only good against rain.

name: Kapow Helmet
description: This helmet is as light as a feather. All you have to do is wait for the wind to get up to turn your dreams of flying into reality... Crash Bang Wallop *stars*... Maybe not.

name: Royal Gobball Helmet
description: Try not to jump in head first or you might end up stuck in a branch or, even worse, with a load of dead Piwis skewered on your helmet.

name: Adventurer Cloak
description: Classy, but not very useful. This cape will still have a knockout effect on young warriors.

name: Royal Tofu Cloak
description: Less fur than the Tofu cloak, but ten times silkier. That's Royalty for you!

name: Kapow Thongs
description: Hitting with your bare hands is overrated. Awkkkkkk ooooff cr-r-a-a-ck clunk-eth.

name: Royal Tofu Epaulettes
description: All we can say about these epaulettes is that they'll make you look more like a crowd entertainer than a brave warrior.

name: Kapow Breastplate
description: A lightly perfumed breastplate which is wonderfully attractive to hungry Gobballs in the area.

name: Adventure Ring
description: This is a lovely little ring for beginners and which will be cherished by kids and Ecaflips alike.

name: Royal Feather
description: Appearances can be deceptive, trust your sense of smell: it's probably better you don't know which end of the Piwi this immaculate feather was pulled from.

name: Royal Piwi Slippers
description: The Royal Piwi has rather fat ankles, so these slippers make comfortable boots for tired feet.

name: Kapow Ring
description:
"One ring, biff kapow. Two rings, biff bang kablooey!"
Nostralanus - Thoughts

name: Kapow Belt
description: This belt does everything. Well, almost. Kapow sock whack!

name: Small Kit Display Window
description: Here's what you need to start a merchant career. Give me the kamas!

name: Justice Epaulettes
description: Thanks to these epaulettes, you can spread justice to the impoverished. Or you can become a power-thirsty lunatic with his own selfish ideas about justice.

name: Justice Breastplate
description: Before you wear this armor, there is one condition: you have to be able to say "Sue shooed Shushus by the seashore" without getting your tongue twisted.

name: Stewabbaise
description: This stew was invented by Sufokia's ingenious fishmongers, who found out they could conceal the stench of rotten fish with the even stronger smell of a sour broth.

name: Banana Billhook
description: This Billhook was not created on a banana boat. Nor was it made yesterday!

name: Upper Cutlass
description: This cutlass is based on the one used by Coonan the Beastbarian.

name: Psilo Scythe
description: Equipping this tool/weapon can lead to disturbing hallucinations, although some find it very pleasant and eye-opening.

name: Bonta Root Beer
description: Hold your nose when drinking this: not only is it a Bontarian tradition, it also masks the aftertaste of Gobball-pee...

name: Brakmar Root Beer
description: Hold your nose when drinking this: not only is it a Brakmarian tradition, it also masks the aftertaste of Tofu pee...

name: Sufokia Root Beer
description: Hold your nose when drinking this: not only is it a Sufokian tradition, it also masks the aftertaste of Larvae...

name: Gataurade
description: Gataurade For real Iops.

name: Bilbiza Iced Coffee
description: Three layers of jelly and a little pinch of coffee - that's the way to start the day!

name: Filet Moognon
description: Legend has it that, if this dish is cooked the French way, it will even moo as you gently devour it.

name: Api Stuffed Rump
description: It is said that a large bite into this rump brings riches and glory. Let's see if people still think twice about doing it now.

name: Blue Raspberry Jelly
description: This little Jelly is particularly nice to chew and is a wonderful breath freshener. Blue Raspberry flavor.

name: Mint Jelly
description: This little Jelly is particularly nice to chew and is a wonderful breath freshener. Mint flavor.

name: Strawberry Jelly
description: This little Jelly is particularly nice to chew and is a wonderful breath freshener. Strawberry flavor.

name: Royal Jelly
description: Royal Jelly is a secretion from King Jellix's cephalic glands. In short, it's a royal loogie.

name: Alibert's Stew
description: That's right, Alibert's legendary stew, yours to savor at last. Yum!

name: Lemon Jelly
description: This little Jelly is particularly nice to chew and is a wonderful breath freshener. Lemon flavor.

name: Veh Cheese
description: Not as old-fashioned as real veggies, you have to eat five portions of veh cheese a day according to the latest recommendations from the governor's nutritionists.

name: Slobber Balm
description:
Whatever you do, don't apply this balm to your face. It's an irritant and encourages blackheads.
Improves trapper skills.

name: Basic Flour
description: This all-purpose flour is limited to a few recipes for the moment. An improvement is expected soon.

name: Apisauce
description: An Api, heartlessly crushed by local Taurs?! Sad, but so delicious.

name: Tortikuri-Kuri
description: This delicious recipe was invented by the Guild of the Iron Stomach, who used their own spicy ingredients to develop their members' digestive capacities.

name: Whirloin Steak with Mushrooms
description: A good whirloin steak, some appetizing mushrooms. What more could you ask for? Maybe a slightly less chewy texture...

name: Pottid Heid
description: Ah dinnae ken, but ah reckon 'at might be a plate o' pottid heid...

name: Bean-yo
description: This bean is looking for trouble.

name: Sham Pearl
description: A Sham Pearl is not just a simple pearl. It's a pearl who understands the meaning of life, the ultimate goal of existence! In other words, being a pearl.

name: Polished Moonstone
description: The stone of lovers, as they say! But you could also use it to throw at anyone who gets a little too close to your sweetheart.

name: Polished Ruby
description: The problem with rubies is that, as well being rare, they are particularly conspicuous and can attract bandits like a magnet. You'll see!

name: Polished Crystal
description: This type of crystal allows an Enutrofette to tell your fortune... And rip you off.

name: Lapis Lalovely
description: Ah, finally something lalovely to lalook at!

name: Polished Agate
description: The Iops used to think that a tiny version of the constellations could be found in the center of this precious stone. It was actually just a reflection of the sky.

name: Polished Emerald
description: This stone is so well polished, it excuses itself for its very existence.

name: Polished Sapphire
description: This sapphire is doubly useful. It's both a glittering jewel to seduce rich Enutrofs, or a sharp defensive weapon to keep insistent Iops away.

name: Polished Diamond
description: Here's a nice little find you'll want to keep to yourself... And certainly not show to any Enutrofs.

name: Pearl
description: Enutrofs traditionally give young Enutrofettes pearls in flowers during their nuptials. That way, they get to keep the pearl and the girl.

name: Moonstone
description: If you want a little romance in your life, you could use this stone to convince the object of your affections to go for a Moonstonelit dinner with you.

name: Crystal Stone
description: Contrary to what Enutrof's disciples may think, you cannot tell the future from this stone. It's just very pretty.

name: Lalovely Stone
description: Contrary to what its name implies, this rough stone isn't very lovely.

name: Agate Stone
description: This stone was named by a miner, after his sweetheart, Agatha. Unfortunately he wasn't very good at spelling, but it's the thought that counts.

name: Emerald Stone
description: Don't be too impressed by its color and generous forms. It's just a polished stone, after all!

name: Diamond Stone
description: As beautiful as it is sharp, this stone has cut many a greedy miner's hand.

name: Grilled Gobball
description: If it's any consolation, at least when you burn the meat it covers up the repulsive smell of Gobball.

name: Beans
description: Be careful not to abuse these beans, or they might wind you up in return.

name: Green Goo Breastplate
description: This breastplate gets all its wisdom from the old Googoo hairs used to make it. Everybody knows that you need to be old to be egoodite.

name: Purple Goo Breastplate
description: This breastplate gets all its wisdom from the old Googoo hairs used to make it. Everybody knows that you need to be old to be egoodite.

name: Green Googulet
description: A Googoo amulet isn't the worst thing you could have around your neck... It's not far off, though.

name: Purple Googulet
description: A Googoo amulet isn't the worst thing you could have around your neck... It's not far off, though.

name: Large Armory
description: Add this to the Crafting Room in your Haven Bag or to your Haven World to make level 0 to 160 recipes for the Armorer profession.

name: Large Setter
description: Add this to the Crafting Room in your Haven Bag or to your Haven World to make level 0 to 160 recipes for the Jeweler profession.

name: Large Bread Oven
description: Add this to the Crafting Room in your Haven Bag or to your Haven World to make level 0 to 160 recipes for the Baker profession.

name: Large Stove
description: Add this to the Crafting Room in your Haven Bag or to your Haven World to make level 0 to 160 recipes for the Chef profession.

name: Large Wood Lathe
description: Add this to the Crafting Room in your Haven Bag or to your Haven World to make level 0 to 160 recipes for the Handyman profession.

name: Large Weapons Forge
description: Add this to the Crafting Room in your Haven Bag or to your Haven World to make level 0 to 160 recipes for the Weapons Master profession.

name: Large Leather Dealer's Workshop
description: Add this to the Crafting Room in your Haven Bag or to your Haven World to make level 0 to 160 recipes for the Leather Dealer profession.

name: Large Tailor's Workshop
description: Add this to the Crafting Room in your Haven Bag or to your Haven World to make level 0 to 160 recipes for the Tailor profession.

name: Fountain
description: A decorative fountain to spritz up your interior or exterior design.

name: Gobball Totem
description: A pretty Totem to decorate your Haven World or Haven Bag.

name: Wheelbarrow of Cawwots
description: Will this wheelbarrow be enough to attract the Wabbits to your place?

name: Garden Lamp
description: A bright lamp to decorate your garden. If you really love lamp that much, you can also bring it inside.

name: Botanical Workbench
description: This will breathe new life into your garden.

name: Sales Sign
description: Nothing attracts customers like a good old Sales Sign.

name: Hammer Sculpture
description: Your customers will really be struck by this!

name: Arrow Sign
description: To point your customers in the right direction.

name: Rope Barrier
description: Not bad at all for managing lines.

name: Cash Register
description: It's all about the dum dum dada dum dum.

name: Shield in Briefs
description: No one will be able to say you're not wearing any underwear now!

name: The Absorber
description: This shield really can chew all that it bites off.

name: Crackler Blade
description: This blade may not be sharp, but it certainly smarts!

name: Boowolf Hairs
description: Once upon a time, Boowolf hairs were used to make ritual paintbrushes. The high death rate of Eniripsas trying to obtain them soon put an end to this practice.

name: Boowolf Steak
description: Charlie Endstown-Smisse was rumored to eat nothing but raw Boowolf steak. That's not much of an achievement: this meat is so tough it never cooks, even if you blast it with a flame thrower.

name: Katastro Cards
description: These cards are disasters on legs. Send a few into enemy ranks to wreak havoc!

name: Bifmaro Bow
description: This juicy bow may look absolutely delicious, but gnawing on it will only make it less effective on the battlefield.

name: Wand of Courage
description: All those who continually flee fights, this is the wand for you. It won't actually make you any braver, but it will make you better at running away!

name: Cutting Edgies
description: These sneaky blades always find just the right moment to attack from behind.

name: Hohoglion Blade
description: You can tell a Hohoglian by his wealth, of course, but also by his haughty attitude. Carry this blade and you'll look elegant and well-to-do, even if you don't have a kama to your name.

name: Hoglian Sword
description: This sword was made by the great Karl Groucho, defender of the Hoglians. He engraved his famous maxim in its side: "XP is the opium of the people."

name: Hifipod Shovel
description: This weapon was invented by a smith who was sick of the booming bass coming from his neighbors' house. He used his creation to smash the source of their anti-social behavior to smithereens.

name: Crackdweller Staff
description: A cheeky staff.

name: Skyslicer
description: You can claim that this can slice the sky, but you'll just be blowing hot air.

name: Corpse Club
description: If you can get over the deathly stench, this club is sure to satisfy your more morbid urges.

name: Smash Hammer
description: A hammer created by Ms. Dinah Mitee, who used it to smash her enemies' smiles off their faces.

name: Necrofahrt Shield
description: The Necrofahrt shield - it wanted to be a trumpet when it was growing up!

name: Shield of Denial
description: This shield is frequently wrong, but it will never admit it.

name: Karne Epaulettes
description: These pretty epaulettes would go quite well with chili. If you can find any, that is...

name: Breastplate of Righteousness
description: Don't even bother arguing with this breastplate. It's ALWAYS right!

name: Cooper Cape
description: A cape as green as this will certainly bring you luck!

name: Boabob Cutting
description: This cutting won't teach you about life, but it will allow you to grow a magnificent Boabob.

name: Boabob Wood
description: Can you see this Boabob? It's smooth to the touch, but as strong as a Iop!

name: Boowish Belt
description: The hairs on this very soft belt become strangely clingy when the sun goes down.

name: Boowish Hat
description: Boowolves fall pray to countless little nocturnal parasites. Thanks to this hat, you too can benefit from the extra waking hours they add to your day.

name: Boowish Epaulettes
description: What could be more reassuring than having two enormous Boowolf paws on your shoulders? Though have you noticed how the claws always feel like they're getting longer at night…?

name: The Hulfmoun
description: This shield has been weatherproofed using Boowolf hairs. It's not as efficient as the mythical Foolmoun, but it provides pretty good protection against droplets.

name: Boowish Boots
description: These boots give you the strange sensation of walking on your opponents' remains. At night, especially, they make some very unnerving sounds.

name: Harmony
description: This pendant helps its wearer find peace with the world around them.

name: Bomb
description:
The ideal partner for explosive goldsmiths!
You can use it to crack blocks or destroy those that are already cracked.

name: Megabomb
description:
Let your worries go up in smoke!
Use this to blow up stone blocks.

name: Astrub Root Beer
description: This root beer loosens more than just tongues.

name: Enutrof Cradle
description: All Enutrofs are brought up to live simply, and this baby cradle is no exception.

name: Big Smelly Plant
description: This plant emits an unpleasant but 100% natural fragrance. Yum!

name: Gobball Barrel
description: It is very easy to confuse this Barrel with a Gobball from afar. Pandawas confuse them all the time.

name: Old Anvil
description: It's hard to believe that this anvil was once a rolling stone before - just look at the moss it's gathered! You certainly won't get any satisfaction trying to sharpen your sword with it, that's for sure.

name: Moogrr Carpet
description: This carpet will gently heat up your Haven Bag, infusing it at the same time with a gentle hint of dung.

name: Keg of Powder
description: Warning: do not expose to high temperatures or direct sunlight (unless you want to send your house up in flames, of course!).

name: Straw Man
description: So what if he's not made of snow? This little fella won't melt when the sun comes out! And more importantly, he won't go coming to life and singing jolly songs when you have a headache.

name: Rubble
description: Nothing's lost, not even in an explosion.

name: Al Howin's Treat
description: This candy was stolen from little children as they slept in their cradles... Didn't know about that part of Al Howin spirit, did ya?

name: Piece of Pumpkwin
description: It appears that an evil curse has enveloped the World. Chunks of Pumpkwin have literally fused with innocent Gobballs. Still, good thing they aren't targeting Cracklers, hey?

name: Evil Lollipop
description: This lollipop increases your perseverance. Consume in moderation.

name: Citronana Wood
description: This exotic wood smells so good you almost envy the termites that are crawling all over it!

name: Chocolate Kwismas Kamas
description: Full of chocolate! (and calories)

name: Sprig of Holly
description: The most useful thing to do with this would be to plant it in your hair and pretend you're a Kwismas pudding.

name: Kwismas Log
description: This soft, creamy dessert is Gnarled Barklee's favorite. Get your hatchet out and chop yourself a slice while you've got the chance!

name: Chocolate Father Kwismas
description: Some kids feel better if they eat his face first, so that his suffering is over quickly... Some couldn't care less, because he's just so delicious!

name: Kwismas Wreath
description: This Kwismas Wreath will bring Kwismas home to stay. Hang it so the holly sprig is facing north for good feng-shui.

name: Hotte Rod
description: This rod is highly effective thanks to the hook on the end of it. It's a subtle but useful invention.

name: Toomoowook
description: This ax's blade is so blunt that you couldn't cut wood with it properly if your life depended on it.

name: The Right Pick
description: Always ready at its owner's back for card games that aren't going in the right direction.

name: Chatterbroom
description: If you have time to kill, this broom will offer non-stop conversation from morning to night and from night to morning…!

name: Silver Bow Meow Statue
description: A beautiful silver Bow Meow statue!

name: Bronze Bow Meow Statue
description: A beautiful bronze Bow Meow statue!

name: Silver Prespic Statue
description: A beautiful silver Prespic statue!

name: Bronze Prespic Statue
description: A beautiful bronze Prespic statue!

name: Silver Scarecroolate Statue
description: A beautiful silver Scarecroolate statue!

name: Bronze Scarecroolate Statue
description: A beautiful bronze Scarecroolate statue!

name: Silver Bellaphone Statue
description: A beautiful silver Bellaphone statue!

name: Bronze Bellaphone Statue
description: A beautiful bronze Bellaphone statue!

name: Silver Albatrocious Statue
description: A beautiful silver Albatrocious statue!

name: Bronze Albatrocious Statue
description: A beautiful bronze Albatrocious statue!

name: Bobbin
description: What's it for? It's a door-bobbin! With bells on.

name: Raid Boole
description:
Say goodbye to your De Darm and death penalties with this invigorating tonic for body and mind! 
It'll give you wi-ings…

name: Campfire
description: To warm you on those cold, lonely, frequent, endless winter nights.

name: Baby Redwood Wood
description: This Baby Redwood Wood isn't very babyish and it isn't very red. It's doubly woody, though.

name: Boots of Destiny
description: Exploring crypts is a real kick!

name: Amulet of Respite
description: This amulet is a sight for sore eyes, especially your own.

name: Epaulettes of Respite
description: You'll be able to sleep soundly on your newly padded shoulders!

name: Cloak of Trouble
description: Sooo... this cloak is mean and troublesome. Wanna wear it?

name: Breastplate of Trouble
description: This breastplate has a very unnerving gleam to it.

name: Ring of Trouble
description: Anyone who wears this ring will become crazy and aggressive.

name: Dark Baker Table
description: This table was a great catch and now you can finally brighten up that dark corner in your Haven Bag!

name: Dark Lumberjack Table
description: This table was a great catch and now you can finally brighten up that dark corner in your Haven Bag!

name: Dark Miner Table
description: This table was a great catch and now you can finally brighten up that dark corner in your Haven Bag!

name: Dark Fisherman Table
description: This table was a great catch and now you can finally brighten up that dark corner in your Haven Bag!

name: Boots of Trouble
description: These troublesome boots were waxed with troubling black troublewax!

name: Dendron Flower
description: Spotting a Dendron from far off is very bad luck... at least, that's what the herbalists say.

name: Belt of Destiny
description: Never fear, this belt doesn't remember it's old owner.

name: Carnivore Epaulettes
description: As tender as Gobball steak.

name: Carnivore Breastplate
description: A gutsy breastplate if ever I saw one!

name: Carnivore Amulet
description: With this amulet around your neck you're bound to get more than a few glances from hungry eyes.

name: Brambelt
description: It looks like it was nicked while it was asleep in the woods.

name: Leafy Ring
description: This ring is made of several leaf fibers.

name: Bouttes
description: Your feet will always feel fresh and moist in these!

name: Vegetaring
description: In case of emergency, use the oil given off by this ring to fry your enemies!

name: Clover Root Beer
description:
Generously shared by Pandawas, this root beer will allow you to see things through their eyes. Never say no to a Pandawa! 
(Lasts 15 minutes)

name: Clover Cookie
description:
These divine little biscuits go hand in hand with Clover Root Beer to really bring out those precious flavors and zests. Consume liberally. 
(Lasts 1 combat)

name: Four-Leaf Clover
description: These things are all over the place around Saint Potrick's Day. Obviously, they're not lucky.

name: Zinit Amulet
description:
Many moons ago, people used to say that wisdom was golden.
Now the only wisdom left in this World is embedded deep inside this amulet.

name: Zinit Boots
description: These boots allow plain sailing on the plains of Mount Zinit.

name: Zinit Cloak
description: This cloak will keep you dry on those rainy days.

name: Zinit Hat
description: This hat will probably give you hat hair.

name: Jonik Ash Wood
description: This wood is so special that you have to learn to be patient to harvest it.

name: Chestnut Wood
description: This wood is a magnificent chestnutty brown color.

name: Chestnut
description: The funniest thing to do with chestnuts is to hide a large number of them in a friend's bed when they're not looking.

name: Glistening Thistle
description: The glistening thistle, or Glistle, will do wonders for your digestive system.

name: Iriss Flower
description: This flower is so light you'll have a hard time believing just how rigid and resistant it is.

name: Mint Leaf
description: The Mint Leaf adds a natural freshness to all your culinary creations.

name: Fuzzy Fern Leaf
description: Fern leaves are so pretty that they're used for decorating underwear and wicker baskets.

name: Nostril Algae
description: Can't stand the smell of rotting seaweed and moldy salt? You'll probably want to give Nostril Algae a wide birth!

name: Oat Straw
description: This straw is well known for its pale color.

name: Melon Seed
description: Even if you just drop these seeds carelessly on the ground, they will grow to give you big, juicy Melons.

name: Melon
description: There's nothing like a juicy Melon to quench your thirst.

name: Rye Grain
description: Just because you can now grow pocketfuls of rye in your fields doesn't mean you need to go around baking blackbirds in pies.

name: Rye Fiber
description: If you want hard, solid loaves, then this rye fiber is for you!

name: Mottled Mushroom
description: The Mottled Mushroom has long been considered the quintessential survival food, despite its rather unpleasant taste.

name: Vanilla Rice
description: Rice, rice, baby. Vanilla.

name: Crystalline Iron Ore
description: You certainly wouldn't expect ore to gain a crystalline look by treating it with an iron fist, but this proves otherwise!

name: Classic Carbon
description: Carbon is great for starting fires. That's why Brakmarian children are so thrilled to receive a lump of it in their stockings each year.

name: Shadowy Cobalt
description: The darker it is, the shadier this Shadowy Cobalt looks.

name: Bronze Nugget
description: The tradition is to try to make a Iop believe that a Bronze Nugget is actually a golden nugget… and it works!

name: Shard of Flint
description: Careful you don't rub two shards of flint together too hard; dangerous things have been discovered that way.

name: Wholesome Zinc
description: This dense metal is often used to make jewelry.

name: Grievous Kroomium
description: This hard metal is resistant to corrosion and tarnish, which is why Grievous Kroomium weapons found buried next to fallen soldiers are still in such good nick.

name: Flamboyant Kroomium
description: According to an old story, adventurers used to bury weapons forged with this Kroomium into tombs alongside their loved ones, so they'd be able to defend themselves in the world of the dead.

name: Golden Sturgeon
description: This Sturgeon can only be found in unusual waters.

name: White Perch
description: White Perch is a white fish, obviously, with a floury sort of texture. A big hit with fish fans.

name: Cinder Dragocarp
description: This Dragocarp's scales are so shiny that they sometimes send a triple rainbow skittering all across the sky.

name: Coarse Tiramisoup
description: A lovely, melt-in-your-mouth Tiramisoup.

name: Basic Tiramisoup
description: It doesn't look like much, but batter it up and I'm sure someone will eat it.

name: Menthol
description:
Let's freshen up that breath, shall we?
Improves herbalist skills.

name: Gobball Skin
description: Even the most adept of tanners would have to work very hard to make anything out of this.

name: Dry Branch
description: This brittle branch is very fragile, but it's also one of the lightest branches ever.

name: Fruity Bile
description: This bile came straight from Boarnigen's stomach, but it still tastes relatively fresh and fruity. This item can be obtained thanks to the Famished Mimik in the Blibli Dungeon.

name: Willow Bow
description: This bow comes in a 0.5 version, but the 0.7, which is reinforced with willow wood, is much more comfortable to use.

name: Stetler Spike
description: Sharpened by a pro so your enemies can't possibly miss the point.

name: Slowshoes
description: Has time slowed down or is it just those funny new shoes of yours?

name: Gigabomb
description:
Even the toughest blocks will have a hard time standing up to it! 
Use this bomb to destroy Tuhard blocks.

name: Basic String
description: Rudimentary string for all apprentice tailors.

name: Chaos Loop
description: All this chaos might send you loopy!

name: Scarasack
description: This little pouch is still warm, so you can use it to warm your hands when it's cold outside.

name: Rosy Pouch
description: This girly little bag smells like roses, and will suffocate anyone who breathes in its vapors too deeply.

name: Beach Bag
description: Just the right size for a towel, some sunblock and the latest issue of Gobbowl Monthly.

name: Leafy Bag
description: This little pouch is made entirely of leaves. Careful it doesn't fly away!

name: Drhellster
description: You know how you're always stumbling upon little trinkets and half-eaten chocolate bars? Well now you have somewhere to put them!

name: Hazelnutella Slice
description: Any excuse for Hazelnutella!

name: Hot Cross Gobb
description: People eat these tasty Gobballs during the month of Aperirel.

name: Scratchings
description: All there is to this dish is frying big lumps of fat in a well-oiled pan.

name: Juicy Stew
description: Juicy Stew is a tasty dish full of sugar, spice and all things nice.

name: Sinister Mussels
description: They look creepy, so just close your eyes and enjoy!

name: Powerkraut
description: This dish has a slightly sour taste, but it's incredibly filling and makes you feel strong enough to take on the World!

name: Kokomilk
description: Kokomilk tastes delicious and can be easily slurped up with a straw… but it won't give you your daily portion of calcium.

name: Kokosoda
description: What do you mean you've never tried fizzy milk?! Now's your chance!

name: Crab Pie
description: Take this Crab Pie with a pinch of salt...

name: Moronzola
description: This cheese has a strange, fishy taste, but there's something about it that reminds you of the good old days, so you help yourself anyway.

name: Waterzozio
description: If you like poultry and sauce then this dish will be like bathing in a pool of happiness.

name: Imperial Cwab Pâté
description: You don't have to be a nobleman to spread a bit of this exquisite pâté on a cracker and enjoy it with a glass of ice tea.

name: Happy Eel
description: Come on, you know you only like these because of the free toy…

name: Coarse Bracket
description: This bracket will help all your furniture hold on tight.

name: Giga Piwipouch
description: Remember, a Piwi in the hand is worth two in the bush.

name: Tadbole Wood
description: This damp wood can be really magnificent when it’s carved by an expert.

name: The Musselini
description: Handmade by Sufokian stallion, Il Musselini, this necklace is said to bring luck in the local mafia's white-knuckled card tournaments. That could just be because of its distracting stench, though.

name: Ye Jolly Good Olde Shield
description: In betwixt his afternoon teas, croquet and general larking about, local funnyman Mussel Grand had ample time to create yon shield. Say what you please about it, twill bounce right off.

name: Osamodas Powder
description: This powder will restore a pet's HP by 1.

name: Mimik Slobber
description: It's raining, it's pouring, the old Mimik is slobbering. This solidified slobber can be used to stick items together to make tools.

name: Fangulet
description: Careful with this amulet. It might just bite you in the middle of the night.

name: Lunar Boots
description: All the kids LOVE these boots - they're the kind that light up with every step you take. We know, we know, you used to have a pair…

name: Lunar Cloak
description: Unfortunately it won't fly you to the moon, nor let you play among the stars.

name: Lunaring
description:
They say he's got the whole World in his hands, but it looks like you've got the moon! 
Well, a bit of it, at least.

name: Lunar Tear
description: It is often said that the moon sheds a tear each time a Boowolf is killed... Have your tissues at the ready.

name: Demented Club
description: One blow of this club is enough to decapitate a Trool. The question is, are you strong enough to pick it up?

name: Hurdy Girdle
description: The little bells that adorn this belt jingle so violently that they make it impossible to sneak up on anyone. Look, it was either style or surprise. You can't have both!

name: Grassy Moss
description: This moss grows naturally on Cracklers. It is soft and ultra-absorbent in case of inclement weather or embarrassing accidents.

name: Crackly Diamond
description: Cracklers tend to throw this highly sought-after diamond around as if it were a pebble. Just enough to make you snap!

name: Crackly Helmet
description: This helmet might look pretty beat-up but there's some life in it yet.

name: Crackly Boots
description: Go on, have a crack at walking in these!

name: Crackly Ring
description: This ring is absolutely cracking, dahling.

name: Crackly Epaulettes
description: Make sure you don't crack under the strain of these epaulettes.

name: Roc Hammer
description: This hammer hits hard, if you can pick it up.

name: Steam Shovel
description: Great for digging up large stones and little Crackrocks.

name: Pumice Stone
description: This stone is great for removing dead, dry skin from the soles of your feet. You can even use it in battle, if you like!

name: Split Breastplate
description: Don't worry, it'll last for years yet.

name: Crobak Ring
description: You'll be able to make the feathers fly with this ring!

name: Featherypaulettes
description: These epaulettes are so feathery they'll almost make you gaga!

name: Crobak Amulet
description: Wearing this amulet is a bit like having a great big bird around your neck, which is why it won't really protect you from baddies.

name: Crobak Bag
description: This feathery bag isn't the most resistant but it's surprisingly spacious inside.

name: Welsh Rarebeak
description: Crobak meat smothered in melted cheese. Is there anything finer?

name: Crobak Cheese
description: Lord Crow is often perched in his tree holding this delicious cheese gently in his beak. It smells so good you can think of nothing else but eating it.

name: Blue Star
description: Adventurers believe this to be the reincarnation of a dead Gobgob.

name: Starry Boots
description: You're sure to be happy with these boots. They're covered in blue stars and foot the bill perfectly for walking on air!

name: Starry Cloak
description: If you want to reach for the stars, just chuck on this cloak. It might even help you climb every mountain.

name: Starry Hat
description: It's like having your head in the clouds… except that... it's in the...  stars…

name: Starry Ring
description: This ring will make you twinkle with joy!

name: Starry Breastplate
description: You can thank your lucky star you've found this breastplate!

name: Crobak Monocle
description: They say this monocle allows you to see everything with a bird's-eye view. Here's hoping the bird in question wasn't nearsighted!

name: Bluestar Shield
description: Use this shield to defend yourself and you'll leave your adversaries seeing stars!

name: Black Crow's Feather
description: The Black Crow's Feather will make sure you always have a bit of fluff!

name: Black Crow's Epaulettes
description: Become the master of darkness and fear your own strength!

name: Black Crow's Helmet
description: Don't forget to unfasten the leather straps that hold this helmet to your head…. It might be a bit difficult to take off otherwise!

name: Black Crow's Sword
description: A beautifully-decorated black sword that only the hardest of the World's warriors can control.

name: Chewing Bark
description:
Chew it... For ages...
Improves lumberjack skills.

name: Gum Gum
description:
I hope you've got strong jaws.
Improves miner skills.

name: Tube-Shaped Fiber
description:
Builds strong bones.
Improves farmer skills.

name: Fish Tartare
description:
Don't worry: This fish is lovely and fresh.
Improves fisherman skills.

name: Essence of Monk
description: An experienced trapper toiled tirelessly to collect the sticky substance contained in this flask! A few drops should suffice.

name: Abrasive Cape
description: When you're not wearing this cape, you can use it as a very effective scouring pad.

name: Excarnus Horn
description: This horn is pretty impressive, especially when it's stuck deep into your left buttock.

name: Gobbsage Helmet
description: This impressively-built helmet will cause adventurers to come flocking around you like Gobblies. Oh, wait...

name: Gobbsage Breastplate
description: Don't be fooled by the softness of the wool, this breastplate will cut rocks like butter. It doesn't guarantee the safety of its wearer, however.

name: Gobbsage String
description: This amulet is a fine souvenir of your battle with Gobbsage.

name: Gobbsage Cape
description: This incredibly thick coat will keep you… incredibly warm!

name: Gobbsage Epaulettes
description: If you see someone charging towards you wearing these epaulettes, then for Eca's sake run as fast as you can in the other direction!

name: Old-School Shovel
description: This shovel is useful for unearthing all kinds of bits and pieces.

name: The Maimer
description: And yes, it really hurts!

name: Ice Zing
description: A little tinkle and you'll be able to freeze any food.

name: Jinn Sun Button
description: Buttons can be sewn onto various garments.

name: Sacred Hood
description: The monks might not tell you this but it's very useful for taking a snooze during sermons.

name: Sacred Slippers
description: These slippers soothe tired feet and pre-emptively treat verrucas. Looks like they've got their work cut out with you.

name: Sacred Ring
description: It's possible that this ring has still got some saliva on it. Apparently, it's customary in the monastery for people to kiss one another's rings as a way of saying hello.

name: Sacred Tunic
description: This tunic, which is often worn during religious ceremonies, suits men as well as women.

name: Sacred Scepter
description: Give someone your blessing by bashing them on the head.

name: Clergy Ring
description: Well, I'll be a monk's uncle! This ring is second to nun.

name: Old Slippers
description:
These slippers are so old and worn that you can see your enormous big toe sticking out of the end.
Mind you, that's not difficult, is it?

name: The Parish
description: Instantly absolves the sins of your enemies.

name: Clergyman Belt
description: It's hard to tell how many clergyman actually wear this belt, but it's supposed to help hold up your trousers.

name: Monk Hammer
description: This hammer can be used to ring church bells, or the heads of your enemies.

name: Monk Bread
description: Now you know where they put the hair from their tonsures.

name: Camonkbert
description: You'll be wanting to eat this cheese until the cows come home.

name: Birk 'n' Stocks
description: Now, where are my Jon Lemon glasses?

name: Ectoplasm Prism
description: This prism has a ghostly beauty.

name: Nun Cloak
description: The temperature drops with this icy veil over your shoulders.

name: Wimple
description: Holy moly! Sister, you are looking goooood!

name: Iron Cross
description: Cross your heart (but don't hope to die!).

name: Feather Duster
description: It gets deep into the dirtiest corners.

name: Forgiveness Bow
description: It will forgive your fallen opponents immediately.

name: Religieuse
description: These cream-filled puff pastries smell delicious.

name: Brush
description: You'll sort your enemies out in one clear sweep with this brush.

name: French Maid Helmet
description: This should come in handy in all sorts of situations!

name: Hairy Rat Headband
description: You look like you just crawled out of a sewer, you know.

name: Hairy Rat Ring
description: Watch where you put that finger! Oops, too late…

name: Hairy Rat Tail
description: Now you know why those Ecaflips were licking their lips when you walked past them a moment ago.

name: Hairy Rat Belt
description: Smell a rat…? Oh…

name: Rough Splinter Wand
description: Apparently this wand's last owner dropped it because he didn't have any fingers left.

name: Rat Collara
description: This dirty necklace might just give you some nasty diseases. Don't get pooped out!

name: Old Rat Hair
description: This hair is very rough and sharp against the skin.

name: Rat Clette
description:
This lump of strong-smelling cheese has been nibbled
and is covered in hair.

name: Rat String
description: This string is made entirely from woven rat hair.

name: Rat Tatouille
description: A subtle blend of summer vegetables and old rats!

name: Stunted Rat
description: The stench coming off it acts as an effective deterrent for would-be thieves.

name: Chaos Strap
description: This strap is so resistant that you'll find it difficult to take off, even with your most powerful sword.

name: Moowolf Bell
description: Now you can attack your enemies with bells on!

name: Moowolf Signet Ring
description: It'll sink its fangs into your finger!

name: Moowolf Finery
description: A well-earned hunting trophy!

name: Moowolf Headgear
description: Stand tall and proud in this headgear!

name: Macabre Hair
description: This hair will literally tickle you to death!

name: Cadaverous Skin
description: This skin is very seriously lacking in sunlight and vitamins.

name: Gone-Off Blood
description: Just one drop of this blood could make you ill for all eternity.

name: Borbat Wing
description: Borbats don't care about bad weather. These wings are as waterproof as waterproof can be!

name: Headfut
description: It might mess you around a bit, but it's made of genuine vampiric Borbat leather!

name: Twofut
description: So you can always set off on the right fut.

name: Waistfut
description: If you thought gaining a few inches around the middle was bad, try a whole fut!

name: Breastfut
description: This ultra-tight breastplate will give you super-hero abs!

name: Bow Meow Tail
description: Why, you look just purrrrfect!

name: Royal Tofu Feather
description: Swish this feather around a bit in your Haven Bag, and bang: The dust is gone!

name: Zora's Helmet
description: If you like wearing this hat, it's because deep down you're just as annoying as Zora.

name: Zora's Amulet
description: This amulet is made for children during the Tofu ceremony.

name: Zora's Boots
description: Tell your tootsies it's their lucky day - these boots are as comfy as comfy could be!

name: Zora's Glove
description: This glove protects your hands from those capricious Tofu pecks.

name: Zora's Tunic
description: The sun will shine out of places you didn't know existed when you don this yellow Tofu tunic!

name: Zora's Cloak
description: This cloak makes a great blanky. Cozy on down for the night... Sweet dreams!

name: Dead Ringer
description: This ring was found in a cemetery and exudes an aura that will make your blood run cold.

name: Ragplate
description: Although this breastplate is in tatters, it's still reasonably useful.

name: Mortadella
description: This exotic-a sausage-a is just magnifico!

name: Mamaliga
