description: This Forfut Village specialty is really, really gross. When you're hungry, though, you'll eat anything!

name: Dark Purple
description: A deep, purple dye to remind you of Vampyro and that song he always sings in the shower: "Clooooooak in the waaaaater..." or something like that...

name: Tombstone
description: Is there really someone buried underneath there?

name: Heaterettes
description: These Heaterettes offer a deep-heat effect that soothes all kinds of muscle pain.

name: Vampyric Epaulettes
description: Instead of going for the neck, these epaulettes suck blood from the shoulders.

name: Vampyric Breastplate
description:
It's normal to feel exhausted after wearing this breastplate...
It sucks the life right out of you.

name: Shadowed Amulet
description:
It might seem a bit shady but this amulet will protect you from sunburn... 
Hey, it's a lot cooler than whapping coats of colored sunblock on your face!

name: Vampyric Bracelet
description: Whoever said Vampyres suck? This stylish bracelet proves that they have a real eye for fashion.

name: Rock Bottoms
description: Just the clumps for when you're down in the dumps.

name: Vamprada
description: Little devils like you wouldn't be seen dead without their Vamprada bag!

name: Vampiric Wand
description: At twilight, you can use this wand to fork your enemies' eyes out. By the time the new moon appears, they'll be doing it of their own accord.

name: Oafish Tadbole Wood
description:
This wood is almost as thick as an Oafish Toad.
You'll need a lot of patience to cut any more.

name: Climbing Tree
description: The wood from this common Sufokia tree is highly prized in the World of Twelve for its unrivaled strength and suppleness.

name: Lianecdote
description: Heard the one about the liana who walks into a bar? He just wanted some vine.

name: Frozen Wood
description: This wood is frozen from root to branch. It requires a certain amount of courage to work with it, since frostbitten fingers are a definite hazard.

name: Cashew Nuts
description: These tasty nuts go well with almost any meal, but are more often served up as nibbles with a sprinkle of Verbala Salt.

name: Grilled Cashew Nuts
description: A popular choice for summery snacks.

name: Yew Wood
description: Do you want to know what's great for making bows and other sturdy, flexible weapons? Yes? I knew Yew Wood...

name: Supernatural Yew Wood
description: If it were a case of life or death... Yew wood, wouldn't you!

name: Marmalot Wood
description: It's very easy to cut off a finger (or two!) if you're not careful handling this wood.

name: Neckfut
description: In Forfut Village, lucky Wodent feet won't get you anywhere! Try one of these 100% organic Borbat-fiber amulets instead.

name: Funkus
description: The name of this mushroom makes it sound pretty cool. But don't be fooled - the nausea it causes and its funky smell prove that it really isn't cool at all.

name: Edelweiss
description:
Edelweiss represents love and purity.
It's traditional to give a sprig to your spouse-to-be on your wedding day.

name: Radiant Edelweiss Flower
description: This flower is also known as the 'winter star.' Glowing with a warm light, it acts as a guide for adventurers crossing snowy plains.

name: Cotton Flower
description: Cotton was introduced to nature by the famous Cotton Committee some time ago. The flowering plant has thrived ever since, and craftsmen can't get enough of the Spun Cotton it produces.

name: Malted Cotton
description: Malted Cotton is rougher than the normal stuff, but that doesn't make it any less valuable for craftsmen.

name: Giant Puffball
description: Make sure you wash and double-wash this mushroom before you use it - there's enough earth stuck in its gills to house a colony of moles.

name: Clobbver
description: The Clobbver is an effective antiseptic. If you eat it, it will knock you out for a little while.

name: Clowver
description: The Clowver is sneaky. It waits patiently for just the wrong moment to takes its effect and make you take leave of your senses.

name: Sun Flax
description: Sun Flax... now there's something we'll never need!

name: Golden Makafe
description: Makoffee to die for!

name: Pure Arabraca
description: Pure Arabraca is a measure of wealth and dreams.

name: Watermelon
description: They say that Watermelons led to the demise of a certain breed of Strich which spent all its time sleeping in the bushes.

name: Abundant Watermelon
description: This Watermelon will greatly increase your appetite.

name: Sweetcorn
description: With this corn revenge will taste even sweeter.

name: Blood Red Amethyst
description: They say that this stone enhances creativity. That's probably why Iops have such a vivid imagination - they wear this amethyst all the time!

name: Koral
description: Once living and full of splendor, it's now lost much of its luster.

name: Koral Reef
description: This remarkably well-preserved stone can probably be used to make powerful objects.

name: Taroudium Ore
description: Taroudium is a very rare crystal and Styffen Chillberg is no slouch at marketing it. It's extremely popular because it's highly durable and possesses many as yet unknown virtues. It's worth its weight in kamas!

name: Luminous Lead Ore
description: If you're having trouble mining this ore just look for the light at the end of the tunnel.

name: Maskerel
description: The Maskerel longs to change its mask like its land-living brothers, but its fins are just too short.

name: Flying Maskerel
description: It believed it could touch the sky.

name: Grawfish
description: Sometimes beginners get Grawns and Grawfish confused. Any connoisseur will tell you that Grawfish are much bigger and have a much more sumptuous taste.

name: Royal Grawfish
description: You can recognize Royal Grawfish by their huge, razor-sharp pincers. It's not unusual for a fisherman to lose his fingers while trying to reel one in.

name: Chehorse
description: Who'd have guessed that this little cutie would grow up to lead revolutions?

name: Trumpet-Playing Chehorse
description: Take a bite and prepare to get down with the trumpets of your palate.

name: Eel
description: When there is an eel under a rock, it doesn’t usually smell good... or so they say.

name: Meteorite Eel
description: An old fishermen's tale says that this eel fell from the sky… So that explains its glowing aura!

name: Piri Pirhiana
description: Put your fingers in the Piri Pirhiana tank: It'll be funny! Especially for us!

name: Ruffled Pirhiana
description: It's said this fish propagates salmonella, ella, ella, ey, ey, ey...

name: Sandwich Bread
description: Squidgy, soft bread - fill with crisps for maximum effect.

name: Umpkin Bread
description: For the umpteenth time, you don't need to be a country umpkin to eat this Pumpkin-flavored bread!

name: Oat Bran Bread
description: This high-fiber bread will keep your digestive system running like clockwork.

name: Palmito Bread
description: The bread of choice for picnics on the beach.

name: Manjus
description: What? Were you expecting these little bread cakes to be stuffed with something other than Bean Juice...?

name: Rye Bread
description: A dense bread to really fill you up.

name: Rice Cake
description: If you're not a bread guy or gal, stock up on these rice delights.

name: Iglair
description: A pastry to bathe your taste buds in a bliss of sugar, ice, and all things nice.

name: Cereal Bread
description: This bread is made out of all the yummy bacteria produced by the Sweat Jute plant.

name: Cornbread
description: This simple bread doesn't need silly jokes to market itself; it's corny enough as it is.

name: Melon Bread
description: Melon-shaped and Melon-flavored, but with all the natural benefits of good ol' bread.

name: Sunshine Bread
description: This Sunflower Oil bread will brighten up the darkest day!

name: Watermelon Bread
description: Who'd have thunk it - a loaf of bread as sweet and refreshing as a Watermelon.

name: Royal Tofu Amulet
description: This royal amulet is perfect for all those flighty, feather-brained adventures.

name: Secret Breadala
description: The secret ingredient is... a secret! Dough!

name: Vampyro's Boots
description: The first step to fame is some trusty boots to kick butt with.

name: Vampyro's Belt
description: It almost looks as though this belt is sticking its tongue out to taunt you.

name: Shadofang Ring
description: Watch out! This ring might suck up more than just your soul!

name: Vampyro's Headgear
description: If you weren't pale and sickly already, then this headgear is just right for you!

name: Legano
description: Hold up... There's something funny about this ring!

name: Rubber Quaquack
description: This Quaquack can be used at bath time, and if you have the time to look a bit closer you might find that it has other purposes too!

name: Nowell
description: So cute!

name: Toilets
description: If you twinkle when you spinkle... Be a sweetie and wipe the seatie.

name: Yugonets
description: Now you can try to get through customs without being stopped! But don't get too cocky…

name: Nowspresso
description: What else?

name: Gobbalrog Helmet
description: An incandescent helmet that is very good at keeping your ears warm during those chilly winters.

name: Gobbalrog Breastplate
description: As if the summer sun wasn't enough, here's a breastplate which aspires to be a radiator.

name: Gobbalrog Boots
description: These Gobbalrog Boots will allow you to give a good boot to any flaming Gobbowl Ball coming your way.

name: Gobbalrog Belt
description: With this belt, you're sure to be full of beans! Not suitable for those with sensitive skin. Beware of backfire.

name: Gray Mage's Wand
description: This wand bears an almighty flame. It used to belong to a powerful mage and got terribly broken during an epic fight with a Gobbalrog.

name: The Mogmatic
description: With this on your arm, you can be sure of one thing... They shall not pass!

name: Magmog Feet
description: It's always easier to walk across lava with someone else's feet on. These have the added benefit of looking grood... I mean good. And great. Great and good.

name: Magmog Clinkers
description: These hot coals will teach all those friends who use you as a shoulder to cry on a lesson.

name: Magmog Cloak
description: The only known way to obtain this cloak is to give Magmog a cold and then whisk it off of his back at the most opportune moment.

name: Magmog Halo
description: As the famous enraged Iop once cried out: Halo? What?! he's never even played it!

name: Gobbalrog Embers
description: These glowing embers can often be found by closely following a Gobbalrog.

name: Excarnus Fleece
description: This breastplate's curly virility is counteracted by the ectoplasmic gloop all over it. Talk about ruining the mood.

name: Excarnus's Crystal
description: This piece of jewelry was used to link Excarnus's soul to Gobbsage's ethereal body. A powerful artifact in the hands of an Excarnate… Do you really think you're capable of using its power?

name: Excarnus Hooves
description: As Gasper the friendly host once pointed out, these boots give you all sorts of airs and graces.

name: Excarnus Veil
description: A transparent veil which enables excarnates to become invisible. Many a man is pushing up daisies after trying too hard to obtain this precious item.

name: Tortured Soul
description: It may be small, but this ring contains a fragment of Gobbsage's essence, absorbed long ago by Excarnus. Pop it in your mouth. It tastes like angry, digested hay.

name: Milkar Finery
description: This cloak has a beastly smell that risks causing undesirable secondary effects that will send you howling to the moon.

name: Milkar Fangs
description: These fangs are just what you need to complete your Moowolf Al Howin's outfit… Just remember to take them off if you're kissing your sweetheart.

name: Milkar Fur
description: With one of these ferocious specimens on your front and one on your back, you'll look like... well, a beast with two backs.

name: Milkar Mitts
description: An accessory made for scratching hard-to-get-to places - just what you needed! A word of advice, though: with claws like that, you shouldn't use it anywhere... sensitive.

name: White Crow Hackle
description: A soft, comfortable, floaty, three-ply, feathery neck-dress. Just what you need to wipe enemies out!

name: White Crow Breastplate
description: A very rare item made of white crow feathers. The only way to get those is to kill a Black Crow... It's said that they turn white when they die.

name: White Crow Belt
description: A very trendy belt, ideal for clubbing. Thanks to its high visibility, this belt can be spotted from a distance, even when it's pitch black.

name: White Crow Wings
description: Fly into the face of danger with these wings. As angelic as they might seem, they're devilishly uncomfortable!

name: Robust
description: This sublimation fits into a relic item to increase the wearer's stats.

name: Recall Potion
description: This potion will take you back to your last save point.

name: Last Murmur
description: This final breath is little more than an imperceptible breeze, and yet it contains boundless magic.

name: Whispery Feather
description: A popular feather for making quills, this specimen is just full of creative ideas of its own.

name: Opal Fabric
description: This heart-stopping blue can be seen for miles off. In some cases, it's enough to make the enemy surrender on the spot.

name: Whispered Metal
description: This metal has been imbued with soft murmurs, which obviously makes it very special.

name: Whispered Lance
description: Whisperers' lances always find their targets. It's said that their owners whisper them detailed directions before they go into battle.

name: Whispered Hand
description: This hand has been trained to jab people in sensitive areas.

name: Whispered Amulet
description: This pendant echoes with the wispy whispers of lingering Whisperers.

name: Whispered Ring
description: The best ring by a whisper.

name: Whispered Breastplate
description: This breastplate has absorbed gallons of whispers over the years. Why not just let it have a rest in your inventory now?

name: Whispered Helmet
description: This headgear will have you turning in circles trying to figure out who's whispering your name.

name: Whispered Cloak
description: Sheathe your body in a spine-tingling whisper.

name: Whispered Belt
description: If nobody else will whisper sweet nothings to you, at least your belt will.

name: Whispering Crackly Heart
description: Well I never. Sometimes, words really do come from the heart.

name: Fossilized Moss
description: As is to be expected when dealing with what are basically giant boulders, this moss grew on its Crackler and stuck tight. It's pretty hard to find decent-sized clumps of it.

name: Stoneguard
description: Protects careless Whisperers from sudden avalanches.

name: Spare Tile
description: All you need to protect against inclement climes and light up the sky with granite gray.

name: Rocky Fist
description: The expression 'under the thumb' takes on a new dimension when the thumb in question belongs to a Whispered Crackler.

name: Bastile Helmet
description: One piece of clothing that should always go down a storm.

name: Whispered Standard
description: A versatile adventurer like you can make heads roll with any old piece of junk, flags included.

name: Rampart Boots
description: Be inapproachable. Rampart Boots.

name: Rampart Amulet
description: It protects the body and mind with a single look.

name: Rampart Epaulettes
description: Charge your enemies with these on and they'll feel like they've just been run over by a truck. On the other hand, they take so much effort to wear that so will you.

name: Rampart Belt
description: Protects against: cannonballs. Does not protect against: groin strains.

name: Hushed Metal
description: This metal has been imbued with royal words, which obviously makes it very sought-after.

name: Hushed Scepter
description: This scepter is said to contain the sighs and murmurs of ancient kings.

name: Whispery Ring
description: One ring to bring them all and with a murmur bind them.

name: Hushed Boots
description: As you walk, these boots count your steps under their breath.

name: Hushed Breastplate
description: Its wearer will be protected by the ancient Whisperers' murmurs.

name: Hushed Crown
description: Perfect for indecisive monarchs, this crown will whisper you in the right direction.

name: Hushed Belt
description: It's just (hush!) a little crush (hush!)...

name: Crackwhip Bow
description: The Cracklers tried their hand at writing by carving a few incomprehensible words on this bow: Although this bow poor...

name: Ringapult
description: It'll drive your enemies ballistic!

name: Whispery Hand
description: Apparently this hand has picked hundreds of locks without ever saying a word.

name: Imperial Gobball Helmet
description: This helmet is supposed to help you get all those pesky Gobballs under your thumb.

name: Imperial Tofu Helmet
description: This helmet will make it very easy for you to hide in amongst a group of Tofus. Useful, right?

name: Alpha Predator Helmet
description: This helmet will grant its wearer the inimitable power of sniffing out thermal emissions.

name: Imperial Gobball Cape
description: The perfect extra blanket for the chilly winter ahead.

name: Imperial Tofu Cloak
description: Judging by the bloodstains all over this cloak, it probably doesn't give you the power to fly.

name: Alpha Predator Cloak
description: I'd tell you that this cloak is said to provide the perfect camouflage, but you appear to have disappeared. Never mind!

name: Imperial Gobball Epaulettes
description: These epaulettes will have you feeling like you're dancing on the clouds.

name: Imperial Tofu Epaulettes
description: These epaulettes are useful if not very manly.

name: Alpha Predator Epaulettes
description: There's what looks like an empty fitting on these epaulettes, suggesting that they used to include some kind of mechanism.

name: Imperial Gobball Ring
description: Strangely enough, this ring is covered in slobber.

name: Alpha Predator Ring
description: Don't worry, its bark is worse than its bite.

name: Imperial Tofu Amulet
description: There's a picture of a Tofoone inside - awww.

name: Alpha Predator Amulet
description: Never put this amulet in direct contact with your skin.

name: Imperial Gobball Breastplate
description: A breastplate to be proud of - go on, stick out that chest!

name: Imperial Tofu Belt
description: How ironic that the only time you feel as free as a bird is when you're strapped tightly into a belt that's obviously too small for you.

name: Alpha Predator Belt
description: For once, if you hear gurgling, it's probably not coming from your stomach.

name: Imperial Tofu Boots
description: A little peep of terror escapes these boots as you put your feet in them.

name: Imperial Gobball Boots
description: These boots will make you feel hot, hot, hot! And look not so hot!

name: Imperial Summoner Armor
description: Only summoners capable of handling a real menagerie are worthy of wearing this armor.

name: Imperial Healer Epaulettes
description: This epaulettes will help you heal your allies like no one else can.

name: Imperial Defender Shield
description: This shield will stand triumphant between you and all the dangers of the World of Twelve.

name: Imperial Magus Amulet
description: A powerful pendant that will help you push your magic powers to the limit.

name: Imperial Merchant Ring
description: With this ostentatious sign of wealth on your finger, nobody will ever guess what a measly pauper you are on the inside.

name: Imperial Illuminator Boots
description: These boots will make you run so fast and so effortlessly that people will start mistaking you for a gazelle.

name: Imperial Pyrotech Belt
description: This belt is a wonder of modern engineering and has enough room for plenty of snaps, crackles, and pops.

name: Imperial Commander Helmet
description: This crown will give you buckets of charisma. A cry of 'O come, all ye faithful' and your army will be there in a flash.

name: Imperial Assassin Cape
description: By the time your enemies are close enough to admire the rich colors in this cape, it'll be too late for them.

name: Scarlet Hand
description: The damage it does may appear pitiful, but a decent combo with this hand can prove fatal. A bit like murder by teaspoon.

name: Kam's Hand
description: This weapon used to belong to one of the World's most powerful Xelors. They say he drew out his own life so long that all that remained under his bandages was a brittle skeleton.

name: Lego Lars's Bow
description: This bow is said to have belonged to an elite archer with jaundiced skin and a curiously square head.

name: Freyrr's Bow
description: Everyone knows that Chowboca fought with a crossbow. A lesser-known fact is that his cousin Freyrr was more into bows.

name: Nausea Wand
description: This wand used to belong to an Eniripsa so talented and famous that it'd make you sick to your stomach.

name: Tijeebon Mallet
description: A wonderful find for anyone who dabbles in business... Monkey business, that is!

name: Fryou's Little Staff
description: You know what they say: it's not the size of the tool that matters; it's how you use it.

name: Sangroku's Magic Club
description: A magic club which can swell to an impressive size and then shrink again to fit in your pocket. Best appreciated by ladies.

name: Ogrest's Toothpick
description: The village elders are fond of telling you youngsters how an entire village was destroyed when Ogrest chucked his toothpick from the mountaintop in a rage. Surely stories like that aren't true, though...

name: Kwoac's Leg
description: A rumor says that this leg is part of a secret recipe for a potion which will transport you to a Moogrr bonus level. Rumors aren't even believable nowadays!

name: Ush's Cards
description: It's said that powerful Bontarian nobleman Ush Galesh put a curse on these cards so that whoever used them would become a gambling addict.

name: Assassin #1337's Daggers
description: These legendary daggers belonged to an assassin who never revealed his name. His only distinguishing feature was a tattoo of the number 1337, visible on his neck where his black cat-suit finished.

name: Soul Eater
description: This weapon tingles with the magic it has absorbed from its victims' souls.

name: Zeorus's Blade
description: It's used to sign its victims' torsos with a Z, if the stories are to be believed. Or perhaps that's an N.

name: Ancient Guardian Mace
description: The scriptures say that only the World of Twelve's greatest guardian would earn the right to bear this weapon.

name: Eskarina's Hammer
description: A hammer capable of whacking its target into another dimension.

name: Sharpened Claymore
description: This enormous sword is efficient at turning even the largest enemies into hamburger meat. Just make sure you don't do that swishy figure-of-eight thing to celebrate - your teammates will thank you.

name: Shushu Slicer
description: A mystical sword capable of tailing souls which have spent a little too long in our World.

name: Tot's Great Big Sword
description: An imposing blade which once belonged to a mythical, bearded warrior. The rumor goes that he had a T tattooed on each butt cheek.

name: Forward Slash
description: The axe of choice for net surfers.

name: Grou's Axe
description: Grou thought that this would make him irresistible to the ladies. Unfortunately, the only thing he found it useful for was chopping his armpit hair.

name: Cake Shovel
description: You know what I like the most? Cake Shovels!

name: Exi's Ancestral Shovel
description: This Enutrof was not known for his greed alone. He was also an extraordinary blacksmith said to have created many works of art.

name: Master Armorer's Seal
description: If you're ever lucky enough to see this seal stamped on a piece of equipment, you can be sure that the craftsman who made it is a very great man or woman indeed.

name: Master Jeweler's Seal
description: If you're ever lucky enough to see this seal stamped on a piece of equipment, you can be sure that the craftsman who made it is a very great man or woman indeed.

name: Master Leather Dealer's Seal
description: If you're ever lucky enough to see this seal stamped on a piece of equipment, you can be sure that the craftsman who made it is a very great man or woman indeed.

name: Master Tailor's Seal
description: If you're ever lucky enough to see this seal stamped on a piece of equipment, you can be sure that the craftsman who made it is a very great man or woman indeed.

name: Amilorus
description: This amulet seems to be under some kind of curse; thieves and highwaymen can never take their eyes off it.

name: Helvy's Epaulettes
description: A pair of epaulettes created in honor of the legends told in the inns of Brakmar.

name: Dauzd Cloak
description: This cloak belonged to an adventurer who felt so at one with nature that he decided to sleep with the Gobballs under the night sky. The next morning, only the cloak was found.

name: Azael's Twin Daggers Set
description:
Easy to carry, perfect for setting off on an adventure or a picnic with your mother-in-law.
Unfolds in just 2 seconds!

name: Single-Use Shovel
description: One of the only shovels in the World of Twelve that you can use to dig up buried treasure.

name: Shin Larva Cloak
description: You're welcome to use this cloak as a quilt, as long as you like sharing the bed. With larva hatchlings.

name: Shin Larva Amulet
description: A cheap, if disgusting, stress ball.

name: Shin Larva Leg
description: Sometimes, the things you keep in your bag disgust even you.

name: The Arvashin
description: After being stung once in its behind by a bee, the Shin Larva took desperate measures. This sword is alert and on the attack at all times.

name: Gooberbelt
description: We're all thinking it, but we're too shy to say it out loud: on certain parts of the body, this gooey viscosity isn't so unpleasant

name: Grains of Sand
description: These Grains of Sand fit nicely in between your toes, in all your nooks and crannies, and in your sandwiches.

name: Exotic Feather
description: Who would have thought this beautiful, multicolored feather came from an Albatrocious's nether regions?

name: Exotic Mother-of-Pearl
description: If you don't want to cast your pearls before swine, you'll need to keep this far from Nina Richa. She won't think twice before trying to snatch it from your mitts!

name: Pearlfriend
description: They said you'd never find a Pearlfriend, but you proved them wrong! Next up, a whale-order bride!

name: Feathered Hand
description: It'll take a fair bit of training before you can chuck this hand further than a meter or so, especially if the wind's not in your favor.

name: Imperial Shin Larva Amulet
description: This magic amulet holds impressive power... but wearing it will slow down its bearer's actions.

name: Imperial Shin Larva Boots
description: The stickiness can be unnerving, but your feet will feel as snug as a bug in a rug in these boots.

name: Imperial Shin Larva Cloak
description: This cloak is a major step on your way to becoming a butterfly.

name: Imperial Shin Larva Hat
description: There are only two things you can do with this hat: model for baby catalogs or collect pollen in Astrub.

name: Imperial Shin Larva Epaulettes
description: An outright honorable place to stow away your dignified shoulders.

name: Imperial Shin Larva Breastplate
description: You look like a busy, buzzy bumblebee. At least now the Larvae will worship you the way you always dreamed they would.

name: Moist Larval Boots
description: Even though you might feel like you're walking on flan, the supple and humid texture of these boots will keep your skin feeling well-hydrated all day long.

name: Moist Larval Helmet
description: This hat will make you look like the Blue Power Larva, the famous masked justice fighter from Bonta.

name: Muddy Larval Helmet
description: This hat will make you look like the Green Power Larva, the famous masked justice fighter from Bonta.

name: Moist Larval Belt
description: No, you're not going mad. The only thing holding your trousers up is, indeed, this viscous and sticky liquid dripping from your belt.

name: Moist Larvepaulettes
description: These epaulettes are so slimy and disgusting that even your own mother won't want to give you a hug.

name: Moist Larval Breastplate
description: Who would have thought a Larva could be so big?

name: Tauxik Hammer
description: When this hammer hits the ground, a nauseating stench fills the vicinity. It's in your best interest to learn how to fight from a distance, and fast!

name: Backagens
description: What do you mean, you saw them just yesterday? They've been dead for twenty yeeeaaars…!

name: Chaos Cloak
description: Cloak yourself in chaos.

name: Chaos Tricorn
description: This proud tricorn will have toothless hags, beery ruffians, and peg-legged parrots following you everywhere you go. You lucky thing!

name: Stone Cold Helmet
description: If you've ever seen a Crackrock performing the ancient fight move known as a headbutt, you'll know that you're better off inside this helmet than out.

name: Stone Cold Cloak
description: A bad cloak for running the 100 kameters in. A good cloak for blending into your surroundings in the Holey Forest!

name: Stone Cold Boots
description: These boots have been readily available ever since they were banned from Gobbowl tournaments. Apparently they weren't hardcore enough.

name: Hellmut
description: Looks like someone came last in the spelling bee... All the same, nobody would ever say it to your face, not when you look this scary.

name: Marboulder Belt
description: Once you get back from your adventures, you've sworn to SOMEHOW add this piece to the epic marble run leading from your bedroom to the garage, passing through all the rooms in the house. But now, brave Ulysses, is not the time for play. It is the time for fighting; for fighting and glory!

name: The Detartar
description: This staff hits so hard it'll knock the plaque right off your enemy's teeth. Approved by the Brakmarian Dental Association.

name: Ginger Goatee
description: Even the Royal Crackler dons a little ginger goatee for Movamaire!

name: Cracka Smile
description: This ring is said to confer a mystical smile-cracking power on its wearer. Looking at it, though, perhaps it's not so mystical after all.

name: The Party Bloc
description: The only breastplate that will make you want to bop your head - and your enemies' heads!

name: Black Widow Cloak
description: This cloak was woven thread by thread by the meticulous Black Widow herself. A Catapulted Crackler would have no chance against it, so I don't know why you're so quick to put it on your back.

name: Black Widow Boots
description: The Black Widow has tons of these boots to spare, which is just as well, because Rogue magazine says they're in this season!

name: Black Widow Ring
description: I suppose she doesn't need it any more, now she's a widow.

name: Phosphorescent Boots
description: Standing in radioactive puddles won't faze you if you're wearing these shoes. I mean, you'll be doomed anyway, but you know...

name: Phosphorescent Amulet
description: This amulet may look like an Al Howin's Treat, but that's no reason to eat it.

name: Phosphorescent Ring
description: This ring has a double-or-nothing thing going on: either it bites off your finger, or it makes your finger grow to three times its size. Think very carefully about the consequences before you put it on.

name: Phosphorescent Clasp
description: From above, you look like a radioactive toadstool!

name: Arachneean Headgear
description: If you can't have an extra set of eyes on your back, you can at least have them on your head.

name: Arachneean Cloak
description:
The label reads "Gentle, even when rubbed the wrong way."
A characteristic you often don't find with adventurers, unfortunately.

name: The Phosphorescent
description: This belt can also be used as a hi-vis band to make your Dragoturkey visible to other path users on dark nights.

name: Arachneean Boots
description: Hairy inside and out.

name: Arachneean Breastplate
description: Your eyes are bigger than your belly.

name: Fluo Ring
description: Once you've put this ring on, it's highly recommended that you take it off again. You have been warned...

name: Nu-Clear Cudgel
description: Whatever numbskull takes this cudgel in the face is likely to sprout a third eye on a stalk. Choose your targets well.

name: The Supernova
description: When used, this wand releases pretty sparks in all different colors. It's not very good for the planet, but it's so cute!

name: The Toxispike
description: The Black Widow bamboozled an Arachnee Embroiderer and nabbed one of its hands for her own dastardly designs.

name: Free Radigger
description: Don't tell this shovel where to dig! It's not a serial number, it's a free spade!

name: Zizotopes
description: Boots with a built-in rhythm system to make sure you step to the beat! That part in the pantomime might be yours at last!

name: Arachnee Venom
description: The perfect thing to greet your enemies with, this venom will also be a valuable ally in the event of a surprise visit from your dear great aunt.

name: Arachnee Leg
description: They say Arachnee legs bring good luck. If that doesn't work, you can always eat them. Deep-fried, they make a scrumptious appetizer!

name: Widow Rump
description: This Rump is normally used to create magical objects, but once you're done with that, use it for whatever you like.

name: Holshy Bangs
description: With a hairstyle like this, you'll have teens falling at your feet the World over. Except, perhaps, in the Windy Village. You wouldn't set foot there if your life depended on it.

name: Belly Clencher
description: The instructions on the packet say that, if you hit your enemy in just the right spot, some of his body parts will pop right out! But where...? Now, that's the question.

name: The Ratpatch
description: This breastplate was cobbled together using patches of fabric and armor from all the members of the Rat family.

name: Ratical Ring
description: This ring used to belong to Ratical's mother. Apparently, whoever's wearing it is the life and soul of the party!

name: Ratty Riot Shield
description: This shield is made up of all the body parts that were left over after one of Ratical's riotous parties. If you can bear to carry it, you probably don't realize that's what it's made of.

name: Ratto Rake
description: When Lady Gardenmore invented this tool for gathering dead leaves into piles, Sir Slayalday couldn't wait to borrow it to do the same thing with enemies' corpses. Each to their own.

name: Ratatoni Cheese
description: This looks like a fantastic meal, but it's actually a resource harvested from... *gulp*... Ratical's stinky feet!

name: Ratical Headgear
description: This rat may be stuffed, but the halitosis it suffered in life has become stronger than ever in death. When you're walking around town, you part crowds without even trying!

name: Ratical Cloak
description: Whip this cloak round to the front and you can use it as a bib. To be honest, the smell coming off it is making you drool already...

name: Ratical Ring
description: Oh, don't worry, it's not a worm! It's just a hairless, creepy, squidgy rat tail. Watch out for splinters!

name: Rattagain Headgear
description: With any luck, this piece will be enough to have the rats bowing down before you. You might need to take a bath in the sewers just to make the costume more authentic, though.

name: Rattagain Amulet
description: This amulet's goal is to keep you on the straight and narrow... Although, judging by the direction you've taken so far, I'm not sure going straight on is ideal...

name: Rattagain Breastplate
description: This breastplate will stop you from shaking with nerves at important meetings... as well as giving you an electric shock if you find yourself falling asleep!

name: Rattagain Boots
description: If ever you're unlucky enough to topple off a tall, iconic clock... Well, these heavy boots are only going to speed up your fall.

name: Primitive Gobball Cape
description: Avoid wearing this cape in a field, unless you want a flock of Gobballs to descend upon you.

name: Primitive Gobball Breastplate
description: This breastplate's sturdiness is unequaled. However, it seems that some of them have been pecked away at by especially hungry Piwis.

name: Primitive Gobball Boots
description: To achieve such a result, the craftsmen of the World of Twelve had to team up. Looking at the result, you have to ask yourself how many of them took part.

name: Wakfu Headgear
description: This strange hat appears to have been dipped in a Wakfu Source. How else could it have gotten so shiny?

name: Ice Eye
description: It's just cooler than a glass eye!

name: Frozen Bone
description: This thing is frozen to the... bone!

name: Ice Stick
description: The only thing left from this ice lolly is the stick.

name: Bobolt
description: Have you got a screw loose?

name: Mekeynism
description: This little item in the shape of a tiny key serves to reactivate jammed mechanisms.

name: Krak-Ertz
description: A little melting heart, crunchy as your heart's desire!

name: Eternal Ice
description: This ice can make anything that touches it immune to cold and highly resistant to attack.

name: Brrrbli Leather
description: This leather is so thick, it's impossible for the cold to get through. But that doesn't mean that it's not cold to the touch. Brrr!

name: Brrrbley Spears Leather
description:
Leave Brrrbley alone!
Right
now!
I mean it!

name: Snow Hair-Feathers
description: So that's what a white featherweight hairball looks like!

name: YeCh'Ti'Wawa Fang
description: He may be a YeCh'Ti, but he's not slow to show his fangs!

name: Gobbalrog Cloak
description: A cloak that'll keep you warm, even when it's hanging on the coat rack downstairs.

name: Rampart Cloak
description: With this cape on, arrows in the back will bounce straight off again.

name: Taroudium Shard
description: Small splinters of Taroudium ore.

name: Miner Box
description:
This box is just the place for your miner resources!
It can only contain items and resources linked to the miner profession.

name: Ample Miner Box
description:
This box is just the place for your miner resources!
It can only contain items and resources linked to the miner profession.

name: Voluminous Miner Box
description:
This box is just the place for your miner resources!

This box is just the place for your miner resources!

This box is just the place for your lumberjack resources!

This box is just the place for your lumberjack resources!

This box is just the place for your farmer resources!

This box is just the place for your farmer resources!

This box is just the place for your farmer resources!

This box is just the place for your farmer resources!
It can only contain items and resources linked to the farmer profession.

name: Trapper Box
description:
This box is just the place for your trapper resources!
It can only contain items and resources linked to the trapper profession.

name: Ample Trapper Box
description:
This box is just the place for your trapper resources!
It can only contain items and resources linked to the trapper profession.

name: Voluminous Trapper Box
description:
This box is just the place for your trapper resources!
It can only contain items and resources linked to the trapper profession.

name: Gigantic Trapper Box
description:
This box is just the place for your trapper resources!
It can only contain items and resources linked to the trapper profession.

name: Abyssal Trapper Box
description:
This box is just the place for your trapper resources!
It can only contain items and resources linked to the trapper profession.

name: Herbalist Box
description:
This box is just the place for your herbalist resources!
It can only contain items and resources linked to the herbalist profession.

name: Ample Herbalist Box
description:
This box is just the place for your herbalist resources!
It can only contain items and resources linked to the herbalist profession.

name: Voluminous Herbalist Box
description:
This box is just the place for your herbalist resources!
It can only contain items and resources linked to the herbalist profession.

name: Gigantic Herbalist Box
description:
This box is just the place for your herbalist resources!
It can only contain items and resources linked to the herbalist profession.

name: Abyssal Herbalist Box
description:
This box is just the place for your herbalist resources!
It can only contain items and resources linked to the herbalist profession.

name: Boohemoth Boots
description: Just show a white paw as proof of good faith to enter the fold!

name: Icecast Bone Boots
description: These boots were the result of Freezz's very first Neoromantic Smithmagic experiments. They were so successful that all the Chafers in her army were duly equipped.

name: Polar Breastplate
description: Polar Cracklers are covered in thick, tough ice that is practically unbreakable!

name: Icecast Bone Breastplate
description: This breastplate was the result of Freezz's very first Neoromantic Smithmagic experiments. It was so successful that all the Chafers in her army were duly equipped.

name: Mecha-Cloak
description: Its purpose is simple: nothing can penetrate it. It would appear to work perfectly.

name: Boohemoth Cloak
description: Warm, soft and hairy, what could be better when it's raining cats and dogs?

name: Icy Ring
description: It's difficult for your fingers not to freeze off while wearing this ring.

name: Icecast Bone Ring
description: This ring was the result of Freezz's very first Neoromantic Smithmagic experiments. It was so successful that all the Chafers in her army were duly equipped.

name: Boohemoth Headgear
description: From afar, you could almost be mistaken for a Boohemoth lost in the icy wasteland of Frigost!

name: Polar Headgear
description: The Polar Cracklers are the result of several experiments carried out by Missiz Freezz. These monsters were one of her failures, so why oh why didn't she destroy them rather than letting them live on to threaten adventurers?

name: Polar Belt
description: The frost that covers this belt lends it a certain refinement. Any self-respecting adventurer owes it to himself to wear it at least once a week when on Frigost Island!

name: Boohemoth Epaulettes
description: One of the most popular hunting trophies with our friends the hunters.

name: Polar Amulet
description: This amulet is studded with Taroudium chips, which assure the legendary resistance of the Polar Cracklers.

name: Icecast Bone Amulet
description: This amulet was the result of Freezz's very first Neoromantic Smithmagic experiments. It was so successful that all the Chafers in her army were duly equipped.

name: Mecha-Breastplate
description: Designed according to a standard model, this breastplate serves its purpose regardless of which way round you wear it.

name: Mecha-Helmet
description: The reduced field of vision appears to be the only drawback of this unbelievably tough helmet.

name: Mecha-Epaulettes
description: These epaulettes fit the shoulder joint to perfection, facilitating extremely rapid movements.

name: YeCh'Ti'Wawa Epaulettes
description: Don't be fooled by their appearance; these epaulettes definitely come from the YeCh'Ti'Wawa. Even though they could cover his entire body if he ever wore them.

name: YeCh'Ti'Wawa Amulet
description: This amulet could be used as a belt by the YeCh'Ti'Wawa, which is no reason to use it to tie up weaklings.

name: YeCh'Ti'Wawa's Belt
description: This belt can be used as a leash, which is no reason to use it as a necklace.

name: Boohmulet
description: This amulet can be used to light a fire. Just scrape a small Taroudium-coated match along the pendant.

name: Frozen Bulwark
description: This shield's toughness is inversely proportional to the temperature outside. The colder it gets, the tougher it becomes.

name: Hemoh Boots
description: The footprints left by these boots call to mind the traces left by a winged creature.

name: Boohemoth Ring
description: If you get cold feet, just give your friend a ring.

name: Capittle Cloak
description: It's the most powerful cloak in the nation, and you're giving it a piggyback. A classic example of 'I scratch your back, you scratch mine.'

name: Ice Pine
description: These ice pines are wondrous winter fruits.

name: Hagen Daz's Armor
description: Armor is Hagen Daz's shiny centerpiece, and it's so powerful that it can't help but find a place in your collection.

name: Hagen Daz Amulet
description: This amulet is so high in Taroudium that it may cause unwanted side effects!

name: Hagen Daz's Helmet
description: Hagen Daz was a Polar Crackler like the others, until the day he swallowed so much Taroudium for breakfast that he mutated into a terrifying monster!

name: Hagen Daz's Epaulettes
description: Prepare to assume the appearance of an icy colossus and be at one with the Frigostian environment!

name: Golden Cloak
description: This cloak melts into the surrounding ice floe.

name: Crackercrumb
description: A little crunch of Crackercrumb will send ice sparks flying!

name: Arktite Epaulettes
description: Are those Taroudium Shards that you can glimpse through the layer of ice on these epaulettes?

name: Crackmitten Ring
description: This ring helps to bear the cold, probably due to the subtle effect of its Taroudium content.

name: Hagen Daz's Boots
description: These boots make it possible to dodge all the dangers of the Frigost pack ice without ending up on your butt!

name: Hagen Daggerz
description: Made from Eternal Ice, these daggers can pierce any material except the Sun itself, or any science class replica of the Sun, or anything remotely warm, like a fresh loaf.

name: Necroforged Ring
description: Tapping into the power granted by Jiva, Missiz Freezz created this ring as a symbol of her betrothal to Count Harebourg.

name: Necroforged Boots
description: These boots allowed Missiz Freezz to convert a great deal of Frigost's population, who had initially been reluctant to serve her.

name: Necroforged Cloak
description: The embroidery on this cloak is made from fine splinters of Taroudium. Quite how Missiz Freezz managed to make it so light and airy remains a mystery!

name: Necroforged Belt
description: This belt was one of Jiva's gifts to Missiz Freezz. It earned her the nickname "Buns of Ice"!

name: Chaferization Breastplate
description: Crafted using ancient smithmaging knowledge, this breastplate creates a thick layer of ice over its wearer that prevents him from healing properly.

name: Chaferized Shield
description: Smithmagic was Freezz's favorite pastime. In her spare time, she created shields to equip some of her henchmen, making them even tougher.

name: Warmabones Belt
description: The Warmabones Belt is an original design by Klime the Shoemaker. We all have our own little ways of keeping warm.

name: Ketcha Fishbone
description: The Ketcha Fish is famous for its sharp and tough bones. Perfect for using as toothpicks or piercing holes in cloaks.

name: Freezzy-Breezzy Breastplate
description: The breastplate was made out of Taroudium before Missiz Freezz added the finishing touches at her forge. It will let you keep your drinks cool between your shoulder blades.

name: Refreezza Rated Helmet
description: To keep a cool head!

name: Sylargh's Epaulettes
description: Each of the two epaulettes carries a supply of nuts, bolts, and screws. Enough to take care of your followers in any circumstances imaginable.

name: Sylargh's Belt
description: Each one of this belt's slots is dedicated to a particular tool. With a waistline like that, no machine will be able to resist you!

name: Sylargh's Amulet
description: You have to have some allies before you can support them. Luckily, this amulet seems to elicit the sympathies of all the creatures around.

name: Sylargh's Boots
description: Repaired here and patched up there. How does he do it?

name: Mecha-Ring
description: This ring is equipped with small nozzles so that accessories can be attached to it.

name: Mecha-Cane
description: This stick's transposable top makes it the perfect companion for any handyman. Comes with 33 different connectors.

name: Big Drive Belt
description: This drive belt, developed by Sylargh, multiplies the capabilities of any mechanical system.

name: Adoussur Bow
description: Made with the best Mecha alloy, this bow focuses on the pure essentials, making it lighter, finer, and more efficient.

name: Mechamulet
description: According to Sylargh, the body is an imperfect machine, but this amulet can correct the defects.

name: Supreme Mecha-Ring
description: A slight shock to the finger indicates that the ring is properly on. Then the power flows…

name: Hazieff's Helmet
description: This helmet was cast from Taroudium ore, so it's tremendously tough, especially in cold temperatures!

name: Ice Shovel
description: This shovel has the ability to cut through ice like butter, but it's not recommended practice as you risk falling into an icy water hole!

name: Icy Heart Ring
description: This ring will make you melt with happiness. It affects the wearer in the depths of his soul to purify his heart of fiery flares!

name: I Scream Spoon
description: Dig in!

name: Great Ice Cape
description: Want to break free from the mold? You need the Great Ice Cape.

name: Winter Coat
description: This thick coat won't let the cold through. It's prized by Frigostian hunters for exactly that reason.

name: Tarouded Leather
description: Toura loura tarou lou rye yay! Now this leather is protected against negative temperatures!

name: Fhenris's Frozen Fang
description:
Hear his footfalls in the snow,
His fangs freeze the blood,
Lone Boohemoth is coming.

name: Herr Peece's Gloves
description: These gloves belonged to the old doctor in the Snowbound Village!

name: Lou Bricante's Jacket
description: This jacket belonged to the former deputy mayor of the Snowbound Village!

name: Mayor Cantile Medal
description: This medal once belonged to the former mayor of Frigost Village!

name: Wigemoth
description: You see, nothing else could possibly keep your bald head warmer!

name: Boohested Epaulettes
description: Even a Boohemoth couldn't pierce these with his fangs, which shows just how tough they are.

name: Wawa Collar
description: The coolness of this collar has already been demonstrated. On the other hand, it is up to you to reveal all its power.

name: Wa Claws
description: The Wawa in Wawa falls mainly on the Wawa. As people say around here.

name: Blade O'Wulf
description: This sword draws its power from the surrounding ice. Legend says that it killed Grand L, a misshapen Trool rapper.

name: Ice Age Tablecloth
description: This cloak is suitable for all great gourmets who like to be left alone whilst they guzzle down dessert.

name: Freezewell Cards
description: You'll doubtless create stacks of two different colors, running from the highest card to the lowest... and win the game!

name: Seawater Neckpiece
description: This beautiful jewelry is made from shimmering frozen seawater. If you happen to taste it inadvertently, you'll get an unpleasant surprise!

name: Count Harebourg's Clock Hand
description: Count Harebourg could use this to tell time with pinpoint accuracy.

name: Count Harebourg's Shield
description: This was actually designed to bear Count Harebourg's Clock Hand, but it turned out to be extremely effective against attacks.

name: Bolt
description: Fairly robust in its design, this ring should be put on the finger clockwise and removed by turning in a counter-clockwise direction.

name: Sawlargh
description: Half-tool, half-weapon, this ax allows Sylargh to instill authority when he's not sawing planks for odd jobs.

name: Sylargh's Breastplate
description: This breastplate appears to have been cast in a single piece. It protects against the often violent discharges that arise from metalwork.

name: Dragon Pig Blood
description: The stickiest, stinkiest blood you've ever seen. Not recommended for human consumption.

name: Enchantment Box
description:
This box is just the place for your enchantment materials!
It can only hold enchantment-related items (powders, shards, sublimations).

name: Ample Enchantment Box
description:
This box is just the place for your enchantment materials!
It can only hold enchantment-related items (powders, shards, sublimations).

name: Voluminous Enchantment Box
description:
This box is just the place for your enchantment materials!
It can only hold enchantment-related items (powders, shards, sublimations).

name: Gigantic Enchantment Box
description:
This box is just the place for your enchantment materials!
It can only hold enchantment-related items (powders, shards, sublimations).

name: Abyssal Enchantment Box
description:
This box is just the place for your enchantment materials!
It can only hold enchantment-related items (powders, shards, sublimations).

name: Jelly Ring
description: Jam this on your thumb. At least then you'll have an excuse for sucking it all the time.

name: Strawberry Jelly Headgear
description: You feel like a little goldfish in a bowl with no water.

name: Blue Raspberry Jelly Bubboots
description: These boots bubble and squeak all over the place. It's surprisingly comforting!

name: Mint Jelly Breastplate
description: With minty freshness like this on it all day, your torso will be a better kisser than you!

name: Lemon Jelly Amulet
description: When life gives you Lemon Jellies, make a Lemon Jelly Amulet!

name: Toothpick
description: There's no better way to get a Jelly out of your grill.

name: Cocktail Straw
description: This oversized straw still contains drops of week-old cocktail, meaning it splatters your enemies with sticky unpleasantness as well as doing them physical harm.

name: Lemon Aid
description: To leave enemies with a sour taste in their mouth.

name: Blueberry
description: Blue is totally your color!

name: Royal Cocktail
description: Everyone's favorite!

name: Royal Jelly Ring
description: Sure, it'll slip through your fingers in no time, but you should be honored that you're even allowed to hold it!

name: Jelt
description: This social outcast of a belt decided to try to become cool by imitating the Gelano. Now, you too can try to be cool by pretending your Gelano fits around your waist.

name: Royal Stirrer
description: Cocktails are better shaken, not stirred, but since when did you know anything about good taste?

name: Royal Smoothettes
description: Soft, squelchy, and full of fun, Smoothettes are the best way to put a little bounce back in your life!

name: Royal Gumboots
description: These boots used to be thigh-high, but the previous owner got the munchies...

name: Gritty Skin
description: This skin needs to be refined into leather before you can use it to create equipment.

name: Golden Sand
description: Sand so fine and bright that it looks like tiny particles of gold.

name: Sandy Scale
description: This scale has been quite damaged by the sand. There are even a few grains of it stuck on its surface.

name: Sand Cloak
description: Lie on your front on the beach: it's an adventurer sand-wich!

name: Sand Breastplate
description: This is the one for you... Don't think we haven't seen you making six-packs and womanly curves out of sand on the beach!

name: Sand Hoppers
description: These boots will have you hopping along the beach like a Jelly!

name: Sand Ring
description: This ring is made of sand. A great reason to stop washing your hands.

name: Beach Mask
description: Now you can swim safely in even the deepest waters (as long as you stay near the top).

name: Captain's Hook
description: Is that a captain's hook? Good form!

name: Sand Helmet
description: You could win the sandcastle competition in this any day!

name: Beach Paddle
description: For playing "who can spear the ball first" by the water's edge.

name: Body Board
description: Despite being a favorite with Mitch Loosecannon, this board is made of foam and won't protect you from anything more than blowing sand.

name: Rose of the Sands
description: This delicate rose is made of a subtle blend of sand and urine. Suits you.

name: Disco Pearl
description: This pearl has spent such a long time in the monster's mouth that it's taken on its color.

name: String of Shells
description: For once, the overpriced tat you bought on holiday isn't half bad!

name: Disco Ball
description: Tonight we're gonna party like it's 599!

name: Shell'f Defence
description: This shield would have made a great palette for budding painters - if only it didn't let in so much water.

name: Oyster Belt
description: This belt has room for you to store your important documents, as long as you don't mind them getting all salty and wet.

name: Outlandish Slobber
description: This slobber has been scraped out of a place you're lucky you've never seen. It's no use guessing… The truth is more horrible than you could ever imagine!

name: Beach Fabric
description: Resistant to sand and sea water, this fabric is often used in the manufacture of sails. When it gets too ripped and worn, you can always use it to make an umbrella for someone you hate.

name: Sour Sea Breath
description: The Bilbiboyz swallow so much water while they're rehearsing that they tend to have smelly, salty breath.

name: Beach Floats
description: Even if you're in a trance, you won't go under! Practical, aren't they? Practical, no?

name: Beach Sandals
description: You know that summer's finally here when you feel the sand between your toes.

name: Beach Towel
description: With this towel on, there's no need to fear getting thrown on your back on the hot sand.

name: Beach Hat
description: Protects from Yoovie rays and boogie nights.

name: Trunks
description: All the cool kids are wearing them... Honest!

name: Swimsuit
description: All the cool kids are wearing them... Honest!

name: Floating Noodle
description: This tube of gelatinous foam is very useful for learning to swim.

name: Emergency Buoy
description: Oh buoy... What did I tell you? Only pull the cord in an emergency... or a particularly sticky encounter!

name: Beach Cards
description: Your buddies will be so impressed by the beautiful design on these cards that they won't even notice you swiping their chips.

name: Tanked Top
description: This cool summer tank top will allow you to show off your biceps while beating on people who make inappropriate jokes. Party on, dudes!

name: Chomped Jelly
description: Somebody already took a chomp of this Jelly! Such bad taste...

name: Energizing Cocktail
description: Free your inner Jelly!

name: Jelly Sword
description: This thing can't be dangerous, can it? It's used for serving up snacks... Make sure you're not the next one!

name: Inflatable Sword
description: The great thing about this sword is that it'll fit in your pocket to be whipped out at the first sign of danger. Too bad it takes at least a minute to inflate...

name: Swollen Amulet
description: Your head has swollen up pretty bad ever since you started wearing the same amulet as the Bilby Queen. Will she ever forgive you for biting her style?

name: Blow-Up Shorts
description: These shorts will keep a respectable distance between you and your partner on the dancefloor.

name: Trool Mace
description: As heavy as an adult Trool's leg, this mace should get you sweating if nothing else.

name: Trool Finery
description: This cloak looked elegant on the Trool it came from, but it just makes you look like a deformed Bwork.

name: Beltolier
description: This belt used to be used to store snacks for those anxious moments.

name: Troolish Shoulderguards
description: Troolish Shoulderguards are designed for use in battles of attrition. There's no need to wear them all day, every day, unless you see life as a constant battle.

name: El Pochito Mask
description: This mask belonged to the Trool Academy champion.

name: El Pochito Ring
description: This ring belonged to the Trool Academy champion.

name: El Pochito Shield
description: With great resistance comes great density. This shield weighs half a Trool, so it'll only protect you if you're really strong already.

name: El Pochito Dagger
description: The Trool Academy champion kept this dagger as a lucky charm. When he became popular, the market was suddenly flooded with cheap rip-offs.

name: Imperial Trool Helmet
description: Death is just the beginning of the end.

name: Imperial Trool Belt
description: A good workman never blames his Trools.

name: Imperial Trool Breastplate
description: Victory is born of effort.

name: Imperial Trool Epaulettes
description: Effort is no more than a state of mind.

name: Strawberry Bubbleplate
description: This bubble of Jelly will protect your body from nasty outside threats.

name: Blue Raspberry Bubbleplate
description: This bubble of Jelly will protect your body from nasty outside threats.

name: Strawberry Bubble
description: Bobbing along... Bobbing along... POP!

name: Blue Raspberry Bubble
description: Bobbing along... Bobbing along... POP!

name: Strawberry Beachboots
description: These open-toed boots will get sand all over them as soon as you step outside, but you love the squelching sound they make.

name: Blue Raspberry Beachboots
description: These open-toed boots will get sand all over them as soon as you step outside, but you love the squelching sound they make.

name: Dragon Pig Helmet
description: Wrap this rindy hat around your head and you'll be the BIG PIG around town!

name: Dragon Pig Trotters
description: Some lovely pork knuckles to serve up on a bed of salad.

name: Dragon Pig Winglets
description: You're too porky to actually leave the ground, but they look good on you!

name: Larduous Hat
description: Hamhead!

name: Larduous Boots
description: I'm walking on bacon... Woooaaah!

name: Larduous Epaulettes
description: Now you have giants standing on your shoulders, dwarf.

name: Larduous Breastplate
description: Twist one of the wings on this thing and it'll tune you into Live 'n' Lardy FM, the only radio station that will have you snorting with laughter all day long.

name: Dragon Pig Bandage
description: Now you can bandage up your fists for all those sweaty, porcine battles!

name: Turq Tutu
description: Alas, it's no +20, but they say it's a relic handed down for generations, and that has to count for something.

name: Dragon Pig Beads
description: Letting you have this necklace kind of feels like casting pearls before swine.

name: Phosphorescent Breastplate
description: No more getting lost in the dark!

name: Dragon Pig Breastplate
description: You'll feel safe and sound in this breastplate, whose chinks and cracks have been plugged up with cubes of ham.

name: Blueprint for a Small Amaknian House
description: This Blueprint will enable you to change the appearance of your house in two shakes of a Rotcere's torso.

name: Blueprint for a Small Bontarian House
description: This Blueprint will enable you to change the appearance of your house in two shakes of a Rotcere's torso.

name: Blueprint for a Small Brakmarian House
description: This Blueprint will enable you to change the appearance of your house in two shakes of a Rotcere's torso.

name: Blueprint for a Small Sufokian House
description: This Blueprint will enable you to change the appearance of your house in two shakes of a Rotcere's torso.

name: Classic Door
description: The barrier we all know and love for its ability to stop people breaking on through to the other side.

name: Larva Seed
description: An experienced trapper toiled tirelessly to collect the sticky substance contained in this flask! A few drops should suffice.

name: Radiant Skin
description: This radiant skin needs to be refined into leather before you can use it to create equipment.

name: Pale Skin
description: This pale skin needs to be refined into leather before you can use it to create equipment.

name: Dark Skin
description: This dark skin needs to be refined into leather before you can use it to create equipment.

name: Tendel Pelt
description: So silky and smooth!

name: Cawwoty Slobber
description: It must have lost its color in the daylight.

name: Sage Helm
description: The wise don't think aloud. Seriously. Stop it.

name: Initiate Helm
description: Beware of false knowledge; it is more dangerous than ignorance.

name: Apprentice Helm
description: "Wisdom is not wisdom when it is derived from books alone."

name: Sage Breastplate
description: It is wisest to keep one's organs within oneself.

name: Initiate Breastplate
description: It is impossible to love and to be wise.

name: Apprentice Breastplate
description: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.

name: Sage Cape
description: A prudent question is one half of wisdom. For example, is this cape genuine?

name: Initiate Cape
description: The truth is not for all men, but only for those who seek it.

name: Apprentice Cape
description: Patience is the companion of wisdom.

name: Sage Amulet
description: It is wise to keep your neck warm.

name: Initiate Amulet
description: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

name: Apprentice Amulet
description: Wisdom comes with experience, which you still lack.

name: Sage Epaulettes
description: It is not wise to lose your head, either figuratively or literally.

name: Initiate Epaulettes
description: Wisdom is knowing what to do next; virtue is doing it.

name: Apprentice Epaulettes
description: Wisdom is always an overmatch for strength.

name: Sage Belt
description: Memory is the mother of all wisdom. Remember to buckle your belt.

name: Initiate Belt
description: Wisdom is the supreme part of happiness.

name: Apprentice Belt
description: A man cannot learn wisdom by surrounding himself with ignorance.

name: Sage Boots
description: Always keep an open mind, a compassionate heart, and some seriously stylin' boots.

name: Initiate Boots
description: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

name: Apprentice Boots
description: The journey of a hundred miles begins with a single step.

name: Sage Ring
description: It's wise not to run in circles.

name: Initiate Ring
description: Knowing others is wisdom. Knowing yourself is enlightenment.

name: Apprentice Ring
description: Contemplate this perfectly infinite circle, that you may become infinitely wise.

name: Apprentice Shield
description: Wisdom will teach you to make use of your hands when need be.

name: Zombo
description: It moves us with its underground beats and gets us our exercise. Given its irregular curves, it's only beneficial for the one carrying it.

name: Guild Door
description: A magnificent door that seems to promise great things within. Make sure you lock it behind you.

name: Imperial Bauxite
description: Imperial Bauxite is highly sought-after by weapons masters thanks to its ability to make blades so shiny and smooth.

name: Dragonheart Amethyst
description: There's a legend that says that this mineral was created during the disembodiment of the World's dragons. But, y'know, it's just a legend.

name: Lenald Ful
description: This fur has long been prized by the rich Ecaflips in the affluent quarters.

name: Lenald Tail
description: Legend has it that if a lenald's tail is cut off, it can grow back up to six times.

name: Lenald Neal-muffs
description: These very cute muffs can be worn in winter to keep your Neals warm.

name: Lenald Kimono
description: Knowing how to fold and pleat the fabric around you in the traditional Lenald style is a skill that demands a lot of patience and dexterity.

name: Lenald Tabi
description: These shoes are particularly comfy; walking feels very natural, as if you weren't wearing anything.

name: Lenald Maltial Alt Belt
description: This belt allows you to keep any garment in place so that it doesn't constantly shift.

name: Neemoi-Lenald Tail
description: Once you've tried on this cloak and felt how comfortable it is, you'll want to wear it forever. Taking it off would just be illogical.

name: Lenald Rug
description: This rug, created from Lenald fur, will add a nice touch of luxury to any interior.

name: Maltial Alt Staff
description: Made according to the pure Lenald Maltial Alt tradition. The only thing left is to see how well you can handle it.

name: Old Lenald Kimono
description: This kimono was worn for more than a decade; it's pretty beat up, but still has all the other characteristics it did so long ago.

name: Lenald Wok
description: Practical as a makeshift helmet in case of ambush, but mostly useful for cooking a good meal or two wherever you go, assuming there's fire.

name: Luxulious Ful
description: This fur has long been prized by the rich Ecaflips in the affluent quarters and by the greediest Enutrofs.

name: Seal Of Wisdom
description: A wise old Lenald once said: "Wisdom only comes to those who lemain tlanquil."

name: Ful Paddy Hat
description: It's true that, when the sun is very strong, a slight odor of dried meat wafts from the hat, but that doesn't change how fabulous you look wearing it.

name: Victoly Amulet
description: In childhood, Lenald children learn to make the sign of Victoly, and this amulet is a testament to their gesturing expertise.

name: Kunalds
description: With the thick fur on their tops, no one will expect the fearsome cutting power of these cards.

name: Empelol's Breastplate
description: As brilliant as the Empelol himself, the breastplate hurts your eyes a little.

name: Empelol's Ling
description: You've gotta know how to be sneaky like a Lenald and hide the poison in this ring. (It's even better if you've added sugar.)

name: Emplolettes
description: An old Lenald needs to know when to cover his neck so he doesn't become sick as a dog.

name: Empelol's Cloak
description: When you're well camouflaged underneath this cloak, the Crobaks won't come to steal your cheese.

name: Black Wabbit Fuw
description: A soft fur. A very soft fur, in fact, that will keep you warm in your burrow.

name: Wuby Fabwic
description: This fabric is a magnificent explosion of cawotene-red color!

name: Black Wabbit Bandana
description: This bandana, a sign of perserverence, is worn tightly knotted around the ears.

name: Black Wabbit Undewweaw
description: Little-known fact: Black Wabbits only change their underwear on holidays.

name: Black Wabbit Paws
description: It would seem that Black Wabbit Paws bring luck. But Black Wabbits don't carry them; they see lucky charms as a sign of weakness.

name: Black Wabbit Amulenewgy
description: This amulet serves as a sign of authorization, allowing safe passage through certain areas of Black Wabbit occupied territory.

name: The Wompifest
description: This shield is a bit of a killjoy, frankly. Maybe you could try a high-level joy-revival treatment over at the armorer's place?

name: Black Cawwot Poniawd
description: It may not look like much, but it really hurts when it's planted in your behind.

name: Scemu Ring
description: This ring will make you as nuts as a Black Wabbit at full steam.

name: Black Coat
description: The Black Coat is prized for its solidity, exotic aroma, and strength of character.

name: Slakjahs
description: Slack-jawed Iops must pay close attention if they don't want to dislocate their jaw with a blow from their own shoulder.

name: Waw Pompoms
description: These pompoms, affixed to your shoulders, will be a boon in times of war. Not only do they protect the wearer from blows received, but they relax your neck as well.

name: Black Enewgy
description: A mysterious energy that gives blind courage and strength to whoever comes in contact with it.

name: Seal of Rage
description: Like watching Hunee Bow Meow, putting this ring on your finger provokes insatiable rage.

name: Blackenewgy Juice
description: A mysteriously energizing drink that's turned more than one person nuts - or simply made them idiots.

name: Amuleto
description: For real Black Wabbits!

name: Scepter of Wage
description: This scepter is marked by rage and thirst for revenge. It used to belong to Beatwix Kiddo.

name: Emiw Shoes
description: These shoes, extensively tested by Awnie the Emiw, will let you run faster than a bomb explosion!

name: Emiw Amulet
description: Protects you from those with bad intentions, especially those who want to directly harm you.

name: Emiw Beawd
description: This breastplate is made from beard hair. It will protect your torso from explosion damage, and it'll also store Cawwot crumbs for later.

name: Emiw Wing
description: It has been passed down through generations of Black Wabbit families to honor and remember the stupid sacrifice of their ancestors.

name: Wabbit Fuw
description: A soft fur. A very soft fur, in fact, that will keep you warm in your burrow.

name: Gween Dye
description: This dye lets you give a discreet and 100% natural color to all your wabbit-fur garments.

name: Wabbit Mask
description: You shouldn't follow strange white Wabbits who run like madmen into dark holes...

name: Wabbit Coat
description: The Wabbit Coat is prized for its softness, suppleness, and strength of character.

name: Wabbit Paws
description: It would seem that Wabbit Paws bring luck. But Wabbits generally prefer Lenald paws as lucky charms...

name: Wabbit Stampew
description: Signing scrolls is a special treat, in the noble court where the long-ears meet... It's fow stampin'! That's why they call it a Stampew!

name: Tiwabbit Axe
description: This cute little axe has not lost its edge, and it can fix a sore throat very quickly.

name: Cawwot Rod
description: How best to lure your adversary? Just stick a Cawwot under their nose and they'll come running!

name: Wo Wabbit Amulet
description: This amulet is as wide as a Wo Wabbit on a diet!

name: Cawwot Poniawd
description: It may not look like much, but it really hurts when it's planted in your behind.

name: Huge Cawwot
description: Those that tried to eat it broke their teeth!

name: Pompom Tail
description: A Pompom tail that's been primped and prettified all day.

name: Pompom Belt
description: This belt has been pampered its entire life. As soon as the buckle was in place, it knew it was the prettiest.

name: Pompom Shield
description: Cushions blows in case of falls and bounces.

name: Cawwot Wound
description: Whether you nibble 'em or swallow 'em whole doesn't matter; the only thing that does is that there are more Cawwot Wounds to eat after.

name: Gwand Viziew's Scepter
description: You up to being the Gwand Viziew in place of the Gwand Viziew?

name: Gwand Viziew's Cloak
description: This cloak protects its wearer against bad spells and pesticides.

name: Gwand Viziew's Beawd
description: This breastplate is made from beard hair. It will protect your torso from various projectiles, and it'll also store Cawwot crumbs for later.

name: Gwand Viziew Sandals
description: These sandals will let you run faster than a Wabbit runs after a Cawwot, and that's already pretty fast.

name: Gwand Viziew Amulet
description: A magic aura comes from this amulet. Maybe this is where the Gwand Viziew got his power of persuasion?

name: Owange Fabwic
description: This fabric was dyed with Cawwot juice to give it that lively color.

name: Midalurgee
description: Midalurgee metal is frequently used in the production of Wobots. It's light, resistant, but incredibly difficult to weld.

name: Guawd Helmet
description: Pwotect youw skull fwom stwong impacts and landslides.

name: Gauwd Cloak
description: It will allow you to make an impwovised sheltew undewgwound.

name: Gauwd Epaulettes
description: To help keep your head on your shoulders, where it belongs.

name: Guawd Toga
description: With this on, you won't be naked!

name: Oranged Wa
description: FACT: no warrior who wears the Oranged Wa into battle will ever fall before a Lenald!

name: Slingshot
description: Aim straight between the two prongs.

name: Little Guawd Helmet
description: Head to neck protection! You're on your own for the other parts.

name: Gauntlet
description: It will let you avoid getting your hands dirty while harvesting Cawwots.

name: Duwandil
description: No need to train too much; when you take this out, the Lenalds can't help but run away!

name: Beltstwap
description: This belt is adorned with only the best hardware.

name: Gauwd Fishing Spear
description: One day, the Wabbits had an idea: why not fish for Loot with a spear? It was a fantastic idea! Now they can have fish with their Cawwots.

name: Gauwd Mowning Staw
description: This club is very dangerous, even for the one carrying it. You should keep your distance so you don't crush your tender parts.

name: Waw Paint
description: Put this waw paint on youw face befowe heading out to battle - it'll bwing luck to the lucky.

name: Wo Shield
description: This immense shield protects you well, sure, but you can't see anything over it.

name: Wingbot
description: This ring is a mess of amateur mechanics! Nothing is the way it should be, but strangely, it works pretty well.

name: Wobot Glasses
description: No, these glasses aren't x-ray. And no, they don't give you superpowers like shooting lasers out of your eyes. They are super classy though!

name: Wobot Medal
description: This medal is used like a little key. It's inserted into the Wobot to turn (and keep) it on.

name: Wobotic Back-up Undewweaw
description: In case of sudden terrors, you'll be thankful to have a back-up plan.

name: Cawwot Tuft
description: This fine tuft of hair has been imbued with the delicate and sweet odor of cawwot. It almost makes you want to eat it - but then you'd have hair on your tongue.

name: The Wa's Seal
description: Affix your seal, impose your laws, and pose in front of the Wa!

name: Wa Wamulet
description: A precious heirloom guarded fiercely by generations of royal Wabbits. Then it was copied and the copies were sold off to the highest bidders.

name: The Wa's Scepter
description: The Wabbits say that it's the first scepter ever received by their Wa, during his childhood, but he forgot it among all his possessions.

name: Wa Wabbit's Corset
description: In order to quickly look very svelte and seductive, the Wa doesn't hesitate to reach for his corset. In any case, it's pretty painful to wear.

name: Wa Wabbit's Awmbands
description: These inflatable armbands surround the arm so that it looks strong and well-muscled, when in reality, it's hiding a ton of flab.

name: Wa Wabbit's Cloak
description: This cloak is very slimming. Just look at the Wa's figure!

name: Wa Wabbit's Cwown
description: The legendary Wa Wabbit's Cwown! Finally in your clutches! You know you were hoping to try it on at least once in your life as an adventurer, don't pretend you weren't.

name: Infected Fuw
description: Take care when handling this fur; it can contaminate you.

name: Sharp Tooth
description: Even without their teeth, the Zwombbits still try to bite you!

name: Boney Zwombbit Epaulettes
description: Although fragile, they can easily make a new hole in someone's torso and cut them to the bone.

name: Boney Zwombbit Paws
description: There's no skin left on the Zwombbit paws. They're not very appealing, but they're certainly useful.

name: Boney Zwombbit Claw
