description: This claw coming near you is not a happy thought. Even one injury caused by it and you're sure to be quarantined.

name: Zwombbit Torso
description: This torso is putrid and covered in filthy hairs, but that doesn't stop you from wearing it because it assures unparalleled close-combat protection.

name: Wo Zwombbit Mask
description: If you think this mask will make you too ugly, go look in a mirror first; it'll put things in perspective for you.

name: Infected Sack
description: This putrid sack can still keep things clean.

name: Infected Cawwot Sword
description: This Cawwot was infected by the Viwus, and now it's rigid and unbreakable! It's a veritable weapon of mass destruction!

name: Belt of Contagion
description: To avoid Viwus contamination, you need to know how to protect yourself and avoid getting too close to Zwombbits.

name: Wotten Cawds
description: We'we not cheating you - you just have wotten luck.

name: Zwombwork Cloak
description: This cloak was made from several bits and pieces of skin. It's like a piece of meat you carry around! You can be just like Brrrbley Spears!

name: Viwus
description: Could it be the origin of the widespread infection in the burrows?

name: Twin-Pwonged Cawwot
description: Perfect for cutting triangles out of Zwombbit necks (which will allow you to complete your collection of geometrically shaped Zwombbit flesh)!

name: Leffe Fouw Dead
description: If you think you can survive in the Zwombbit-infested tunnels, you've not yet had a swig of this drink.

name: Infected Bow
description: The arrows spread the infection. Once hit by one, there's no escaping!

name: Infected Ring
description: This ring was in direct contact with the Viwus, which makes its wearer immune to the menace.

name: Genetically Modified Cloak
description: This cloak was submitted to numerous molecular modifications, which improved the material's resistance and greatly increased its abilities.

name: Genetically Modified Belt
description: This belt might modify your genetic code if you wear it too often.

name: Genetically Modified Boots
description: Particle reinforcement allows an auto-regenerating material to be joined to a removable one, making movement one millisecond faster.

name: Black Cawwot
description: This Black Cawwot is just waiting to be thrown in the reserves, or the kitchen.

name: Bow Meow Seed
description: An experienced trapper toiled tirelessly to collect the sticky substance contained in this flask! A few drops should suffice.

name: Bilbi-Speaker
description: B-I-L-B-I: it's aliiiive and amplified!

name: Lemon Towel
description: Going swimmin'? Don't forget to bring a towel!

name: Strawberry Towel
description: Going swimmin'? Don't forget to bring a towel!

name: Blue Raspberry Towel
description: Going swimmin'? Don't forget to bring a towel!

name: Mint Towel
description: Going swimmin'? Don't forget to bring a towel!

name: Blue Raspberry Deckchair
description: A must-have for photos that'll make your friends jelly!

name: Strawberry Deckchair
description: A must-have for photos that'll make your friends jelly!

name: Sand Wall
description: If you love spending time building sandcastles on the beach, you'll already know this wall like the back of your sand. I MEAN HAND!

name: Cube of Strawberry Jelly
description: The Bilbiboyz and Bilbigirlz have all licked this cube to see what flavor it is. And now it's yours!

name: Cube of Blue Raspberry Jelly
description: The Bilbiboyz and Bilbigirlz have all licked this cube to see what flavor it is. And now it's yours!

name: Cube of Lemon Jelly
description: The Bilbiboyz and Bilbigirlz have all licked this cube to see what flavor it is. And now it's yours!

name: Cube of Mint Jelly
description: The Bilbiboyz and Bilbigirlz have all licked this cube to see what flavor it is. And now it's yours!

name: Large Distillery
description: Add this to the Crafting Room in your Haven Bag or to your Haven World to make level 0 to 160 recipes for the Herbalist profession.

name: Large Millstone
description: Add this to the Crafting Room in your Haven Bag or to your Haven World to make level 0 to 160 recipes for the Farmer profession.

name: Large Polisher
description: Add this to the Crafting Room in your Haven Bag or to your Haven World to make level 0 to 160 recipes for the Miner profession.

name: Large Fisherman's Workshop
description: Add this to the Crafting Room in your Haven Bag or to your Haven World to make level 0 to 160 recipes for the Fisherman profession.

name: Large Sawmill
description: Add this to the Crafting Room in your Haven Bag or to your Haven World to make level 0 to 160 recipes for the Lumberjack profession.

name: Large Tanner's Workshop
description: Add this to the Crafting Room in your Haven Bag or to your Haven World to make level 0 to 160 recipes for the Trapper profession.

name: Lenald Calving
description: This statue represents the Lenald Empelol's messenger.

name: Lenald Bento
description: This Lenald Bento is a lunch that's easy to tlanspolt. It's tladitionally plepaled with Black Cawwots, fish, and a few glains of Vanilla Lice.

name: Lose Tea
description: A refreshing rose drink (note: does not contain actual roses).

name: Bitten Wawdwobe
description: This beautiful wardrobe is not only deep and practical, it gives off a nice scent of stew that the others don't have.

name: Lantewn Cawwot
description: This Cawwot has been hardened with a special resin and several holes have been punched through it to let a candle's light shine through. A nice odor of stew is coming from it.

name: Wa Wabbit Bed
description: A wise Wa knows lying in bed is an essential part of the job.

name: Bitten Dwessew
description: The handles are in the shape of Cawwots. You'll have to take good care of it so it doesn't become garden compost.

name: Gwand Wabbit Totem
description: This lawge Totem used to be a prayer altar in the middle of a huge farm.

name: Little Wabbit Totem
description: This Little Totem used to be a prayer altar in a home, where prayers would be made for a good harvest.

name: Weally Huge Cawwot
description: This giant Cawwot is made entirely of wood; the realism is impressive, is it not?

name: Huge Bitten Cawwot
description: This giant Cawwot is made entirely of wood; the realism is impressive, is it not? So impressive that someone has already tried to eat it.

name: Little Two-Eawed Wall
description: If you want to wall off your land, this wall is perfect for sending the Lenalds into fits of rage.

name: Lawge One-Eawed Wall
description: If you want to wall off your land, this large wall is perfect for sending the Lenalds into fits of rage. They've even already broken off an ear!

name: Lawge Two-Eawed Wall
description: If you want to wall off your land, this lawge wall is perfect for sending the Lenalds into fits of rage.

name: Little One-Eawed Wall
description: If you want to wall off your land, this wall is perfect for sending the Lenalds into fits of rage. They've even already broken off an ear!

name: Huge Black Cawwot
description: This giant Cawwot is made entirely of wood; the realism is impressive, is it not?

name: Huge Bitten Black Cawwot
description: This giant Cawwot is made entirely of wood; the realism is impressive, is it not? So impressive that someone has already tried to eat it.

name: Little Wall
description: If you want to wall off your land, this little wall is perfect.

name: Mythwil Ore
description:
"Mythwil owe is incwedibly shiny, wesistant, and pewfect fow evewything we Wabbits make!"
-Hollow-Tooth, famed Wabbit furrier

name: Littlest Pet Shed
description: This pocket-sized cage has room inside for up to 25 pets.

name: Blueprint for a Beach Inn
description: This Blueprint will enable you to change the appearance of your Inn in two shakes of a Rotcere's torso.

name: Candied Cawwots
description: Several types of Cawwots and Black Cawwots were simmered together for hours, which gives an exquisite taste to the dish.

name: Wa Awcticawwot
description: The Wa's favorite treat! Melts in your mouth (and not anywhere else).

name: The Dedpiksel Pike
description: It's been entirely redesigned by the Lenalds! Not to put too fine a point on it, but it's got quite a fine point on it. It's deadly, is what we're saying here.

name: Black Cawwot Juice
description:
This drink is extremely loaded with Black Cawwot concentrate. Don't breath it in too deeply, or you'll lose your head.
Only craftable with the Histoholic Marquee on Wabbit Island.

name: Stool
description: Doesn't look like much, but it really makes your butt feel good. Don't put any decorations behind the back of the stool.

name: Amakna Bench
description: This bench will let you stretch out on it!

name: Well
description: This well definitely has a bottom! Just look at all those kamas lying on the bottom! Oh, you can't see them? Look a little closer...

name: Amaknian Stool
description: This stool is a little more refined, and makes your butt feel just as good. Don't put any decorations behind the back of the stool.

name: Brakmarian Stool
description: This stool is a little more refined, and makes your butt feel just as good. Don't put any decorations behind the back of the stool.

name: Bontarian Stool
description: This stool is a little more refined, and makes your butt feel just as good. Don't put any decorations behind the back of the stool.

name: Sufokian Stool
description: This stool is a little more refined, and makes your butt feel just as good. Don't put any decorations behind the back of the stool.

name: Bonta Bench
description: This bench will let you stretch out on it!

name: Brakmar Bench
description: This bench will let you stretch out on it!

name: Sufokia Bench
description: This bench will let you stretch out on it!

name: Blueprint for an Amaknian Guild Hall
description: This Blueprint will enable you to change the appearance of your guild in two shakes of a Rotcere's torso.

name: Blueprint for a Bontarian Guild Hall
description: This Blueprint will enable you to change the appearance of your guild in two shakes of a Rotcere's torso.

name: Blueprint for a Brakmarian Guild Hall
description: This Blueprint will enable you to change the appearance of your guild in two shakes of a Rotcere's torso.

name: Blueprint for a Sufokian Guild Hall
description: This Blueprint will enable you to change the appearance of your guild in two shakes of a Rotcere's torso.

name: Aristocrab Staff
description: This staff was made with the upper classes in mind. Equip it and you'll feel like a nobleman, even in the middle of a bloody battle.

name: Effigy Cards
description: These cards are highly regarded by the monks that collect them in the monastery.

name: Clergyman Sword
description: This sword looks like it might cause almighty pain but it unites the clergymen all the same.

name: Bluestar Sword
description: A whack from this sword will hit your enemies like a bolt from the blue.

name: Hammer of Death
description: They say that this hammer can kill dead people a second time over.

name: First Swipes Club
description: Boowolfines make these staffs from the skulls of their former spouses. They might not be very magical, but they will make sure you never forget who wears the pants.

name: Troyle's GG Shield
description: Nope, this shield won't scream "GG!!!" every time you protect yourself with it... Unearthed deep within a Wabbit warren, you can't help wondering how it got down there.

name: Dreamy Blade
description: Put your enemies to sleep with one fatal blow from this marvelous blade.

name: Maltial Cape
description: This cape will surely augment your martial arts skills.

name: Well-Guawded Cape
description: This cape will, without a doubt, assure your safety.

name: Brutal Tiara
description: Not for brutes.

name: Wild Gobball Breastplate
description: It's been said that with this breastplate, you could stroll around Frigost almost completely naked. Note the word "survive" was not mentioned.

name: Wild Gobball Epaulettes
description: Now, the weight of the wool is on your shoulders. Ancient Gobball Hunter proverb

name: Wild Gobball Helmet
description: One thing is certain: if you come across a Bow Meow, it will curl up for a nice nap in your warm headgear.

name: Wild Gobball Ring
description: This ring will wear your fingers to the bone.

name: Staff of Great Wisdom
description: The wise man admits he knows nothing. He also doesn't mess with someone wielding this staff.

name: Hammer of Savagery
description: With this hammer you have one and only one desire: smash, smash and SMASH!

name: Wild Belt
description: This belt is as warm as it is odorous.

name: Bloody Gobball Steak
description: If you want to be the very best, you're going to need some Vitality!

name: Thick Skin
description: This thick skin needs to be refined into leather before you can use it to create equipment.

name: Wild Talisman
description: It brings happiness, or so they say!

name: Gobball Hammock
description: Be careful not to get trapped in it forever more.

name: Great Wild Gobball Boots
description: The wilder the Great Gobball was, the more getting kicked in the butt with these boots will hurt.

name: Great Wild Gobball Ring
description: Although it's a real Wild Gobball bone, its magic virtues remain to be proven.

name: Wild Totem
description: It's mysterious. Ugly, but mysterious!

name: Feesy's Bow
description: Can shoot odoriferous and, frankly, disgusting arrows.

name: Wild Sack
description: Don't let go; it might take off running!

name: Rotten Daggawot
description: A dagger made of a rotten Cawwot that was found in Zwombbit territory... It'll do the trick.

name: Initiate Shield
description: Your wisdom can be seen in your choice of arms.

name: Sage Shield
description: Turn your wounds into wisdom. Or carry a shield and avoid wounds. Your choice.

name: Bwork Fabric
description: This stained scrap of fabric isn't really identifiable. You can't tell from the stains if it's a used tissue, a pair of skidmarked boxers, or worse still. But what could be worse?

name: Thork's Gobball Horn
description: This horn wasn't torn from Kiki, the Bwoggall "appropriated" by Thork. It's a hunting trophy from Thork's youth, a good luck charm of sorts. However, the fact that you have it would seem to indicate that its influence isn't linked to luck. At least, not the good kind.

name: Spit Toon
description: This Spit Toon can be used in the fabrication of equipment.

name: Noke's Boots
description: These boots will make it that little bit easier to dance with Boowolves.

name: Noke's Talisman
description: This lucky amulet will protect you from those uneasy midnight encounters.

name: Noke's Mask
description:
This mask can be pretty terrifying
if worn in the forestand will really bring out your wild side.

name: Prickel Ring
description: A ring made from woven Thistle fibers. Be careful with your fingers: it’s probably full of thorns...

name: Necrogrine Hand
description: Despite what you might think, this clock hand isn't actually dead. It just likes killing others.

name: The Watch
description: Now you have The Watch, time is in your hands! You can be as late as you like!

name: Noke's Cloak
description: You'll be like a sheep in Boowolf's clothing with this cloak made from real Boowolf skin.

name: Patched Bwork Breastplate
description: Despite the primitive craftsmanship, this breastplate seems pretty solid. It would be perfect for combat, were it not for the odor of Bwork wafting from literally every surface.

name: Seeping Bwork Boots
description: You've always wanted to walk a mile in a Bwork's shoes, but you didn't think of the half-inch of scum and sweat that would be left behind... Squelch! but you didn't think of the half-inch of scum and sweat that would be left behind... Squelch! Urgh!

name: Greasy Bwork Helmet
description: Some say the Bworks never take their armor off and never wash it. They never wash themselves either, for that matter.

name: Brown Bwork Cape
description: It's said that the leather used in making this cape was tanned using the secretions of a Wild Gobball. This is only a rumor though. The truth is far worse.

name: Thork Epaulettes
description: Solid, simple, effective. Thork likes massive epaulettes. That way, he looks like he's more than just a Bwork.

name: Thork Amulet
description: Thork's only apparently useless accessory, the amulet is made of the beard of an ancient Bwork named Nad'Lug. In actuality, it's really powerful.

name: Thork Boots
description: The spikes on Thork's boots had always impressed his fellow Bwork Explorers. It's plain to see they've been used to kick a few butts...

name: Bworcine Pedalian Cincture
description: Don't be fooled by the highfalutin name. It's said this "cincture" is actually the repurposed toe ring of what must be the biggest Bwork in history. As we all know, as the dimensions of a Bwork increase by a factor of n, Bwork surface area increases by n squared. Much more skin to catch the sun. At the same time, Bwork volumetric mass increases by n cubed. Much, much more fat to soak up the sun and insulate. Which all amounts to a really fat, really sweaty Bwork with a really sweaty toe ring. Lots.

name: Immaculate Bwork Amulet
description: This Bwork amulet is fairly disturbing. Other than the delicateness which it was created with compared to normal Bwork products, it's its cleanliness which is most shocking! Oh! But of course. The cord is much too short to go around the head and ears of a Bwork.

name: Bwork Sword
description: Simple and effective, this blade is designed more to crush than cut. The only thing that makes you doubt its combat-worthiness is the sticky handle...

name: Bwork Shield
description: You've turned it this way and that, and still cannot understand how they got the iron around the wooden center. Unless they somehow inserted the wooden center into the iron? You may never know...

name: Screwloose Stool
description: Despite what you may think, the pieces of this stool have not been properly screwed together. Don't put any decorations behind the back of the stool.

name: Cawwot Stool
description:
The table legs, being made out of Cawwot, can be a bit unstable.
Don't put any decorations behind the back of the stool.

name: Mint Beach Seat
description: Great for Enutrofs who like to give their legs a rest or just admire their socks-and-sandals combo. Don't put any decorations behind the back of the seat.

name: Lemon Beach Seat
description: Great for Enutrofs who like to give their legs a rest or just admire their socks-and-sandals combo. Don't put any decorations behind the back of the seat.

name: The Stars Custard Tart
description:
"Did you know? The stars are actually a subtle mixture of fairy dust and custard!"
- Mye Iopik, astrologer

name: Wild Wool
description: This wool is so dense that it can be used over several days. It's a must-have for avid explorers.

name: Bwork Ceramic
description: A relic of the Bworks' glorious past.

name: Bwork Amphora
description: A relic of the Bworks' glorious past.

name: Otomai's Disciple Armor
description: An extraordinary piece of armor, given to you as a reward by Otomai's Disciple in Astrub. He promised you another mission, in exchange for which he'll reward you even more. Don't forget to go back and see him!

name: Tormented Cape
description: Wearing this cape isn't a sign of any great torment, but rather a multitude of little worries.

name: Ocushu Torso
description: You feel as if a legion of gazes are watching you and staring into your soul.

name: Tormented Breastplate
description: Don't worry, this breastplate only provokes constant worrying in 74.999% of cases. Go ahead - put it on.

name: Ocushu Link
description: Strengthening the ties can only help you do more evil.

name: Tormented Belt
description: A stomach ache beats eternal torment any day.

name: Ocushu Spikes
description: Driven deeply into the skin, these spikes cause an incredible pain that isn't entirely disagreeable...

name: Tormented Epaulettes
description: Being deeply tormented by someone gives you strength, while tormenting someone deeply gives you courage.

name: Prickly Cutting
description: Plant it quickly! Before you're covered with pricks!

name: Prickly Wood
description: This prickly wood should be quickly cut while wearing gloves and immediately stored in a thick sack.

name: Powpaya
description: A delicious fruit that warms you up. Eating too many of them can cause second-degree burns in your stomach.

name: Mosscandel Wood
description: This wood shines brighter than a thousand fires when it's burned.

name: Sporal Yeast
description: It will make your breads and cakes rise and cook perfectly, but you might feel a bit strange while eating them...

name: Desert Truffle
description: This strongly flavored dish only grows in the Ohwymi Desert or similarly hot and dry areas. Don't be put off by its rocky appearance.

name: Mushray
description: A strange mushroom that does a good job of lighting up dark areas.

name: Aloa Vera Leaf
description: Often used as medicine, the Aloa Vera leaf is also valued for the nice soothing effect it gives when applied directly to the skin.

name: Venutian Trap
description: Don't stick your fingers in it. They'll be very slowly digested.

name: Sandy Ore
description: It's easy to confuse this ore with a plant, except for the fact that it can only be uprooted by a pickaxe.

name: Black Gold
description: This ore is difficult to make out in dark places, but when you do find it, it'll brighten your day.

name: Scincus
description: This little reptilian fish loves swimming through quicksand. It's very commonly found in the desert.

name: Hydawhey
description: It's more than a little difficult to catch a Hydawhey. They're so afraid of neighboring ecosystems that they rarely come out of hiding.

name: Gloopy Drool
description: The texture of this drool is really not appetizing.

name: Castuc Cloth
description: This cloth is made with sand, drool, and other strange objects from Ohwymi known only to the Castucs.

name: Castuc Spine
description: This spine was bravely plucked from a particularly aggressive Castuc.

name: Ponk-tius
description: An enormous, flowering spine - great for crafting.

name: Blackspore Strip
description: Carefully cut from the top of a Blackspore cap.

name: Blackspore Poison
description: This poison causes violent hallucinations to anyone who inhales it, and gives infinite freedom to anyone who eats it.

name: Royal Mycelium
description: This vegetative bit of Sugnuf is behind the proliferation of the Blackspores.

name: Cactaboots
description: A spiky kick in the rear can be quite convincing.

name: Prickelback
description: It will protect you from overheating in the shadeless desert.

name: Cactabrooch
description: This brooch allows the Castucs to send each other signals by reflecting the sun's blinding rays.

name: Ecactettes
description: You've got to protect your back and shoulders out in the desert since, after your head, they get the most sun.

name: Ponktius Helmet
description: Ponktius had a good head on his shoulders. And now it's on YOUR shoulders.

name: Ponktius Belt
description: This belt keeps your body balanced for a perfect stab, every time.

name: Ponktius Torso
description: This breastplate will cover your torso and make you sweat unimaginably. Then you can collect the sweat and slake your thirst.

name: Ponktius's Cloak
description: Great for poinkpiking throughout the desert and ponkponking with others.

name: Mushmantle
description: This cape really holds in moisture and humidity. It's not all that pleasant to wear, but it's plenty useful for protecting against the heat.

name: Poroplast
description: A perfect combination of yourself and a rotten mushroom stem.

name: Sporettes
description: They almost seem to be an actual part of your body, as if they'd grown there naturally while you were crossing the Fungopole.

name: Floral Sporing
description: This was originally a smelly, disgusting protrusion. It looks good on your finger though.

name: Sugnuf Boots
description: These boots are so beautiful and refined that Sugnuf doesn't even wear them - or maybe that's because he's got no feet.

name: Collective Pensivant
description: With this amulet, Sugnuf can increase the range of the Blackspores' collective consciousness. It's actually pretty pointless though, since no Blackspore ever leaves the Fungopole.

name: Sugnuf Torso
description: This will help you blend in while you're in the Fungopole.

name: Sugnuf's Pearls
description: This belt is made of braided roots and water droplets straight from the depths of Amybia.

name: The Ripper
description: It'll rip out your teeth before you can blink!

name: Cactaegis
description: This breastplate you got from the Castucs will keep your skin cool and help you survive the desert.

name: Cactlass
description: A sword made from a big spine as strong as steel and as sharp as a razor.

name: Pinhead
description: This stylishly converted barrel cactus will keep you cool and the sun off your head. If you can put up with the odor of mashed up cactus, that is...

name: Spiky Fist
description: A hollowed-out Castuc fist can be a formidable weapon. Don't knock it 'till you've tried it.

name: Poinkpoink Shield
description: When you're carrying this shield, people will want to keep their distance. Rare indeed is he who enjoys getting stabbed by sharp spines.

name: Poinkpoink Boots
description: Comfortable on the inside, spiky on the outside.

name: Chop-Chop
description: In order to keep all their limbs, your enemies will rush to get out of your sight, chop chop!

name: Epoinkettes
description: Just be careful not to pop yourself in the eye with one, otherwise you'll miss out on all the beautiful desert vistas.

name: Spore Boots
description: They help you get around by sticking quite well to the humid and gooey ground of the Fungopole.

name: Portabella
description: Shake me! And spores will fall out!

name: Inkap
description: A perfect bowl cut, with a side of viscous goo and a few bits of spore.

name: Spore Black Belt
description: Do spores really need to wear belts?

name: The Cap
description: The Cap helps spongy bodies maintain equilibrium and also guards against obscene thoughts.

name: Spore Launcher
description: This incredibly long staff helps its user to leap, walk upright, and knock opponents out.

name: Fungaulettes
description: Back when the Fungopole was created, these epaulettes were just some fungus shoulder pads. Since then, they've dried up and hardened a bit.

name: Dethkap
description: This headgear was hard won in rigorous fungal combat. Wear it with pride.

name: Sugnuf Skin
description: This nauseating, rugged, viscous, sporal, contaminated (did we mention nauseating?) skin will look great on you.

name: Sprecious
description: This precious treasure will make you start to realize how much you'd like to live in this gloomy place.

name: Sandhetti
description: A delicious hot dish loved by all desert denizens.

name: Cacta-Cola
description: A drink that will sting a bit going down, and might leave you with a pretty dry mouth.

name: Bolaglo
description: Maybe it's the gentle glow, maybe it's that you haven't eaten since lunch, but you can't wait to get this in your belly!

name: Sporey Cocktail
description: A mysterious drink that can cause pretty much constant hallucinations. It's for you to decide if that's a plus or a negative.

name: Luminous Bread
description: Even the strongest torches aren't as bright as this bread.

name: Mushray Jelly Roll
description: Desert children's favorite dessert! Festively colored and sugared to taste!

name: Mr. Nugget's Peat Pie
description: After eating it day in and day out, this dessert will start to become your favorite.

name: Truffloaf
description: Nothing better than enjoying some truffle bread out in the desert. A rare item in the Nations, it's common enough in the Ohwymi Desert.

name: Spore Carpet
description: Shake it out daily to keep too many spores from growing.

name: Spore Waterer
description: A souvenir of your gardening days in the healthy Fungopole of the Ohwymi Desert. So many good memories.

name: Castuc Stuffed Toy
description: Finally, a friendly Castuc that you can hug without worrying about getting hurt.

name: Glute Gasher
description: A lovely decorative pouf to remind you of all your desert adventures.

name: Castuc Dresser
description: For holding your most treasured possessions.

name: Tormented Boots
description: Each torment can be known by the cry that follows it. Your boots, though, are silent as the crypt.

name: Ocushu Vision
description: The first and last thing your enemies will see before they pass on.

name: Tormented Helmet
description: My spirit is tormented by my lust for power... said nobody, ever.

name: Tormented Fragment
description: All that desolation in a single fragment makes it a real affliction for its carrier.

name: Tormented Outgrowth
description: This outgrowth was torn off quite slowly, to maximize torment.

name: Troolgodyte Poncho
description: The shimmering fabric of this poncho actually seems to be pretty resistant, no matter how primitively it appears to have been made.

name: Dagger of the Ancestral Spirit
description: Light and cold to the touch, this spectral dagger seems to invite you to slip behind your enemies and help them to disappear.

name: Fanatic Bone
description: Here's a piece of bone that's as sharp as a razor blade and is very useful for getting you out of a close shave with an enemy.

name: Fanatic Fragment
description: All that excitement in a single fragment really takes its toll on your mental health.

name: Fanatic Outgrowth
description: The fatal blow was so violent that this outgrowth went all to pieces.

name: Picus Shushu
description: Despite its mortal qualities, a simple flourish of this needle is all it takes to scare your target stiff. Only its owner is immune to its portal.

name: Tigus Shushu
description: Once you've mastered this ring, the energy that binds it to its bearer means it can be also used as a boomerang.

name: Frappus Shushu
description: When you stick this staff violently in the ground, all the creatures in the nearby area fall asleep. However, we don't advise you use it around children.

name: Cartus Shushu
description: When these cards are cast, new ones will immediately appear in the hands of their owner. With practice, you will also be able to use them to slice your enemies into little slivers.

name: Glaivus Shushu
description: Able to pierce through even the most resistant armour, his blade is formed from two blocks held together by Victus's own saliva.

name: Arcus Shushu
description: A real tactical throw weapon, the hunters use it when hunting in the Shustuft Crust.

name: Brutus Shushu
description: As heavy as it is imposing, this great mass will put off all but the most foolhardy of adventurers. However, Moskito hunting could be little taxing.

name: Tranchus Shushu
description: Lightly built, this is the ideal axe to chop everything that moves into smithereens. It is so resistant, some Enutrofs even use to cut through rocks when they're mining for precious stones.

name: Martus Shushu
description: Those who have noticed the shock wave that is emitted with each hit don't tend to live long enough to tell the tale. But some of the cleverer observers also use it for collecting fruit from trees and fishing.

name: Excavatus Shushu
description: Useful for digging the graves of your enemies, just the site of this shovel is sometimes enough to make your enemies dig their own.

name: Victus Shell
description: Who hasn't dreamed of one day of warming the cockles of their heart? Now, with this breastplate that warms you up from the inside out, you can.

name: Victus Helmet
description: Intact, this half of a Shushu is usually used as a door stop. Then some people decided it would make a better hat.

name: Victus Epaulettes
description: It is said that the protections that adorn these shoulder have already made victims of their own. Will you be next?

name: Victus Feet
description: Ideal for gardeners, these boots are used to dig holes in the ground before planting seedlings in them.

name: Elderberry Wood
description: Elderberry Wood contains a concentrated poison deep in its bark.

name: Sylvan Wood
description: Wood you, or wood you not? This wood would make you indecisive if you weren’t careful!

name: Eterny
description: Use sparingly when cooking. It might taste delicious, but it will put hairs on your chest at a devastating rate.

name: Kamamile Flower
description: Kamamile Flowers like dry and kama-rich earths.

name: Eterny Tea
description: It is believed the goddess Eniripsa herself used this herb to make a skin cream.

name: Wealth Flower
description: This flower is often used as a symbol of wealth in high society vases.

name: Jollyflower
description: Jollyflowers are very good for you - eat some and you'll get your second wind in no time!

name: Jumbo Jollyflower
description: It's the jolly green giant of the vegetable world: the Jumbo Jollyflower!

name: Sunflower
description: This flower has long been the emblem of Vince Van Gode, who dedicated several works to it. His meeting with a wild specimen in full flower was fatal...

name: Ancestral Sunflower
description: This slightly oily sunflower does wonders for your hair and skin.

name: Double Carat Sapphire Stone
description: This intense blue gem seems to glow with a mysterious and mystical energy... unless that's just a reflection.

name: Dull Sapphire
description: This sapphire is rather dull, which means it can spend days and days on a ring or bracelet before anyone even notices it.

name: Sovereign Titanium
description: This shock-resistant metal is often used to make shields and armor.

name: Foreal Titanium
description: Once this titanium has been transformed into a weapon, it'll be able to tell its victims how life really is, for real.

name: Troutuna
description: Nature is sometimes capable of wonders. In this case, the mother fell flat on her face...

name: Hammer Shark
description: A fish that will make a perfect tool for hammering nails.

name: Hammer-Sickle Shark
description: When called common, this shark turns red with anger...

name: Stealthy Skin
description: If you're not paying attention to this skin, you might even forget it exists.

name: Steamy Skin
description: Steamy Skin is collected during a last breath. It doesn't stay on a monster very long, and vanishes in the blink of an eye.

name: Expensive Slobber
description: This slobber drools in golden strands. Light kama pigments are mixed into this slimy liquid.

name: Luxury Slobber
description: This slobber is made from 80% molten gold. It is very sought-after by women who consider it to be a luxury item.

name: Dimensional Bone
description: A strange bone from the Sram Dimension. You won't find anything similar in the World of Twelve.

name: Gray Substance
description: This substance is rather corrosive, and might be used in the creation of poisons in Srambad.

name: Orgasmik
description: Solkrupt's bones are not solid or liquid, but are made of an undescribable matter than can still be grasped for a short moment.

name: Gaping Lock
description: This Lock stands out like the nose on your face. You can't miss it.

name: Animated Shelf
description: Animated shelfs allow Enurado chests to come to life and defend the dimension from thieves.

name: Copper Gilding
description: The Gildings are carved all over the Enotrof god's dimension. They are a symbol of wealth.

name: Srambad Amulet
description: This amulet emits all its previous wearer's evil.

name: Dwarf Bulldagger Collar
description: This collar is used on young Dwarf Bulldaggers to train them as quickly as possibly. It shocks them with a jolt of electricity each time they express joy.

name: Enurado Amulet
description: "It is by wearing your luck for all to see that you can become richer than rich."

name: Onist Amulet
description: This amulet is offered to those who remain honest and generous regardless of the situation. But it is also worn by thieves who want to blend in with high society.

name: Srambad Shoulder Pads
description: The shoulder pads allow you to discreetly hit your target in the sides.

name: The Shadows of the Veiled Souls
description: Thes shoulder pads protect wandering souls from the light of day. Don't be surprised if your arms sometimes move by themselves.

name: The Shadow Eaters
description: These shoulder pads are large enough to swallow your shadow and be the only visitble thing. They're even said to swallow nearby shadows.

name: Enurado Shoulder Pads
description: "Miser's shoulders carry kamas and a deep comtempt."

name: Srambad Mask
description: The Srambad Mask lets you hide your identity, which is highly recommended in this town.

name: Solkruptian Stare
description: If you wear this mask, you'll look as empty and dark as Solkrupt. Make sure you don't lose sight of your true identity!

name: Cledus'Covered
description: He partly covers your head's damages and interest. But he doesn't cover acoustic and collateral damage, and doesn't guarantee good visibility during combat.

name: Srambad Chest Plate
description: This chest plate will constrict your chest till you cry, but the bonuses it offers are well worth the pain.

name: Orgasmik Chest Plate
description: This chest plate is made of a material extracted from Solkrupt. It devours the surface of your skin to better fuse with your skeleton and offer better protection.

name: Enurado Chest Plate
description: "He who borrows to build Kama muscles, builds to sell better."

name: Cledus'Tight
description: Triple check that you've closed and tightened your belt. If that's not the case, don't complain when your kama-laden purses are stolen.

name: Darkside Cloak
description: This cloak unveils your darkest side and protects your other side from the light.

name: Nocturnal Stealth Cloak
description: A stealthy cloak that allows you to melt into the dark, dark night.

name: Apothecloakery
description: A useful cloak with pockets for the most terrifying explosive potions and cocktails!

name: Credit Cloak
description: This cloak can be worn for as long as you like, on condition that you're happy to pay interest on it by the required due date.

name: Onist Cloak
description: This cloak makes you even more honest than you already are, and that's never a bad thing.

name: Trickree Belt
description: A famous thief, whose name we don't know, was allegedly accidentally stranged by a belt. Right before the end, he is said to have started laughing like a madman.

name: The tight shadow
description: This belt squeezes your waist so much that it shrinks it.

name: Enurado Belt
description: "Credit is only the apparent wealth of those who tighten their belts to meet their needs."

name: The Shock Absorber
description: The Schock Absorber can spread out damage over time, or can result in a premature termination of the contract, which results in the immediate loss of all means.

name: Beltinterest
description: If you don't wear this belt regularly, it will let you know about it with interest!

name: Srambad's Shadow
description: With these boots, walk with your head down in Sram's shadow!

name: Solkrupt's Shadow
description: By wearing his boots, Solkrupt will have a much harder time finding you! Well, after a few moments, he'll know that someone is following him.

name: The Agiots
description: Agiots cause damage and interest when an enemy is overdrawn, and are calculated depending on the damage plus interests.

name: String Hold
description: This ring is of Enurado design. You can use it to add an extra layer of protection to your chest, thanks to a code engraved in the Kamas that you keep hidden away from covetous gazes.

name: Expire Ring
description: From the moment you put this ring on, you're going to have to do something and it will mark the end of an important era for you.

name: Longblade Dagger
description: This dagger was allegedly forged from two longblades belonging to the god Sram, but that's just some legend invented by the blacksmith so his weapon would sell better.

name: Nataraja Dagger
description: Nataraja is one of his Eminence's favourite races. Its fours arms give it a fearsome strength and speed.

name: Starless Night Slicer
description: This blade is said to be sharper on starless and moonless nights. But it's just a rumor, as it's too dark to notice anything.

name: Falling Shadome
description: This dome-shaped shield completely covers the arm. Could it be a gravestone recycled into a defensive weapon?

name: The Laughing Scythe
description: This scythe's blade is said to look like a smile, and makes its user smile himself everytime he hits a friend or a foe!

name: Bank Card
description: Having only recently made its appearance in the World of Twelve, it is now widely in use. Now you can get Kamas out of just about anyone, without having to go to the bank.

name: The Overdrawn
description: The Overdrawn allows for debts to be settled or damage to be dealt over time.

name: Withdrawal Hand
description: The penalties caused by this hand are not always the same, depending on whether or not the withdrawal is made from an opponent other than your own.

name: Armored Strong Shield
description: No thief has ever managed to make a dent in this armor used to secure Enurado's chests.

name: Accounts Key
description: Your accounts are kept under lock and key, until you decide to come and withdraw some of your meager savings.

name: Relay Kamasword
description: This sword shows its true worth at the end of combat. It allows for attacks with a high damage output, waiting for a critical hit.

name: The Shovelone
description: This shovel is loaned out to you on the condition that you gather an immense amount of Kamas during your lifetime.

name: Srambad Bread
description: Srambad Bread is rather tasty, if you can get over the smell and look of it.

name: Farley Cake
description: This bread has a faint taste of almonds. Rich merchants are wary of it as some poisons have the same smell.

name: Shadow-Fried Meatball
description: This sweet and sour dish tasts like fat and bone.

name: Cadaverous Potion
description: This potion tastes disgusting and gives you bad breath.

name: Stockless Kamabert
description: This garbage-tasting dish is a culinary curiosity that many misers appreciate for its true value.

name: Armoured Potion
description: This potion turns you into a real tank and makes you almost immune to pain.

name: Crystal Skull
description: This item is very popular in the Trickree neighbourhood. Only the richest people in Srambad have one. Unless you manage to make a passable counterfeit.

name: Enurado Plant
description: A pretty plant attracting wealth and prosperity to the Havens.

name: Bag of Sand
description: Quite practical and useful for sealing forbidden passages, protecting your Haven Bag from unwanted visitors, or even for use as a pillow.

name: Castuc Lamp
description: A magnificent and authentic lamp cut from a magnificent and authentic Ohwymi cactus. It'll warm your heart!

name: Wagicien Cloak
description: This cloak will open the doors of all the Black Wabbit burrows to you, not that there are many of them.

name: The Spin Ache Sword
description: It is said that this sword was made of a vegetable that is renowned for giving big muscles to people who eat it.

name: Wabbitwing
description: A ring entrusted to the best traditional Cawotte juice makers.

name: The Oldixring
description: The strong and mighty Lenaldix once offered this superb ring to one of his conquests, before asking for it back to give to the next.

name: The Zumbado
description: The Zombo is covered with splinters, so it's necessary to wear these gloves if you want to dance with it successfully.

name: Loyal Guawd Talisman
description: This amulet is usually awarded to excellent Wabbit Guawds.  They must have made a mistake.

name: Emiwlet Amulet
description: This amulet is worn by the Emiw when he goes to answer nature's call. It is said to absorb bad smells.

name: Wambomulet
description: Before wearing his trademark bandana, Wambo proudly wore this amulet in public.

name: The Zwombbelt
description: A belt worn by Wo Zwombbits during puwification rituals. It's no surprise that they never became popular.

name: Infected Gweat Helm
description: This helm is said to protect against viwuses. It's not the ultimate protection, but it's better than nothing.

name: Used Wo-Boots
description: It's said that the Chief of Wobots himself wore these boots during an evening with the Wa Wabbit.

name: Wa Wabbit Shoulder Pads
description: The Wa Wabbit wore these shoulder pads when they went to war with the Lenalds.

name: Pizz'larvas
description: Knead the larva the right way. Garnish it with the best ingredients you have. Bake it in the oven for a few seconds. Voila! It's a bit sticky, but plenty tasty!

name: Basic Leather
description: This raw leather is one of your first refinements.

name: Coarse String
description: This string isn't really useful for anything, but has the advantage of being easy to put away and thus be forgotten forever.

name: Coarse Gem
description: It's possible to make a blind person believe that this gem has some value.

name: Coarse Handle
description: Is a user manual really necessary?

name: Coarse Oil
description: And you were dreaming of the sweet scent of essential oils!

name: Coarse Plate
description: Perfect for getting dumped.

name: Coarse Spice
description: They're enough to annihilate the most tasty of dishes.

name: Nutellarva Skin
description: You'll be enthusiastic about Nutellarva Skin.

name: Reincarnated Breaded Fish
description: Like yourself, Breaded Fish can be reincarnated in Astrub and become heroes of these waters.

name: Stingy Bulb
description: So stingy that this Tuberbulb only grows one by one.

name: The Protigious
description: It's amazing what you can do with just a stick

name: Immemorial Helm
description: This helmet has been a member of the elite since time immemorial.

name: Primitive Bli-Birch
description: If you believe in the end of time, this Bli-Birch can protect you for a little while longer.

name: Ashepaulettes
description: This pair of epaulettes is so old that they might turn to dust when exposed to sunlight.

name: Passing Boots
description: This is a practical pair of boots for meowandering through time.

name: Unabelting
description: This belt can keep things up forever, even your trousers.

name: Interminable Cloak
description: An ideal cloak to wear to banquets that go on and on and on.

name: Past Cloak
description: This cloak now belongs to the past.

name: Ancient Hat
description: This ancient hat is solid as a rock!

name: Armoretro
description: This breastplate is the perfect accessory for your retro look. It will have the Enutrofettes in the Amakna Bar falling at your feet.

name: Bootanics
description: With these boots on, you'll add thirty years to your age in the eyes of the local population. Which is great if you want to pass for a teenage Xelor.

name: Withered Breastplate
description: This breastplate has seen better days. There's no doubt about it, it's no longer of any use to an adventurer worthy of the name.

name: Grim Ring
description: This Grim Ring reminds us of some of our darker days.

name: Daybreak Hammer
description: So you can have a cracking start to your day!

name: Forecast Boots
description: Perfect for predicting last year's weather.

name: Scar
description: Some actions leave scars. But they're often more worthwhile than they look.

name: Memory
description: The memory of those who have passed over is important to those left behind.

name: Thoughts
description: Dark thoughts should be chased away by touching displays of affection.

name: Souvenir
description: A souvenir is the embodiment of a memory, and nobody should be able to take either of them away from you.

name: Anticip Hat
description: If you want to predict the future, it's best if you do it with class so your audience is so swept away with your smoke and mirrors that they don't notice what an idiot you are.

name: Admirable Cloak
description: Admired by all his compatriots until his assassination, your predecessor would be proud to see it on your shoulders.

name: Millennium Sword
description: This thousand-year-old sword has seen ten thousand battles and defeated a hundred thousand opponents.

name: Pheno-Stem
description: It really is phenomenal.

name: Breath of Life
description: More lively than the wind, the Breath of Life travels through time to cut the lives of the living.

name: Antique Fragment
description: These antique fragments are used to create numerous tools useful for everyday life.

name: Ancestral Cog
description: The key part for a successful instrument!

name: Age-Old Fragment
description: This fragment can be used to make the best protections from ancient times.

name: Bow Meow Paté
description: Part of this recipe was lost during Ogrest's Chaos. Since nobody knew whether the Bow Meow was supposed to be the main ingredient, or whether this dish was actually meant for them to eat, they decided to organise a big competition. The result was that, from now on, the Bow Meow would be the main ingredient.

name: Roast Crown of Piwi
description: One of the most delicate Astrubian specialities, Roast Crown of Piwi was a particular favourite at King Clustus Sheran Sharm's dinners in Bonta.

name: Fhenrat's Pizz'larva
description: Fhenrat is a distant cousin of the Sphincter Cell. He is a real pain in the neck for chefs, since he is never satisfied with the original recipes. He always wants them to leave something out or add an ingredient to the dishes they serve him. This Pizz'larva is no exception to the rule.

name: Crunchy Gobball Stew
description: Gobball Stew is one of the best known recipes in the World of Twelve. Each region has its own special take on it, and this is Amakna's version.

name: Gooey Gobball Stew
description: Gobball Stew is one of the best known recipes in the World of Twelve. Each region has its own special take on it, and this is Bonta's version.

name: Sweet and Sour Gobball Stew
description: Gobball Stew is one of the best known recipes in the World of Twelve. Each region has its own special take on it, and this is Brakmar's version.

name: Breaded Gobball Stew
description: Gobball Stew is one of the best known recipes in the World of Twelve. Each region has its own special take on it, and this is Sufokia's version.

name: Mashed Potatofu with Corn
description: Mashed Potatofu is one of the best known recipes in the World of Twelve. Each region has its own special take on it, and this is Amakna's version.

name: Sweet Mashed Potatofu
description: Mashed Potatofu is one of the best known recipes in the World of Twelve. Each region has its own special take on it, and this is Bonta's version.

name: Mashed Potatofu with Spices
description: Mashed Potatofu is one of the best known recipes in the World of Twelve. Each region has its own special take on it, and this is Brakmar's version.

name: Marinated Mashed Potatofu
description: Mashed Potatofu is one of the best known recipes in the World of Twelve. Each region has its own special take on it, and this is Sufokia's version.

name: Intemporal Dagger
description: A useful dagger for sticking it to someone from another dimension... Or simply stabbing them in the back.

name: Ordinary Hat
description: An ordinary hat worn by all Xelor disciples. Probably to hide their fake ears.

name: Shared Epaulettes
description: A pair of epaulettes "temporally" shared between all the members of a brotherhood.

name: Traditional Shoes
description: Traditional Shoes to remind us of Xelor customs.

name: Classic Belt
description: This classic hand-holder is a favourite amongst Xelor disciples.

name: Abreastplate
description: A breastplate for anyone who is abreast of future developments.

name: Perpetual Cloak
description: In perpetual evolution, this cloak will always be in fashion.

name: The Repeatable
description: Who cares about eternity when you can do the same thing over and over again.

name: The Ephemeral
description: More effective than ever, unfortunately this hand won't last forever.

name: The Syclology
description: You might think you're going round in circles, but really you're staring into the void.

name: Unstable Destroyer
description: Depending on who you ask, this weapon is either a curse or a godsend.

name: The Arrow of Time
description: This arrow, that invariably cuts through the air in the same direction, is not always the most practical tool for reaching your opponents.

name: Paradoxical Epaulettes
description: The real strength of these epaulettes lies in their delicacy.

name: Cease Sword
description: Cutting through time and space, and its opponents' faces, this Sword is one of the most effective weapons in combat.

name: Innovative Boots
description: Always ready for change, these Innovative Boots renew themselves once an eon. Well, almost.

name: Original Breastplate
description: Be original, try something new, contradiction never hurt anyone.

name: Meteorologicloak
description: Today, we will be experiencing strong winds along the western coast of the Xelorium, so don't forget to make sure your cloak's securely fastened!

name: Time-X Belt
description: More practical than a watch or a pocket watch, this belt will let you know what time it is and is accurate to the second.

name: Hattack
description: Always alert, on fire, ready to let rip.

name: Map of Wonders
description: Set off on an adventure, map in hand, and you will find wonders. Well, that's what they told you anyway!

name: Cheer Ring
description: There's nothing like reminiscing about the good old days over a drink. Cheers!

name: New Ancients' Dagger
description: A dagger to seal the self-proclamation of the New Ancients.

name: The Eternal
description: Bow down before the Eternal!

name: Robowl Feather
description: This feather shocks you when you touch it. We don't want to know how you got your hands on it!

name: Meshed Feather
description: Used in some of the softer mechanisms, the Meshed Feather adds a lighter touch to your creations.

name: Dial Hand
description: A Dial Hand is necessary to make even the most basic mechanisms.

name: Original Meal
description: A hearty dinner takes you back.

name: Anticipation Potion
description: This potion is best drunk before dangerous combats, not after them.

name: Intemporal Bread
description: This bread can regenerate you faster than you can say loaf.

name: Bolt Gruel
description: This delicious gruel was made with love by your great, great.... great, great grandma. Ok, maybe she wasn't that good.

name: Temporal Bread
description: This bread can regenerate you faster than you can say loaf.

name: Hugh Thvull's Liquor
description: More strong than effective, this liquor will put enough wind in your sails for you to come out victorious even in defeat. Especially in defeat, actually.

name: Dry Wood
description: Stephen Seagull always used this stuff when staging fights. Perhaps that's why people accuse him of being so wooden.

name: Exceptional Wood
description: This wood is exceptional in many ways. It'll leave you completely dried out.

name: Volcanic Plant
description: Once dried, its flowers can be used to create a sneezing powder which is very effective against headaches.

name: Tenebrous Plant
description: This flower's darkish color is accompanied by a heavy, lingering smell.

name: Strawberry
description: Big, sweet, juicy strawberry; its color and shape will put a smile on everyone's face.

name: Legendary Strawberry
description: These strawberries are legendary because they are very difficult to find, then to pick. The most difficult thing is managing to get home without eating them.

name: Acid Sryanure
description: Acid Sryanure is extremely corrosive and is used to rapidly oxidize a metal in order to give it that charming old feel.

name: Sryanide Ore
description: Sryanure Mineral must be carefully extracted so as not to release any poison.

name: Vandame
description: There's the ocean and there is the Vandame. This fish behaves so strangely that no one knows whether it's stupider than a Iop, or a life form of superior intelligence.

name: Jo-Chlo Vandam
description: This is a smart fish.

name: Ponometer
description: This old thing doesn't seem very useful anymore.

name: Kronos
description: His virtues endure and his charm has been unequalled since forever.

name: Pendulatus
description: A nice trophy for your personal collection.

name: Decorative Hourglass
description: A nice trophy for your personal collection.

name: Glaff
description: A staff that you can slap someone with as easily as gloves in order to provoke them.

name: Hextatic
description: This shield is really quite happy taking hits, so hold it solidly before you.

name: Maratter's Maps
description: These maps will ensure that no one ever hears you whisper "mischief managed!"

name: Muse
description: With this sword in your hands, you'll be inspired during your speeches to your companions in arms.

name: Tuppen
description: This sword fears nothing and no one; it is so fearless that you too won't give a tuppence about anything.

name: King-Breaker
description: Armed with this, you'll be able to knock all those self-proclaimed winners off their podiums.

name: Stashovel
description: This shovel will dig your enemies' tombs at breakneck speed.

name: Tar Tar Tart
description: Surprisingly good between the teeth!

name: Meatyballs
description: Golden brown and delicious, these meatballs are for sharing.

name: Orrok's Wings
description: Magnificent wings linked to the Orrok spirit. Or at least a very good imitation!

name: Corvus Esperax
description: These Epaulettes are made with all the things a fowl dreams of wearing daily.

name: Passerrok
description: This shield was blessed by the original Grand Orrok. It should guarantee you're well protected - at least from a frontal assault.

name: Orrok Shoes
description: In the mountains, you have to keep on your feet - it will help keep you from falling to your death!

name: The Orrok Spirit
description: The link the Raskaw people have with their ancestors makes all the more powerful.

name: Orrok's Headgear
description: This headgear is worn by the village chief in order to distinguish himself from his peers.

name: Grand Orrok Loincloth
description: With this loincloth, you can have the best-looking assets in the woods.

name: Raskaw Wings
description: As soon as young Raskaws reach the age of adventure, they use their wings to fly away and establish their very own encampment in the Lands of Kelba.

name: Raskaw Helmet
description: You look like you came straight out of the Kreublo.

name: Raskaw Claws
description: Don't bother trying a flying raid like you've seen the birds do - you risk leaving more than just a few feathers behind...

name: Raskaw Shoulderguards
description: These shoulderguards let you dodge regular counterattacks when attacking merchant convoys.

name: Kreublo Plumage
description: Kreublo youths generally have softer and silkier plumage than the adults. The difference is really pretty subtle though.

name: Kreublo Amulet
description: This Amulet is offered to young members of Kreublos winging their way through the Lands of Kelba to give them the courage of the Orrok.

name: Bandage of Plumage
description: A very sought after bandage, for soothing the murderous hands of young raiders.

name: Krawsh
description: The Krawsh embellishes the outfits of Kreublo youths, and really shows off their plumage too.

name: The Kreublo
description: This dagger is made of anything and everything, and can easily slip between the feathers of an intrepid Krueblo youth.

name: Lance Acrid
description: The Raskaw legend says that this lance was brought to the Lands of Kelba by the original Grand Orrok. It will reinforce your link to the sacred spirit on contact, on nights where the full moon is partly hidden by clouds.

name: Korbotmulet
description: The bits and pieces can be used by any Kraw.

name: K-Boot
description: These boots were part of Kabrok's first prototypes.

name: Korbotaulettes
description: These epaulettes are made of a metal that was worked extensively in order to give it that rusted copper look.

name: Kyrvod Bandage
description: This bandage is more solid than the makeshift one and considerably reduces the appearance of scar tissue for severe wounds.

name: Orrok's Ossicle
description: Drawing bones is a bit of a passion among the Raskaw people. Drawing an Orrok's Ossicle is always considered a very good omen.

name: Steel Beak Amulet
description: This amulet is highly sought-after by all the high-level adventurers, and you've got it. They'll be so jealous!

name: Steel Beak Ring
description: Be sure to wear this ring on whatever finger(s) you may use to perform your favorite hand gestures - those on the receiving end will surely appreciate it!

name: Steel Beak Boots
description: Thanks to these boots, you'll even be able to go straight up a vertical cliff!

name: Steel Beak Cape
description: They say this cape is one of the most chic capes. They're obviously not taking into account the itchiness caused by the feathers...

name: Steel Beak Helm
description: This fantastic helmet is likely one of the rarest that you'll ever obtain. You must be dreaming.

name: Steel Beak Belt
description: This will help to protect you from particularly vicious blows.

name: Steel Beak Epaulettes
description: If you haven't got a good head on your shoulders, it's best to have good armor on them.

name: Steel Beak Breastplate
description: This Breastplate can take even the roughest blows - that oughtta make you a bit more confident in the arena.

name: Steel Beak Sword
description: Recovering the Steel Beak Sword is an accomplishment few adventurers have managed!

name: Cute Corset
description: This belt was stolen from the Dragon Pig while he slept. Now his gut hangs pendulously, and he's furious!

name: Soul Brother
description: After taking this ring from the Soft Oak, it seems that this group of Riktus came across someone stronger than them!

name: Soul Sister
description: Stolen from Vampyro's Castle, this ring will make all the Ghouls tremble! Pretty ghoul, eh?

name: Riktus Cape
description: Only the most seasoned Riktus have the right to wear this cape. But that doesn't stop everyone from doing it.

name: Epaulettes of Lord Cuhkol
description: All the rage in the Wild Estate!

name: Dora Borette
description: Using only the most dubious ingredients, you've managed to give the old Dora a new look. However, to call it successful might be exaggerating.

name: Dora Lagoole
description: With a slightly more charming appearance, you'll have the birds all aflutter. Classy, no?

name: Dora Marron
description: You found this in Steel Beak's loot, but you're not quite sure what to do with it...

name: Dora N.I.O.
description: The N.I.O. is a committee which meets every Sunday evening in the depths of the Astrub Sewers. No one knows what the acronym stands for, because the members of the committee, who were big insect lovers, took the secret to their graves after confusing their favorite treat, the Phix, with the fatal Bhug! It looks good on you though, and that's what matters.

name: Steel Beak Feather
description: The Steel Beak Feather will make sure you always have a bit of fluff!

name: Raskaw Crobeak Fricassee
description: An outdated term, crobeak is the beak of a crobak, an ingredient in this traditional Raskaw dish. It starts with large pieces of crobak and various mysterious spices - and each Krobelle has their own personal secret recipe. It's passed from mother to daughter and improved over generations.

name: Putribits
description: Don't keep it in your bag too long, or you'll find yourself covered in a nauseating and unshakable stench.

name: Vampiric Gene
description: This gene was discovered quite recently. Apparently, it transforms villagers into something other than Ghouls, and is used for some rather morbid experiments.

name: Mask of Dread
description: Your fear shall be forever written upon your face.

name: Pawstein
description: Once you tie them on, these giant paws will follow you anywhere you go.

name: Zoogey Fur
description: Brushed against the fur and sporting a magnificent bushy tail, this fur will make the fashionistas happy.

name: Amicalands
description: Resting gently on your shoulders, the hands serve as a big comfort when you're taking risks.

name: Funerary Vest
description: A vest with a plunging neckline, guaranteed to look stunning on your newly reanimated corpse.

name: Sizeable Scarf
description: Very popular with our non-living friends, these rags allow for some pretty fluid movements, depending on the rigidity of the body in question.

name: Fairy Fingers
description: When you think about it, it's almost as if you're holding hands with the unfortunate former owner of these fingers.

name: Kiki Fur
description: This rather unattractive fur was ripped off with much fuss and hard work.

name: Epaulenstein
description: One of Victoria-Franka's first experiments, using a clavicle and a scapula, which didn't quite turn out.

name: Mama Z Boots
description: Comfortable boots for old painful feet.

name: Kiki Shackle
description: Experiments work best when the subject is well restrained! And the team survives.

name: Kiki's Chain
description: The purpose these chains serve is more decorative than functional.

name: Kiki Hair Shawl
description: This shawl really keeps you warm in the summer - and cold in the winter.

name: Shildodeth
description: She came in through the bathroom window, protected by a Shildodeth...

name: Porichette
description: This sword, created from unidentifiable bones is decorated with the forearm of a decrepit Borbat.

name: Disembowler
description: Quite handy for dealing with the undead.

name: Pocket Chopper
description: Even though it's heavy and a bit too thick for your pockets, this dagger is indispensable when it comes to cutting through bone.

name: Demandibler
description: This weapon is used to take apart Madame Enstein's experimental victims. Mostly it's used for "detail work".

name: Kanniball Cloak
description: They say that Kanniballs have eyes in the back of their heads. You'll understand why when you see this cape!

name: Kanniball Mask
description: Try not to break this, but if you do, you can always patch it together with masking tape.

name: Kanniballettes
description: These epaulettes look great on the dance floor of the Kanniballroom!

name: Kanniball Bracelet
description: This bracelet provides substantial support when shaking hands with someone really vigorously.

name: Shiver Ring
description: The Shiver Ring was found on a stranded sailor after his old schooner was shipwrecked. He was found muttering something about "timbers" and "shiver", which is how the ring got its name.

name: Talisman Djaro
description: This Talisman was created in honor of the highest—and only—mountain on Moon Island.

name: Kyper Belt
description: Long worn by the grouchiest Kanniball in the village, it now belongs to the grumpiest adventurer.

name: Kanniball Shoes
description: As they are accustomed to walking barefoot, the Kanniball to whom these shoes belonged will not notice they're missing until winter.

name: Jinnun Tunic
description: Just what you need when relaxing on the beach at sunset.

name: Tropical Shirt
description: With this shirt, temperatures will rise, but it won't get hotter, if you know what I mean!

name: Tropical Epaulettes
description: Wearing these is the best way of avoiding sunburnt shoulders.

name: Tropical Belt
description: Perfect for basking in the sun. However, dancing in it is not recommended because it barely covers anything!

name: Koko Beanie
description: If only you'd realized earlier that you could fashion a useful hat from a Kokonut tree to protect your eyes from the sun, you would never have got lost on this wretched island in the first place.

name: Tropicape
description: You could be forgiven for thinking this cape was made from a Koko leaf, but it's not true... Honestly, trust me!

name: Despairdrilles
description: Sporting these sandals will give your enemies a sense of dread.

name: Porte-bouquet
description: You can attach these tiny vases to Kokolerics as pretty ornaments for their Full Moon Parties. Just fill with amber Curaçao. Do not fill with water!

name: Troprickly Ring
description: This ring isn't very powerful, but it's so full of splinters that no one will steal it off you.

name: Tropicalei
description: Every bold adventurer needs a flower garland around your neck and a cocktail in your hand from time to time.

name: Planty Plastron
description: This amusingly named breastplate is surprisingly strong considering it's made from nothing but plant matter.

name: Possessed Epaulettes
description: This nice pair of floral-themed shoulder guards are perfect for island strolls, or brutal fights with monsters.

name: Tinker Belt
description: Biggs Tinker was a popular adventurer who explored many caves around the World of Twelve. He disappeared on a mission to Moon Island.

name: Golden Cap
description: Decorated with gold pieces found in the depths of Moon Island, some use this hat and its shiny bits to blind their enemies. No, it doesn't work in caves.

name: Kannivore Cape
description: This cape is not very comfortable to wear, but has the advantage of making sure others respect your personal space.

name: Kannivore Boots
description: Made from the fibers of Kannivore leaves, these boots are non-slip and non-vegan.

name: Tree Ring
description: This ring is hundreds of years old. Unfortunately no one can tell how old without a microscope.

name: Kannivore Ring
description: Wearing this ring for longer than a year will result in the loss of the finger wearing it. This could be beneficial if you're in an unhappy marriage!

name: Kannivore Talisman
description: The cord holding this talisman can sometimes tighten around the wearer's neck, ultimately causing a loss of consciousness.

name: Dark Carbon
description: This carbon is very hard to see in the dark, even if you're using a lantern.

name: Amber
description: If it weren't for "amber nectar," we'd have to call beer a "brownish-yellow fermented liquid."

name: Prehistoric Amber
description: Oh look, an ancient Moskito trapped in some prehistoric amber. I wonder if we could extract some DNA...

name: Kokonut Wood
description: Kokonut palms are great for their Kokonuts, but the supple and robust planks it also provides are very useful too.

name: Kokos Nucifera
description: This Kokonut tree wood comes from the original Kokos Nucifera, the most majestic of them all. It is prized by artisans for its exceptional qualities.

name: Divi Divi Wood
description: This wood has unique fibers, used for making leather. It's also useful as a temporary shelter as-is; no work required.

name: Divi Up Wood
description: This wood is perfect for sharing between friends.

name: Knemo
description: Can you let me go? I'd really like to swim in peace! The ocean not big enough for you, that it? You have a problem, little one? What's wrong with you? You wanna fight? Oh, yeah, I'm real impressed!

name: Clown-Knemo
description: All right, I know one joke. Um, there's a Master Mussel, see? And he walks up to a sea, well he doesn't walk up, he swims up. Well, actually the mollusk isn't moving. He's in one place and then the Kralove, well they... I mixed up. There was a Darth Mussel and a Zordfish. None of them were walking, so forget that...

name: Dwarf Caiman
description: It may only be a dwarf species, but catching a caiman is still a feat to brag about!

name: Tick-Tock Caiman
description: After catching this Caiman, you thought you saw a pirate ship in the distance, chasing this strange Tick-Tock sound you can hear.

name: Palm
description: You were so close to winning the Palm d'Or. But you'll just have to be happy with this item, which will help you move faster in the water.

name: Golden Palm
description: Yep! You're the winner! A huge bravo!

name: Bitter Maniok
description: This tuberous root cannot be eaten as is. It needs to be dried and processed, or made into flour, before it can be used.

name: Sweet Maniok
description: This Maniok is sweet and can be eaten as-is. To eat it as a vegetable, it is best to peel and boil it first.

name: Tahitiare Flower
description: Sweet-smelling, but not so sweet if you're not careful wearing these flowers.

name: Tahitiare of the Winds
description: A symbol of your self-worth, love seems to float through the air, thanks to the Winds.

name: Day Lily
description: This Day Lily will make you feel as fresh as a Lily.

name: Night Star
description: This flower looks stunning at night, which is a shame because no one can see it in the dark.

name: Tropikoko Bark
description: This bark was from a common Tropikoko. It holds no special value.

name: Traumatized Tropikoko Nut
description: This Tropikoko Nut has been traumatized so many times that the hatred it harbors inside makes it extremely powerful.

name: Tropikoko Leaf
description: If ever you're caught as nature intended, you could try to use of these to hide your modesty. Although it really depends on how immodest you're being.

name: Koko Nutt Essence
description: You've always wanted to get to know the real Koko the Nutt, now you can.

name: Kanniball Staff
description: If you vigorously shake this staff, it will start giving off sparks and eventually explode. The unfortunate Kutcher Endoff once went running with it still attached to his belt...

name: Cracked Mask
description: You hit a bit too hard. This mask is cracked and wearing it would be worse than not wearing it.

name: Kanniball Hairs
description: You must have got these from a pair of hairy Kanniballs.

name: Black Monkey Hairs
description: These hairs are rough and cold to the touch. It's hard to believe they belonged to anything living.

name: Koko Rico's Strongarm Lance
description: Once revered as the greatest lance ever, its performance has since proven to be artificially enhanced.

name: Gengas Kin's Blowpipe
description: Gengas Kin's favorite pastime to is to shoot darts into his enemies' behinds with this Blowpipe.

name: Nutt Cape
description: You always wanted to be a superhero; well, now you can be Nuttman with this cape.

name: Round-the-Chest Nutt
description: For some reason, this belt is worn higher than most the more common Round-the-Waist Nutt

name: Nutte Covering
description: Cover your nut with this Nutte Covering.

name: Gauntnutts
description: If you want to challenge someone to a game of beach volleyball, simply throw these down.

name: Beach Bandage
description: You need to protect your hands when playing Moon-volleyball because the ball is just a Kokonut!

name: Koka Collar
description: A refreshing and sparkling amulet for hot, humid days.

name: Thorny Epaulettes
description: Careful when you handle these, you don't want to feel a prick.

name: Thing Thongs
description: These are perfect for thinging round the fire on the thand at thunthet.

name: Kokorset
description: This plastron fights very snugly, perhaps too much so, but it really improves the figure!

name: Capellooni
description: This cape is made of long strands of fiber, which are surprisingly tasty.

name: Looni Lid
description: Once used in schools for naughty children to wear in the corner of the classroom, it was discovered that this head covering was very useful in combat.

name: Kevlooni Vest
description: The maker of this garment claimed it could stop a bullet. No one has yet dared to test the claim. Would you?

name: Gauntloonies
description: These are some crazy-looking gloves.

name: Fortified Fist
description: You can always know how old this tree ring is.

name: Black Talisman
description: Ah look, it matches the color of your heart!

name: Kanniveyor Belt
description: Can be used for transporting items when not round one's waist.

name: Sabatontons
description: Perfect for dancing to the beat of the drum...

name: Reinforced Shoulderguards
description: With these, no one will want to go shoulder to shoulder with you.

name: Chopping Maul
description: A very useful tool, it has everything you need.

name: Wind Shield
description: This will help to keep inclement weather off you.

name: Kokutlass
description: Just the tool you need for lopping the tops off Kokonuts, or any other type of nut.

name: Sinuous Dagger
description: Careful not to sit on this one.

name: Nomad Cape
description: Combining practicality and a respect for tradition, this Veil has been used by Nomads for centuries.

name: Smolder Pads
description: As well as useful protection during combat, these epaulettes heat up in the sun and provide extra energy.

name: Nomad Max
description: A distinctive symbol that allows angry nomads to identify themselves.

name: Ring Utan
description: It is said that this ring once belonged to a reddish-brown monkey. However, first of all, we all know that only Moogrrs can be this color, and secondly, you don't care because you have it now.

name: Kokoncord
description: This belt is now out of production, but was once the fastest commercial belt available.

name: Ti Tunic
description: They say this chestpiece is unsinkable.

name: Ferocious Boots
description: There are some terrifying dangers in the jungle. But it's also muddy, and these boots will at least protect you from that.

name: Ferocious Fangs
description: No one knows how a Sabredon tooth necklace ended up on Moon Island. But it's impressive nonetheless!

name: Ovapow Ring
description: The one ring to rule them all. No, honestly!

name: Epaupeyes
description: These epaulettes will make your muscles seem huge, with an emphasis on "seem."

name: St'ki Mask
description: You really don't want to know where this mask got its name.

name: Lily Hammer
description: You can start a new life with this hammer.

name: Sitton Defense
description: The perfect shield for when you're deciding which side to fight for.

name: Fright Saber
description: Said to have been the preferred weapon of a certain Old Ben Kokonobi.

name: Soul Dagger
description: This dagger is soul crushing.

name: Suxxors on the Beach
description: A confusing drink, it promises so much but ultimately fails to deliver.

name: Squirmish Grawn Chowder
description: Almost a main course, but not quite, it will make you more resistant, but not very.

name: Hy Bread
description: A delicious mix of grains!

name: Voracious Fiber
description: This fiber is both sticky and toxic to Moskitos. Perfect for driving them off in damp and aggressive areas.

name: Kannivore Root
description: Usually used for Kanniball decoctions, these roots help to channel your inner warrior.

name: Ay Sap
description: It's best to use this sticky substance as soon as possible.

name: Cataplasm
description: This sticky, slimy stuff could save your life. Don't judge yuck by its cover!

name: Voracious Cape
description: With this cape, you can gobble up your enemies and spit them back out again.

name: Voracious Boots
description: Perfect for going off the eaten track.

name: Voracious Charm
description: Originally worn by a Kanniball with his head in the clouds, we now know why he never returned to the village.

name: Voracious Protection
description: This won't attract your crush but the vibrant colors of this breastplate can act as a fly catcher.

name: Devower Ring
