name: Ponktius Torso
description: This breastplate will cover your torso and make you sweat unimaginably. Then you can collect the sweat and slake your thirst.

name: Ponktius Belt
description: This belt keeps your body balanced for a perfect stab, every time.

name: Epoinkettes
description: Just be careful not to pop yourself in the eye with one, otherwise you'll miss out on all the beautiful desert vistas.

name: Epoinkettes
description: Just be careful not to pop yourself in the eye with one, otherwise you'll miss out on all the beautiful desert vistas.

name: Chop-Chop
description: In order to keep all their limbs, your enemies will rush to get out of your sight, chop chop!

description: This breastplate you got from the Castucs will keep your skin cool and help you survive the desert.

name: Cactaegis
description: This breastplate you got from the Castucs will keep your skin cool and help you survive the desert.

name: Initiate Breastplate
description: It is impossible to love and to be wise.

name: Initiate Breastplate
description: It is impossible to love and to be wise.

name: The Ripper
description: It'll rip out your teeth before you can blink!

name: The Ripper
description: It'll rip out your teeth before you can blink!

name: Initiate Amulet
description: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

name: Poinkpoink Shield
description: When you're carrying this shield, people will want to keep their distance. Rare indeed is he who enjoys getting stabbed by sharp spines.

name: Poinkpoink Boots
description: Comfortable on the inside, spiky on the outside.

name: Mecha-Stake
description: You may wonder what use anyone could have for this stake, retrieved from the abdomen of Sylargh's creations.

name: Tropickle Cactus
description: It's pickled!

name: Well-Guawded Cape
description: This cape will, without a doubt, assure your safety.

name: Wambomulet
description: Before wearing his trademark bandana, Wambo proudly wore this amulet in public.

name: Smisse Pirate Cloak
description: You, wait! What area do you come from?

name: Smisse Pirate Cloak
description: You, wait! What area do you come from?

name: Smisse Pirate Bandana
description: It'll allow you to rob banks unnoticed.

name: Smisse Pirate Bandana
description: It'll allow you to rob banks unnoticed.

name: Smisse Pirate Boots
description: There's nothing better than taking flight in style.

name: Smisse Pirate Boots
description: There's nothing better than taking flight in style.

name: Smisse Pirate Smock
description: Padded with kamas, this coat will keep you warm all winter!

name: Smisse Pirate Smock
description: Padded with kamas, this coat will keep you warm all winter!

name: Cold Hunter Boots
description: These will give you the necessary self-confidence to face the monsters of Frigost.

name: Cold Hunter Boots
description: These will give you the necessary self-confidence to face the monsters of Frigost.

name: Cold Hunter Helmet
description: The must-have kit for winter adventurers!

name: Cold Hunter Helmet
description: The must-have kit for winter adventurers!

name: Flavored Truffle
description: It improves your dishes.

name: Rose of the Sands
description: Beauty can even be found in the middle of the desert.

name: Spiny Aloa Vera
description: Whether as a juice or in a salad, this delicate plant is known for its therapeutic virtues.

name: Hermit Scincus
description: Before being fished, he was buried deep in the sand, meditating, far from everything.

name: Count Harebourg's Shield
description: This was actually designed to bear Count Harebourg's Clock Hand, but it turned out to be extremely effective against attacks.

name: Count Harebourg's Clock Hand
description: Count Harebourg could use this to tell time with pinpoint accuracy.

name: Icy Ring
description: It's difficult for your fingers not to freeze off while wearing this ring.

name: Winter Coat
description: This thick coat won't let the cold through. It's prized by Frigostian hunters for exactly that reason.

name: White Crow Wings
description: Fly into the face of danger with these wings. As angelic as they might seem, they're devilishly uncomfortable!

name: White Crow Belt
description: A very trendy belt, ideal for clubbing. Thanks to its high visibility, this belt can be spotted from a distance, even when it's pitch black.

name: White Crow Breastplate
description: A very rare item made of white crow feathers. The only way to get those is to kill a Black Crow... It's said that they turn white when they die.

name: White Crow Hackle
description: A soft, comfortable, floaty, three-ply, feathery neck-dress. Just what you need to wipe enemies out!

name: Black Crow's Sword
description: A beautifully-decorated black sword that only the hardest of the World's warriors can control.

name: Black Crow's Ring
description: The best way to keep track of a bird is to ring it!

name: Black Crow's Helmet
description: Don't forget to unfasten the leather straps that hold this helmet to your head…. It might be a bit difficult to take off otherwise!

name: Black Crow's Epaulettes
description: Become the master of darkness and fear your own strength!

name: Black Crow's Boots
description: These boots are in impeccable condition. It's not surprising for someone who did most of his traveling by air!

name: Black Crow's Cloak
description: A needle, some thread and a few feathers taken from a decomposing Crobak... and now you have one of the most fashionable capes in the World of Twelve!

name: Magmog Cloak
description: The only known way to obtain this cloak is to give Magmog a cold and then whisk it off of his back at the most opportune moment.

name: Magmog Clinkers
description: These hot coals will teach all those friends who use you as a shoulder to cry on a lesson.

name: Magmog Feet
description: It's always easier to walk across lava with someone else's feet on. These have the added benefit of looking grood... I mean good. And great. Great and good.

name: Magmog Halo
description: As the famous enraged Iop once cried out: Halo? What?! he's never even played it!

name: Gray Mage's Wand
description: This wand bears an almighty flame. It used to belong to a powerful mage and got terribly broken during an epic fight with a Gobbalrog.

name: The Mogmatic
description: With this on your arm, you can be sure of one thing... They shall not pass!

name: Gobbalrog Helmet
description: An incandescent helmet that is very good at keeping your ears warm during those chilly winters.

name: Gobbalrog Cloak
description: A cloak that'll keep you warm, even when it's hanging on the coat rack downstairs.

name: Gobbalrog Boots
description: These Gobbalrog Boots will allow you to give a good boot to any flaming Gobbowl Ball coming your way.

name: Gobbalrog Belt
description: With this belt, you're sure to be full of beans! Not suitable for those with sensitive skin. Beware of backfire.

name: Gobbalrog Breastplate
description: As if the summer sun wasn't enough, here's a breastplate which aspires to be a radiator.

name: Dragon Pig Winglets
description: You're too porky to actually leave the ground, but they look good on you!

name: Dragon Pig Helmet
description: Wrap this rindy hat around your head and you'll be the BIG PIG around town!

name: Dragon Pig Trotters
description: Some lovely pork knuckles to serve up on a bed of salad.

name: Dragon Pig Breastplate
description: You'll feel safe and sound in this breastplate, whose chinks and cracks have been plugged up with cubes of ham.

name: Dragon Pig Bandage
description: Now you can bandage up your fists for all those sweaty, porcine battles!

name: Dragon Pig Beads
description: Letting you have this necklace kind of feels like casting pearls before swine.

name: Larduous Hat
description: Hamhead!

name: Larduous Epaulettes
description: Now you have giants standing on your shoulders, dwarf.

name: Larduous Breastplate
description: Twist one of the wings on this thing and it'll tune you into Live 'n' Lardy FM, the only radio station that will have you snorting with laughter all day long.

name: Larduous Boots
description: I'm walking on bacon... Woooaaah!

name: Victus Helmet
description: Intact, this half of a Shushu is usually used as a door stop. Then some people decided it would make a better hat.

name: Victus Feet
description: Ideal for gardeners, these boots are used to dig holes in the ground before planting seedlings in them.

name: Victus Shell
description: Who hasn't dreamed of one day of warming the cockles of their heart? Now, with this breastplate that warms you up from the inside out, you can.

name: Victus Shell
description: Who hasn't dreamed of one day of warming the cockles of their heart? Now, with this breastplate that warms you up from the inside out, you can.

name: Tormented Epaulettes
description: Being deeply tormented by someone gives you strength, while tormenting someone deeply gives you courage.

name: Tormented Epaulettes
description: Being deeply tormented by someone gives you strength, while tormenting someone deeply gives you courage.

name: Tormented Breastplate
description: Don't worry, this breastplate only provokes constant worrying in 74.999% of cases. Go ahead - put it on.

name: Victus Epaulettes
description: It is said that the protections that adorn these shoulder have already made victims of their own. Will you be next?

name: Victus Epaulettes
description: It is said that the protections that adorn these shoulder have already made victims of their own. Will you be next?

name: Tormented Boots
description: Each torment can be known by the cry that follows it. Your boots, though, are silent as the crypt.

name: Tormented Cape
description: Wearing this cape isn't a sign of any great torment, but rather a multitude of little worries.

name: Tormented Helmet
description: My spirit is tormented by my lust for power... said nobody, ever.

name: Tormented Belt
description: A stomach ache beats eternal torment any day.

name: Ocushu Link
description: Strengthening the ties can only help you do more evil.

name: Ocushu Spikes
description: Driven deeply into the skin, these spikes cause an incredible pain that isn't entirely disagreeable...

name: Ocushu Torso
description: You feel as if a legion of gazes are watching you and staring into your soul.

name: Ocushu Vision
description: The first and last thing your enemies will see before they pass on.

name: Ocushu Vision
description: The first and last thing your enemies will see before they pass on.

name: Tuft of Boohemoth Hairs
description: You had to make terrible sacrifices to get this small tuft of hairs.

name: Whispered Cloak
description: Sheathe your body in a spine-tingling whisper.

name: Whispered Cloak
description: Sheathe your body in a spine-tingling whisper.

name: Whispered Helmet
description: This headgear will have you turning in circles trying to figure out who's whispering your name.

name: Whispered Helmet
description: This headgear will have you turning in circles trying to figure out who's whispering your name.

name: Whispered Belt
description: If nobody else will whisper sweet nothings to you, at least your belt will.

name: Whispered Belt
description: If nobody else will whisper sweet nothings to you, at least your belt will.

name: Whispered Breastplate
description: This breastplate has absorbed gallons of whispers over the years. Why not just let it have a rest in your inventory now?

name: Whispered Hand
description: This hand has been trained to jab people in sensitive areas.

name: Whispered Hand
description: This hand has been trained to jab people in sensitive areas.

name: Whispered Lance
description: Whisperers' lances always find their targets. It's said that their owners whisper them detailed directions before they go into battle.

name: Rampart Boots
description: Be inapproachable. Rampart Boots.

name: Rampart Boots
description: Be inapproachable. Rampart Boots.

name: Rampart Belt
description: Protects against: cannonballs. Does not protect against: groin strains.

name: Rampart Belt
description: Protects against: cannonballs. Does not protect against: groin strains.

name: Rampart Cloak
description: With this cape on, arrows in the back will bounce straight off again.

name: Rampart Cloak
description: With this cape on, arrows in the back will bounce straight off again.

name: Rampart Epaulettes
description: Charge your enemies with these on and they'll feel like they've just been run over by a truck. On the other hand, they take so much effort to wear that so will you.

name: Rocky Fist
description: The expression 'under the thumb' takes on a new dimension when the thumb in question belongs to a Whispered Crackler.

name: Rocky Fist
description: The expression 'under the thumb' takes on a new dimension when the thumb in question belongs to a Whispered Crackler.

name: Whispery Hand
description: Apparently this hand has picked hundreds of locks without ever saying a word.

name: Rampart Amulet
description: It protects the body and mind with a single look.

name: Ringapult
description: It'll drive your enemies ballistic!

name: Crackwhip Bow
description: The Cracklers tried their hand at writing by carving a few incomprehensible words on this bow: Although this bow poor...

name: Whispered Standard
description: A versatile adventurer like you can make heads roll with any old piece of junk, flags included.

name: Assassin #1337's Daggers
description: These legendary daggers belonged to an assassin who never revealed his name. His only distinguishing feature was a tattoo of the number 1337, visible on his neck where his black cat-suit finished.

name: Bastile Helmet
description: One piece of clothing that should always go down a storm.

name: Whispered Ring
description: The best ring by a whisper.

name: Whispered Amulet
description: This pendant echoes with the wispy whispers of lingering Whisperers.

name: Fhenris's Frozen Fang
description:
Hear his footfalls in the snow,
His fangs freeze the blood,
Lone Boohemoth is coming.

name: White-Paw Epaulettes
description: You'll be able to melt away into the snow, but you won't make the snow melt.

name: Boohemoth Boots
description: Just show a white paw as proof of good faith to enter the fold!

name: Boohemoth Boots
description: Just show a white paw as proof of good faith to enter the fold!

name: Boohemoth Headgear
description: From afar, you could almost be mistaken for a Boohemoth lost in the icy wasteland of Frigost!

name: Boohemoth Headgear
description: From afar, you could almost be mistaken for a Boohemoth lost in the icy wasteland of Frigost!

name: Boohemoth Epaulettes
description: One of the most popular hunting trophies with our friends the hunters.

name: Boohemoth Epaulettes
description: One of the most popular hunting trophies with our friends the hunters.

name: Boohemoth Cloak
description: Warm, soft and hairy, what could be better when it's raining cats and dogs?

name: Frozen Bulwark
description: This shield's toughness is inversely proportional to the temperature outside. The colder it gets, the tougher it becomes.

name: Frozen Bulwark
description: This shield's toughness is inversely proportional to the temperature outside. The colder it gets, the tougher it becomes.

name: Boohmulet
description: This amulet can be used to light a fire. Just scrape a small Taroudium-coated match along the pendant.

name: Boohemoth Ring
description: If you get cold feet, just give your friend a ring.

name: Hemoh Boots
description: The footprints left by these boots call to mind the traces left by a winged creature.

name: YeCh'Ti'Wawa's Belt
description: This belt can be used as a leash, which is no reason to use it as a necklace.

name: YeCh'Ti'Wawa Epaulettes
description: Don't be fooled by their appearance; these epaulettes definitely come from the YeCh'Ti'Wawa. Even though they could cover his entire body if he ever wore them.

name: Capittle Cloak
description: It's the most powerful cloak in the nation, and you're giving it a piggyback. A classic example of 'I scratch your back, you scratch mine.'

name: Wa Claws
description: The Wawa in Wawa falls mainly on the Wawa. As people say around here.

name: Wigemoth
description: You see, nothing else could possibly keep your bald head warmer!

name: Beach Floats
description: Even if you're in a trance, you won't go under! Practical, aren't they? Practical, no?

name: Beach Floats
description: Even if you're in a trance, you won't go under! Practical, aren't they? Practical, no?

name: Beach Towel
description: With this towel on, there's no need to fear getting thrown on your back on the hot sand.

name: Beach Towel
description: With this towel on, there's no need to fear getting thrown on your back on the hot sand.

name: Beach Sandals
description: You know that summer's finally here when you feel the sand between your toes.

name: Beach Sandals
description: You know that summer's finally here when you feel the sand between your toes.

name: Beach Hat
description: Protects from Yoovie rays and boogie nights.

name: Floating Noodle
description: This tube of gelatinous foam is very useful for learning to swim.

name: Floating Noodle
description: This tube of gelatinous foam is very useful for learning to swim.

name: Emergency Buoy
description: Oh buoy... What did I tell you? Only pull the cord in an emergency... or a particularly sticky encounter!

name: Beach Cards
description: Your buddies will be so impressed by the beautiful design on these cards that they won't even notice you swiping their chips.

name: Tanked Top
description: This cool summer tank top will allow you to show off your biceps while beating on people who make inappropriate jokes. Party on, dudes!

name: Swollen Amulet
description: Your head has swollen up pretty bad ever since you started wearing the same amulet as the Bilby Queen. Will she ever forgive you for biting her style?

name: Blow-Up Shorts
description: These shorts will keep a respectable distance between you and your partner on the dancefloor.

name: Inflatable Sword
description: The great thing about this sword is that it'll fit in your pocket to be whipped out at the first sign of danger. Too bad it takes at least a minute to inflate...

name: Swimsuit
description: All the cool kids are wearing them... Honest!

name: Lemon Jelly Amulet
description: When life gives you Lemon Jellies, make a Lemon Jelly Amulet!

name: Lemon Jelly Amulet
description: When life gives you Lemon Jellies, make a Lemon Jelly Amulet!

name: Strawberry Jelly Headgear
description: You feel like a little goldfish in a bowl with no water.

name: Strawberry Jelly Headgear
description: You feel like a little goldfish in a bowl with no water.

name: Mint Jelly Breastplate
description: With minty freshness like this on it all day, your torso will be a better kisser than you!

name: Mint Jelly Breastplate
description: With minty freshness like this on it all day, your torso will be a better kisser than you!

name: Blue Raspberry Jelly Bubboots
description: These boots bubble and squeak all over the place. It's surprisingly comforting!

name: Cocktail Straw
description: This oversized straw still contains drops of week-old cocktail, meaning it splatters your enemies with sticky unpleasantness as well as doing them physical harm.

name: Cocktail Straw
description: This oversized straw still contains drops of week-old cocktail, meaning it splatters your enemies with sticky unpleasantness as well as doing them physical harm.

name: Blueberry
description: Blue is totally your color!

name: Toothpick
description: There's no better way to get a Jelly out of your grill.

name: Lemon Aid
description: To leave enemies with a sour taste in their mouth.

name: Royal Gumboots
description: These boots used to be thigh-high, but the previous owner got the munchies...

name: Royal Smoothettes
description: Soft, squelchy, and full of fun, Smoothettes are the best way to put a little bounce back in your life!

name: Royal Stirrer
description: Cocktails are better shaken, not stirred, but since when did you know anything about good taste?

name: Jelt
description: This social outcast of a belt decided to try to become cool by imitating the Gelano. Now, you too can try to be cool by pretending your Gelano fits around your waist.

name: Jelt
description: This social outcast of a belt decided to try to become cool by imitating the Gelano. Now, you too can try to be cool by pretending your Gelano fits around your waist.

name: Jelly Ring
description: Jam this on your thumb. At least then you'll have an excuse for sucking it all the time.

name: Royal Jelly Ring
description: Sure, it'll slip through your fingers in no time, but you should be honored that you're even allowed to hold it!

name: Polished Taroudium
description: It replies when you say hello to it, and has excellent manners! This Taroudium is very smooth.

name: Whisp
description: You have to listen very carefully to hear what this thing has to say.

name: Frogistified Wood
description: You've got your hands on some wood that's so frozen it's stuck to you.

name: Brrrbli Septum Ring
description: A souvenir from the time when Brrrblis hadn't yet freed themselves from their state as livestock.

name: Trool Hair
description: It smells. A lot.

name: Tetrool
description: Don't ask where it came from; just slather it with garlic butter and swallow it whole. Mmmmm!

name: Trool Karne
description: You found this between two incisors after a hard-fought altercation with El Pochito.

name: Sacred Hood
description: The monks might not tell you this but it's very useful for taking a snooze during sermons.

name: Sacred Hood
description: The monks might not tell you this but it's very useful for taking a snooze during sermons.

name: Sacred Slippers
description: These slippers soothe tired feet and pre-emptively treat verrucas. Looks like they've got their work cut out with you.

name: Sacred Slippers
description: These slippers soothe tired feet and pre-emptively treat verrucas. Looks like they've got their work cut out with you.

name: Sacred Tunic
description: This tunic, which is often worn during religious ceremonies, suits men as well as women.

name: Sacred Tunic
description: This tunic, which is often worn during religious ceremonies, suits men as well as women.

name: Sacred Ring
description: It's possible that this ring has still got some saliva on it. Apparently, it's customary in the monastery for people to kiss one another's rings as a way of saying hello.

name: The Parish
description: Instantly absolves the sins of your enemies.

name: The Parish
description: Instantly absolves the sins of your enemies.

name: Sacred Scepter
description: Give someone your blessing by bashing them on the head.

name: Brush
description: You'll sort your enemies out in one clear sweep with this brush.

name: French Maid Helmet
description: This should come in handy in all sorts of situations!

name: Nun Cloak
description: The temperature drops with this icy veil over your shoulders.

name: Wimple
description: Holy moly! Sister, you are looking goooood!

name: Iron Cross
description: Cross your heart (but don't hope to die!).

name: Clergyman Sword
description: This sword looks like it might cause almighty pain but it unites the clergymen all the same.

name: Monk Hammer
description: This hammer can be used to ring church bells, or the heads of your enemies.

name: Effigy Cards
description: These cards are highly regarded by the monks that collect them in the monastery.

name: Twofut
description: So you can always set off on the right fut.

name: Twofut
description: So you can always set off on the right fut.

name: Breastfut
description: This ultra-tight breastplate will give you super-hero abs!

name: Breastfut
description: This ultra-tight breastplate will give you super-hero abs!

name: Neckfut
description: In Forfut Village, lucky Wodent feet won't get you anywhere! Try one of these 100% organic Borbat-fiber amulets instead.

name: Neckfut
description: In Forfut Village, lucky Wodent feet won't get you anywhere! Try one of these 100% organic Borbat-fiber amulets instead.

name: Headfut
description: It might mess you around a bit, but it's made of genuine vampiric Borbat leather!

name: Waistfut
description: If you thought gaining a few inches around the middle was bad, try a whole fut!

name: Waistfut
description: If you thought gaining a few inches around the middle was bad, try a whole fut!

name: Dead Ringer
description: This ring was found in a cemetery and exudes an aura that will make your blood run cold.

name: Rock Bottoms
description: Just the clumps for when you're down in the dumps.

name: Vampiric Wand
description: At twilight, you can use this wand to fork your enemies' eyes out. By the time the new moon appears, they'll be doing it of their own accord.

name: Shadofang Ring
description: Watch out! This ring might suck up more than just your soul!

name: Vampyro's Boots
description: The first step to fame is some trusty boots to kick butt with.

name: Vampyric Epaulettes
description: Instead of going for the neck, these epaulettes suck blood from the shoulders.

name: Vampyric Breastplate
description:
It's normal to feel exhausted after wearing this breastplate...
It sucks the life right out of you.

name: Ragplate
description: Although this breastplate is in tatters, it's still reasonably useful.

name: Vampyro's Belt
description: It almost looks as though this belt is sticking its tongue out to taunt you.

name: Hammer of Death
description: They say that this hammer can kill dead people a second time over.

name: Zoogey Fur
description: Brushed against the fur and sporting a magnificent bushy tail, this fur will make the fashionistas happy.

name: Zoogey Fur
description: Brushed against the fur and sporting a magnificent bushy tail, this fur will make the fashionistas happy.

name: Amicalands
description: Resting gently on your shoulders, the hands serve as a big comfort when you're taking risks.

name: Amicalands
description: Resting gently on your shoulders, the hands serve as a big comfort when you're taking risks.

name: Mask of Dread
description: Your fear shall be forever written upon your face.

name: Mask of Dread
description: Your fear shall be forever written upon your face.

name: Pawstein
description: Once you tie them on, these giant paws will follow you anywhere you go.

name: Disembowler
description: Quite handy for dealing with the undead.

name: Disembowler
description: Quite handy for dealing with the undead.

name: Porichette
description: This sword, created from unidentifiable bones is decorated with the forearm of a decrepit Borbat.

name: Pocket Chopper
description: Even though it's heavy and a bit too thick for your pockets, this dagger is indispensable when it comes to cutting through bone.

name: Fairy Fingers
description: When you think about it, it's almost as if you're holding hands with the unfortunate former owner of these fingers.

name: Kiki's Chain
description: The purpose these chains serve is more decorative than functional.

name: Kiki Hair Shawl
description: This shawl really keeps you warm in the summer - and cold in the winter.

name: Demandibler
description: This weapon is used to take apart Madame Enstein's experimental victims. Mostly it's used for "detail work".

name: Kiki Shackle
description: Experiments work best when the subject is well restrained! And the team survives.

name: Sizeable Scarf
description: Very popular with our non-living friends, these rags allow for some pretty fluid movements, depending on the rigidity of the body in question.

name: Funerary Vest
description: A vest with a plunging neckline, guaranteed to look stunning on your newly reanimated corpse.

name: Epaulenstein
description: One of Victoria-Franka's first experiments, using a clavicle and a scapula, which didn't quite turn out.

name: Trool Boots
description: Let's hope these boots are as solid as they are smelly...

name: Trool Boots
description: Let's hope these boots are as solid as they are smelly...

name: Beltrool
description: Trool slayers normally wear their belts as a trophy. Well, the biggest ones do.

name: Beltrool
description: Trool slayers normally wear their belts as a trophy. Well, the biggest ones do.

name: Trool Scalp
description: With this scalp on your head, you're going to have so much fun! You might even manage to seduce a female Trool...

name: Trool Scalp
description: With this scalp on your head, you're going to have so much fun! You might even manage to seduce a female Trool...

name: Trool Finery
description: This cloak looked elegant on the Trool it came from, but it just makes you look like a deformed Bwork.

name: Beltolier
description: This belt used to be used to store snacks for those anxious moments.

name: Beltolier
description: This belt used to be used to store snacks for those anxious moments.

name: Trool Mace
description: As heavy as an adult Trool's leg, this mace should get you sweating if nothing else.

name: Troolish Shoulderguards
description: Troolish Shoulderguards are designed for use in battles of attrition. There's no need to wear them all day, every day, unless you see life as a constant battle.

name: Imperial Trool Breastplate
description: Victory is born of effort.

name: El Pochito Ring
description: This ring belonged to the Trool Academy champion.

name: El Pochito Mask
description: This mask belonged to the Trool Academy champion.

name: El Pochito Shield
description: With great resistance comes great density. This shield weighs half a Trool, so it'll only protect you if you're really strong already.

name: El Pochito Dagger
description: The Trool Academy champion kept this dagger as a lucky charm. When he became popular, the market was suddenly flooded with cheap rip-offs.

name: Apprentice Breastplate
description: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.

name: Apprentice Cape
description: Patience is the companion of wisdom.

name: Sand Hoppers
description: These boots will have you hopping along the beach like a Jelly!

name: Sand Hoppers
description: These boots will have you hopping along the beach like a Jelly!

name: Sand Cloak
description: Lie on your front on the beach: it's an adventurer sand-wich!

name: Sand Cloak
description: Lie on your front on the beach: it's an adventurer sand-wich!

name: Sand Breastplate
description: This is the one for you... Don't think we haven't seen you making six-packs and womanly curves out of sand on the beach!

name: Sand Breastplate
description: This is the one for you... Don't think we haven't seen you making six-packs and womanly curves out of sand on the beach!

name: Sand Ring
description: This ring is made of sand. A great reason to stop washing your hands.

name: Sand Helmet
description: You could win the sandcastle competition in this any day!

name: Sand Helmet
description: You could win the sandcastle competition in this any day!

name: Beach Paddle
description: For playing "who can spear the ball first" by the water's edge.

name: Rose of the Sands
description: This delicate rose is made of a subtle blend of sand and urine. Suits you.

name: Body Board
description: Despite being a favorite with Mitch Loosecannon, this board is made of foam and won't protect you from anything more than blowing sand.

name: Oyster Belt
description: This belt has room for you to store your important documents, as long as you don't mind them getting all salty and wet.

name: Shell'f Defence
description: This shield would have made a great palette for budding painters - if only it didn't let in so much water.

name: Beach Mask
description: Now you can swim safely in even the deepest waters (as long as you stay near the top).

name: Apprentice Belt
description: A man cannot learn wisdom by surrounding himself with ignorance.

name: Apprentice Helm
description: "Wisdom is not wisdom when it is derived from books alone."

name: Apprentice Amulet
description: Wisdom comes with experience, which you still lack.

name: Raging Hornbeam Wood
description: One look at this wood and you'll be dying to touch it for yourself.

name: Lenald Rice
description: It seems a Lenald came by here…

name: Dried Funkus
description: This mushroom was already quite pungent; once dried, it's literally stifling.

name: Dendron Odilon
description: With this model specimen, you can surely produce the best canvases of your generation.

name: Uiouqes Wood
description: Its difficulty in spelling its own name have already caused it quite a lot of trouble.

name: Why Rye
description: Why not?

name: Bulrush Reed
description: This is a very effective combustible, so make sure you always have some on you when venturing: you never know when you'll need a fire.

name: Shiny Zinc
description: It has a unique shine that gives it all its charm.

name: Crobak Ring
description: You'll be able to make the feathers fly with this ring!

name: Crobak Ring
description: You'll be able to make the feathers fly with this ring!

name: Crobelt
description: This belt is supposed to improve back trouble. Or is that the other way round? You won't know until you try it on!

name: Crobelt
description: This belt is supposed to improve back trouble. Or is that the other way round? You won't know until you try it on!

name: Croboots
description: These Croboots emit a Crow squawk with every step you take. You can make the enemy flee just by warning them of your imminent arrival.

name: Croboots
description: These Croboots emit a Crow squawk with every step you take. You can make the enemy flee just by warning them of your imminent arrival.

name: Crobak Breastplate
description: A feathery thing that you can take great pleasure in showing off in the most squalid tavern in town.

name: Crobak Amulet
description: Wearing this amulet is a bit like having a great big bird around your neck, which is why it won't really protect you from baddies.

name: Crobak Amulet
description: Wearing this amulet is a bit like having a great big bird around your neck, which is why it won't really protect you from baddies.

name: Featherypaulettes
description: These epaulettes are so feathery they'll almost make you gaga!

name: Crobak Monocle
description: They say that this monocle allows you to see everything with a bird's-eye view. Here's hoping the bird in question wasn't short-sighted!

name: Bluestar Shield
description: Use this shield to defend yourself and you'll leave your adversaries seeing stars!

name: Korbotaulettes
description: These epaulettes are made of a metal that was worked extensively in order to give it that rusted copper look.

name: Korbotmulet
description: The bits and pieces can be used by any Kraw.

name: K-Boot
description: These boots were part of Kabrok's first prototypes.

name: Bluestar Sword
description: A whack from this sword will hit your enemies like a bolt from the blue.

name: Starry Hat
description: It's like having your head in the clouds… except that... it's in the...  stars…

name: Starry Boots
description: You're sure to be happy with these boots. They're covered in blue stars and foot the bill perfectly for walking on air!

name: Raskaw Claws
description: Don't bother trying a flying raid like you've seen the birds do - you risk leaving more than just a few feathers behind...

name: Raskaw Claws
description: Don't bother trying a flying raid like you've seen the birds do - you risk leaving more than just a few feathers behind...

name: Raskaw Shoulderguards
description: These shoulderguards let you dodge regular counterattacks when attacking merchant convoys.

name: Raskaw Shoulderguards
description: These shoulderguards let you dodge regular counterattacks when attacking merchant convoys.

name: Raskaw Wings
description: As soon as young Raskaws reach the age of adventure, they use their wings to fly away and establish their very own encampment in the Lands of Kelba.

name: Raskaw Wings
description: As soon as young Raskaws reach the age of adventure, they use their wings to fly away and establish their very own encampment in the Lands of Kelba.

name: Raskaw Helmet
description: You look like you came straight out of the Kreublo.

name: Bandage of Plumage
description: A very sought after bandage, for soothing the murderous hands of young raiders.

name: Bandage of Plumage
description: A very sought after bandage, for soothing the murderous hands of young raiders.

name: The Kreublo
description: This dagger is made of anything and everything, and can easily slip between the feathers of an intrepid Krueblo youth.

name: Krawsh
description: The Krawsh embellishes the outfits of Kreublo youths, and really shows off their plumage too.

name: Lance Acrid
description: The Raskaw legend says that this lance was brought to the Lands of Kelba by the original Grand Orrok. It will reinforce your link to the sacred spirit on contact, on nights where the full moon is partly hidden by clouds.

name: Orrok's Headgear
description: This headgear is worn by the village chief in order to distinguish himself from his peers.

name: Grand Orrok Loincloth
description: With this loincloth, you can have the best-looking assets in the woods.

name: Orrok Shoes
description: In the mountains, you have to keep on your feet - it will help keep you from falling to your death!

name: Kreublo Plumage
description: Kreublo youths generally have softer and silkier plumage than the adults. The difference is really pretty subtle though.

name: Kreublo Amulet
description: This Amulet is offered to young members of Kreublos winging their way through the Lands of Kelba to give them the courage of the Orrok.

name: The Orrok Spirit
description: The link the Raskaw people have with their ancestors makes all the more powerful.

name: Orrok's Wings
description: Magnificent wings linked to the Orrok spirit. Or at least a very good imitation!

name: Rat Collara
description: This dirty necklace might just give you some nasty diseases. Don't get pooped out!

name: Rat Collara
description: This dirty necklace might just give you some nasty diseases. Don't get pooped out!

name: Hairy Rat Ring
description: Watch where you put that finger! Oops, too late…

name: Hairy Rat Ring
description: Watch where you put that finger! Oops, too late…

name: Hairy Rat Belt
description: Smell a rat…? Oh…

name: Hairy Rat Belt
description: Smell a rat…? Oh…

name: Hairy Rat Headband
description: You look like you just crawled out of a sewer, you know.

name: The Ratpatch
description: This breastplate was cobbled together using patches of fabric and armor from all the members of the Rat family.

name: The Ratpatch
description: This breastplate was cobbled together using patches of fabric and armor from all the members of the Rat family.

name: Hairy Rat Tail
description: Now you know why those Ecaflips were licking their lips when you walked past them a moment ago.

name: Rough Splinter Wand
description: Apparently this wand's last owner dropped it because he didn't have any fingers left.

name: Belly Clencher
description: The instructions on the packet say that, if you hit your enemy in just the right spot, some of his body parts will pop right out! But where...? Now, that's the question.

name: Ratical Cloak
description: Whip this cloak round to the front and you can use it as a bib. To be honest, the smell coming off it is making you drool already...

name: Ratical Headgear
description: This rat may be stuffed, but the halitosis it suffered in life has become stronger than ever in death. When you're walking around town, you part crowds without even trying!

name: Ratical Ring
description: This ring used to belong to Ratical's mother. Apparently, whoever's wearing it is the life and soul of the party!

name: Ratty Riot Shield
description: This shield is made up of all the body parts that were left over after one of Ratical's riotous parties. If you can bear to carry it, you probably don't realize that's what it's made of.

name: Ratical Ring
description: Oh, don't worry, it's not a worm! It's just a hairless, creepy, squidgy rat tail. Watch out for splinters!

name: Ratto Rake
description: When Lady Gardenmore invented this tool for gathering dead leaves into piles, Sir Slayalday couldn't wait to borrow it to do the same thing with enemies' corpses. Each to their own.

name: Rattagain Amulet
description: This amulet's goal is to keep you on the straight and narrow... Although, judging by the direction you've taken so far, I'm not sure going straight on is ideal...

name: Boowish Boots
description: These boots give you the strange sensation of walking on your opponents' remains. At night, especially, they make some very unnerving sounds.

name: Boowish Boots
description: These boots give you the strange sensation of walking on your opponents' remains. At night, especially, they make some very unnerving sounds.

name: Boowish Belt
description: The hairs on this very soft belt become strangely clingy when the sun goes down.

name: Boowish Belt
description: The hairs on this very soft belt become strangely clingy when the sun goes down.

name: Boowish Hat
description: Boowolves fall pray to countless little nocturnal parasites. Thanks to this hat, you too can benefit from the extra waking hours they add to your day.

name: Boowish Hat
description: Boowolves fall pray to countless little nocturnal parasites. Thanks to this hat, you too can benefit from the extra waking hours they add to your day.

name: Boowish Epaulettes
description: What could be more reassuring than having two enormous Boowolf paws on your shoulders? Though have you noticed how the claws always feel like they're getting longer at night…?

name: Fangulet
description: Careful with this amulet. It might just bite you in the middle of the night.

name: Fangulet
description: Careful with this amulet. It might just bite you in the middle of the night.

name: The Hulfmoun
description: This shield has been weatherproofed using Boowolf hairs. It's not as efficient as the mythical Foolmoun, but it provides pretty good protection against droplets.

name: Boowolf Breastplate
description: Since this breastplate arrived on the market, a new fighting technique has been seen on the battlefield. It's known as 'tufting.'

name: Boowolf String
description: Yes, Boowolwes also wear Strings, so what? Everyone is entitled to their share of femininity!

name: Lunaring
description:
They say he's got the whole World in his hands, but it looks like you've got the moon! 
Well, a bit of it, at least.

name: Lunar Boots
description: All the kids LOVE these boots - they're the kind that light up with every step you take. We know, we know, you used to have a pair…

name: Lunar Cloak
description: Unfortunately it won't fly you to the moon, nor let you play among the stars.

name: Noke's Talisman
description: This lucky amulet will protect you from those uneasy midnight encounters.

name: Noke's Mask
description:
This mask can be pretty terrifying
if worn in the forestand will really bring out your wild side.

name: Brutal Tiara
description: Not for brutes.

name: Arachneean Cloak
description:
The label reads "Gentle, even when rubbed the wrong way."
A characteristic you often don't find with adventurers, unfortunately.

name: Arachneean Cloak
description:
The label reads "Gentle, even when rubbed the wrong way."
A characteristic you often don't find with adventurers, unfortunately.

name: Fluo Ring
description: Once you've put this ring on, it's highly recommended that you take it off again. You have been warned...

name: Fluo Ring
description: Once you've put this ring on, it's highly recommended that you take it off again. You have been warned...

name: The Phosphorescent
description: This belt can also be used as a hi-vis band to make your Dragoturkey visible to other path users on dark nights.

name: The Phosphorescent
description: This belt can also be used as a hi-vis band to make your Dragoturkey visible to other path users on dark nights.

name: Arachneean Breastplate
description: Your eyes are bigger than your belly.

name: Arachneean Boots
description: Hairy inside and out.

name: Arachneean Boots
description: Hairy inside and out.

name: Arachneean Headgear
description: If you can't have an extra set of eyes on your back, you can at least have them on your head.

name: Nu-Clear Cudgel
description: Whatever numbskull takes this cudgel in the face is likely to sprout a third eye on a stalk. Choose your targets well.

name: The Supernova
description: When used, this wand releases pretty sparks in all different colors. It's not very good for the planet, but it's so cute!

name: Black Widow Boots
description: The Black Widow has tons of these boots to spare, which is just as well, because Rogue magazine says they're in this season!

name: Black Widow Cloak
description: This cloak was woven thread by thread by the meticulous Black Widow herself. A Catapulted Crackler would have no chance against it, so I don't know why you're so quick to put it on your back.

name: Black Widow Ring
description: I suppose she doesn't need it any more, now she's a widow.

name: The Toxispike
description: The Black Widow bamboozled an Arachnee Embroiderer and nabbed one of its hands for her own dastardly designs.

name: Zizotopes
description: Boots with a built-in rhythm system to make sure you step to the beat! That part in the pantomime might be yours at last!

name: Phosphorescent Clasp
description: From above, you look like a radioactive toadstool!

name: Phosphorescent Amulet
description: This amulet may look like an Al Howin's Treat, but that's no reason to eat it.

name: Bwork Harvester
description: Death to Bworks!

name: Bwork Self-Portrait
description: What talent…

name: Seeping Bwork Boots
description: You've always wanted to walk a mile in a Bwork's shoes, but you didn't think of the half-inch of scum and sweat that would be left behind... Squelch! but you didn't think of the half-inch of scum and sweat that would be left behind... Squelch! Urgh!

name: Seeping Bwork Boots
description: You've always wanted to walk a mile in a Bwork's shoes, but you didn't think of the half-inch of scum and sweat that would be left behind... Squelch! but you didn't think of the half-inch of scum and sweat that would be left behind... Squelch! Urgh!

name: Brown Bwork Cape
description: It's said that the leather used in making this cape was tanned using the secretions of a Wild Gobball. This is only a rumor though. The truth is far worse.

name: Brown Bwork Cape
description: It's said that the leather used in making this cape was tanned using the secretions of a Wild Gobball. This is only a rumor though. The truth is far worse.

name: Greasy Bwork Helmet
description: Some say the Bworks never take their armor off and never wash it. They never wash themselves either, for that matter.

name: Greasy Bwork Helmet
description: Some say the Bworks never take their armor off and never wash it. They never wash themselves either, for that matter.

name: Patched Bwork Breastplate
description: Despite the primitive craftsmanship, this breastplate seems pretty solid. It would be perfect for combat, were it not for the odor of Bwork wafting from literally every surface.

name: Bwork Sword
description: Simple and effective, this blade is designed more to crush than cut. The only thing that makes you doubt its combat-worthiness is the sticky handle...

name: Bwork Sword
description: Simple and effective, this blade is designed more to crush than cut. The only thing that makes you doubt its combat-worthiness is the sticky handle...

name: Bwork Shield
description: You've turned it this way and that, and still cannot understand how they got the iron around the wooden center. Unless they somehow inserted the wooden center into the iron? You may never know...

name: Bworcine Pedalian Cincture
description: Don't be fooled by the highfalutin name. It's said this "cincture" is actually the repurposed toe ring of what must be the biggest Bwork in history. As we all know, as the dimensions of a Bwork increase by a factor of n, Bwork surface area increases by n squared. Much more skin to catch the sun. At the same time, Bwork volumetric mass increases by n cubed. Much, much more fat to soak up the sun and insulate. Which all amounts to a really fat, really sweaty Bwork with a really sweaty toe ring. Lots.

name: Immaculate Bwork Amulet
description: This Bwork amulet is fairly disturbing. Other than the delicateness which it was created with compared to normal Bwork products, it's its cleanliness which is most shocking! Oh! But of course. The cord is much too short to go around the head and ears of a Bwork.

name: Thork Epaulettes
description: Solid, simple, effective. Thork likes massive epaulettes. That way, he looks like he's more than just a Bwork.

name: Thork Amulet
description: Thork's only apparently useless accessory, the amulet is made of the beard of an ancient Bwork named Nad'Lug. In actuality, it's really powerful.

name: Thork Boots
description: The spikes on Thork's boots had always impressed his fellow Bwork Explorers. It's plain to see they've been used to kick a few butts...

name: The Watch
description: Now that you have the Watch, time is in your hands! You can be as late as you like!

name: Yamato's Rope
description: Yamato's Rope has made more than one monster's heart beat a little faster. A finely tuned weapon, it can direct arrows to even the most well-hidden targets.

name: Cape Huccino
description: This cape was made with just one goal in mind: It had to be able to keep its owner awake for a few days running.

name: Wild Gobball Epaulettes
description: Now, the weight of the wool is on your shoulders. Ancient Gobball Hunter proverb

name: Wild Gobball Epaulettes
description: Now, the weight of the wool is on your shoulders. Ancient Gobball Hunter proverb

name: Wild Gobball Ring
description: This ring will wear your fingers to the bone.

name: Wild Gobball Ring
description: This ring will wear your fingers to the bone.

name: Wild Gobball Helmet
description: One thing is certain: if you come across a Bow Meow, it will curl up for a nice nap in your warm headgear.

name: Wild Gobball Helmet
description: One thing is certain: if you come across a Bow Meow, it will curl up for a nice nap in your warm headgear.

name: Wild Gobball Breastplate
description: It's been said that with this breastplate, you could stroll around Frigost almost completely naked. Note the word "survive" was not mentioned.

name: Hammer of Savagery
description: With this hammer you have one and only one desire: smash, smash and SMASH!

name: Hammer of Savagery
description: With this hammer you have one and only one desire: smash, smash and SMASH!

name: Wild Belt
description: This belt is as warm as it is odorous.

name: Staff of Great Wisdom
description: The wise man admits he knows nothing. He also doesn't mess with someone wielding this staff.

name: Abrasive Cape
description: When you're not wearing this cape, you can use it as a very effective scouring pad.

name: Great Wild Gobball Ring
description: Although it's a real Wild Gobball bone, its magic virtues remain to be proven.

name: Great Wild Gobball Boots
description: The wilder the Great Gobball was, the more getting kicked in the butt with these boots will hurt.

name: Feesy's Bow
description: Can shoot odoriferous and, frankly, disgusting arrows.

name: Sharpened Claymore
description: This enormous sword is efficient at turning even the largest enemies into hamburger meat. Just make sure you don't do that swishy figure-of-eight thing to celebrate - your teammates will thank you.

name: Daudgee
description: The Daudgee is made from Ouginak remains and various other refuse. Worn by Gourlo the Terrible for a long time, the Daudgee is the image of desolation.

name: Aristocrab Staff
description: This staff was made with the upper classes in mind. Equip it and you'll feel like a nobleman, even in the middle of a bloody battle.

name: Backagens
description: What do you mean, you saw them just yesterday? They've been dead for twenty yeeeaaars…!

name: Tauxik Hammer
description: When this hammer hits the ground, a nauseating stench fills the vicinity. It's in your best interest to learn how to fight from a distance, and fast!

name: Whining Willow Wood
description: It streams tears whenever you deprive it of dessert.

name: Spectacular Oats
description: They can be found in all of Amakna's auditoriums.

name: Mattress Fern
description: Even during an adventure, you can find the comfort of a warm night at the inn thanks to this fern leaf, which is incredibly soft an cozy!

name: Hissing Nostril Algae
description: There's a legend about mermaids who sing in the ocean at night. Actually, it's algae hissing when lit up by the moonlight.

name: Flammable Flint
description: Be careful, because if you rub two twigs together, this thing'll light up like a torch.

name: Smoked Quartz
description: It'll help you get through any difficult moment.

name: Hairy Ray Volution
description: Vive la revolution!

name: Dirty Salamon
description: Although this fish is fresh from the water, you now desire nothing more than to throw it back in there.

name: Kapow Ring
description:
"One ring, biff kapow. Two rings, biff bang kablooey!"
Nostralanus - Thoughts

name: Kapow Ring
description:
"One ring, biff kapow. Two rings, biff bang kablooey!"
Nostralanus - Thoughts

name: Kapow Belt
description: This belt does everything. Well, almost. Kapow sock whack!

name: Kapow Belt
description: This belt does everything. Well, almost. Kapow sock whack!

name: Kapow Breastplate
description: A lightly perfumed breastplate which is wonderfully attractive to hungry Gobballs in the area.

name: Kapow Breastplate
description: A lightly perfumed breastplate which is wonderfully attractive to hungry Gobballs in the area.

name: Kapow Helmet
description: This helmet is as light as a feather. All you have to do is wait for the wind to get up to turn your dreams of flying into reality... Crash Bang Wallop *stars*... Maybe not.

name: Kapow Thongs
description: Hitting with your bare hands is overrated. Awkkkkkk ooooff cr-r-a-a-ck clunk-eth.

name: Kapow Thongs
description: Hitting with your bare hands is overrated. Awkkkkkk ooooff cr-r-a-a-ck clunk-eth.

name: The Country
description: Aaaah! You've finally decided to let him slip his ring over your finger!

name: Bouttes
description: Your feet will always feel fresh and moist in these!

name: Vegetaring
description: In case of emergency, use the oil given off by this ring to fry your enemies!

name: Carnivore Amulet
description: With this amulet around your neck you're bound to get more than a few glances from hungry eyes.

name: Carnivore Epaulettes
description: As tender as Gobball steak.

name: Carnivore Breastplate
description: A gutsy breastplate if ever I saw one!

name: Alpha Predator Amulet
description: Never put this amulet in direct contact with your skin.

name: Alpha Predator Belt
description: For once, if you hear gurgling, it's probably not coming from your stomach.

name: Alpha Predator Cloak
description: I'd tell you that this cloak is said to provide the perfect camouflage, but you appear to have disappeared. Never mind!

name: Leafy Ring
description: This ring is made of several leaf fibers.

name: Brambelt
description: It looks like it was nicked while it was asleep in the woods.

name: Crackly Ring
description: This ring is absolutely cracking, dahling.

name: Crackly Ring
description: This ring is absolutely cracking, dahling.

name: Crackly Boots
description: Go on, have a crack at walking in these!

name: Crackly Boots
description: Go on, have a crack at walking in these!

name: Crackly Helmet
description: This helmet might look pretty beat-up but there's some life in it yet.

name: Crackly Helmet
description: This helmet might look pretty beat-up but there's some life in it yet.

name: Crackly Epaulettes
description: Make sure you don't crack under the strain of these epaulettes.

name: Crackler Blade
description: This blade may not be sharp, but it certainly smarts!

name: Crackler Blade
description: This blade may not be sharp, but it certainly smarts!

name: Roc Hammer
description: This hammer hits hard, if you can pick it up.

name: The Party Bloc
description: The only breastplate that will make you want to bop your head - and your enemies' heads!

name: Cracka Smile
description: This ring is said to confer a mystical smile-cracking power on its wearer. Looking at it, though, perhaps it's not so mystical after all.

name: Stone Cold Boots
description: These boots have been readily available ever since they were banned from Gobbowl tournaments. Apparently they weren't hardcore enough.

name: Stone Cold Cloak
description: A bad cloak for running the 100 kameters in. A good cloak for blending into your surroundings in the Holey Forest!

name: Stone Cold Helmet
description: If you've ever seen a Crackrock performing the ancient fight move known as a headbutt, you'll know that you're better off inside this helmet than out.

name: Hellmut
description: Looks like someone came last in the spelling bee... All the same, nobody would ever say it to your face, not when you look this scary.

name: Split Breastplate
description: Don't worry, it'll last for years yet.

name: Steam Shovel
description: Great for digging up large stones and little Crackrocks.

name: Conquered Raziel
description: The flood seems to have been hugely beneficial to this blessed sword, which has drawn a new and vengeful power from the water.

name: Relentless Birch Wood
description: As in wood from a Birch tree, not a rod used for punishment. Then again, why not?…

name: Magic Cawwot
description: This Cawwot is magical: it attracts all of the Wabbits in the area.

name: Chillberg Island Babbage
description: Contrary to what its name may imply, this doesn't actually come from Chillberg Island.

name: Three-Leaf Clover
description: Although it is extremely rare, you have difficulty understanding why.

name: Delicate Orchid
description: Its finesse could even sweeten a Taur.

name: Darkness Cobalt
description: This cobalt thinks no one can understand it. Just like other cobalts.

name: Consolatory Bronze
description: You only came third. That allows you a place on the podium, but public renown is still quite far off…

name: Grawnella
description: This is the subtle blend of the ocean's proteins and the medicinal properties of Hazelnutella.

name: Dull Loote
description: You could stare at this Loote for hours and still not find anything interesting about it.

name: Milkar Fangs
description: These fangs are just what you need to complete your Moowolf Al Howin's outfit… Just remember to take them off if you're kissing your sweetheart.

name: Milkar Fur
description: With one of these ferocious specimens on your front and one on your back, you'll look like... well, a beast with two backs.

name: Milkar Finery
description: This cloak has a beastly smell that risks causing undesirable secondary effects that will send you howling to the moon.

name: Milkar Mitts
description: An accessory made for scratching hard-to-get-to places - just what you needed! A word of advice, though: with claws like that, you shouldn't use it anywhere... sensitive.

name: Hurdy Girdle
description: The little bells that adorn this belt jingle so violently that they make it impossible to sneak up on anyone. Look, it was either style or surprise. You can't have both!

name: Demented Club
description: One blow of this club is enough to decapitate a Trool. The question is, are you strong enough to pick it up?

name: Moowolf Signet Ring
description: It'll sink its fangs into your finger!

name: Moowolf Bell
description: Now you can attack your enemies with bells on!

name: Moowolf Headgear
description: Stand tall and proud in this headgear!

name: Excarnus's Crystal
description: This piece of jewelry was used to link Excarnus's soul to Gobbsage's ethereal body. A powerful artifact in the hands of an Excarnate… Do you really think you're capable of using its power?

name: Excarnus Hooves
description: As Gasper the friendly host once pointed out, these boots give you all sorts of airs and graces.

name: Moowolf Finery
description: A well-earned hunting trophy!

name: Excarnus Fleece
description: This breastplate's curly virility is counteracted by the ectoplasmic gloop all over it. Talk about ruining the mood.

name: Excarnus Veil
description: A transparent veil which enables excarnates to become invisible. Many a man is pushing up daisies after trying too hard to obtain this precious item.

name: Old-School Shovel
description: This shovel is useful for unearthing all kinds of bits and pieces.

name: The Maimer
description: And yes, it really hurts!

name: Gobbsage Cape
description: This incredibly thick coat will keep you… incredibly warm!

name: Gobbsage Epaulettes
description: If you see someone charging towards you wearing these epaulettes, then for Eca's sake run as fast as you can in the other direction!

name: Gobbsage Helmet
description: This impressively-built helmet will cause adventurers to come flocking around you like Gobblies. Oh, wait...

name: Gobbsage String
description: This amulet is a fine souvenir of your battle with Gobbsage.

name: Gobbsage Breastplate
description: Don't be fooled by the softness of the wool, this breastplate will cut rocks like butter. It doesn't guarantee the safety of its wearer, however.

name: Zombo
description: It moves us with its underground beats and gets us our exercise. Given its irregular curves, it's only beneficial for the one carrying it.

name: The Zumbado
description: The Zombo is covered with splinters, so it's necessary to wear these gloves if you want to dance with it successfully.

name: Arachnee Silk
description: Arachnee Silk is so sticky that you can use it to repair any broken item. You'll just have to unstick it from your fingers first...

name: Rancid
description: It stinks, it's rotten, and it's disgusting, but at least it's useful.

name: Spinal Column
description: The spinal column makes a pleasant sound when you shake it. Even better, Bow Wows and Bow Meows love to chew on it!

name: Motor Oil
description: Careful: If you drop some on your clothes, you'll never get the stain out!

name: Amulet of Howlieng Wind
description: The Amulet of Howlieng Wind produces impressive energy in the presence of ambient winds and vapors. It is said that the power of its rotation is so strong that a curious Puddly could end up being scattered to the four corners of the World of Twelve if it came too close.

name: Water of Life
description: Life could be a lot nicer out in the desert.

name: Luminous Mucus
description: What made you decide to collect the gooey stuff left behind by the Blackspores? It's because it was shiny, huh?

name: Ignemikhal Claws
description: These scorching-hot claws recall the blazing infernos created by their owner. Ignemikhal can be violent at times, and his fury now takes hold of you.

name: Ignemikhal Claws
description: These scorching-hot claws recall the blazing infernos created by their owner. Ignemikhal can be violent at times, and his fury now takes hold of you.

name: Aguabrial Scales
description: The original wearer of these scales was once charmed by Dathura. You'll experience the owner's calm even as you imagine the raging tempests he can unleash.

name: Aguabrial Scales
description: The original wearer of these scales was once charmed by Dathura. You'll experience the owner's calm even as you imagine the raging tempests he can unleash.

name: Dardondakal Fang
description: Dardondakal loves to play in the space between wisdom and jest. You now have one of its claws - all you're missing is its whiskers.

name: Dardondakal Fang
description: Dardondakal loves to play in the space between wisdom and jest. You now have one of its claws - all you're missing is its whiskers.

name: Terrakourial's Paws
description: A bittersweet melancholy takes hold of you when you put on these boots. Terrakourial seems to have lived a long life, filled with regrets that can still be felt.

name: Terrakourial's Paws
description: A bittersweet melancholy takes hold of you when you put on these boots. Terrakourial seems to have lived a long life, filled with regrets that can still be felt.

name: Aerafal’s Wings
description: These graceful wings embody the dignity of Aerafal, master of the skies. Those who wear them project a haughty air.

name: Aerafal’s Wings
description: These graceful wings embody the dignity of Aerafal, master of the skies. Those who wear them project a haughty air.

name: Grougalorasalar Skull
description: A strange torment seems to emanate from this helmet. Grougalorasalar is a dragon that is as impulsive as it is complex. None can predict what this skull will do for you.

name: Grougalorasalar Skull
description: A strange torment seems to emanate from this helmet. Grougalorasalar is a dragon that is as impulsive as it is complex. None can predict what this skull will do for you.

name: Forgotten Epaulettes
description: Many men will rest their heads on these epaulettes… to cry. There have been many defeats at the hands of Ogrest, and the Ogre certainly has no monopoly on tears.

name: Forgotten Epaulettes
description: Many men will rest their heads on these epaulettes… to cry. There have been many defeats at the hands of Ogrest, and the Ogre certainly has no monopoly on tears.

name: Forgotten Breastplate
description: One day, a lonely hero sought to face Ogrest one-on-one. He came, he saw, he scampered away topless.

name: Forgotten Breastplate
description: One day, a lonely hero sought to face Ogrest one-on-one. He came, he saw, he scampered away topless.

name: Forgotten Ring
description: Once you put it on, forget about doing anything else with your hand. You'll be better off putting this ring on an enemy's finger.

name: Forgotten Ring
description: Once you put it on, forget about doing anything else with your hand. You'll be better off putting this ring on an enemy's finger.

name: Forgotten Navigator's Ring
description: This artifact from an ancient navigator always points towards whatever the wearer desires most.

name: Forgotten Navigator's Ring
description: This artifact from an ancient navigator always points towards whatever the wearer desires most.

name: Forgotten Amulet
description: The truth is, this amulet won't bring you good luck. But it does have a certain effect when you place it around your neck.

name: Forgotten Amulet
description: The truth is, this amulet won't bring you good luck. But it does have a certain effect when you place it around your neck.

name: Forgotten Boots
description: These boots might be forgettable if it weren't for the odor they give off with every step you take. Power has its price... and quite a smell, too!

name: Forgotten Boots
description: These boots might be forgettable if it weren't for the odor they give off with every step you take. Power has its price... and quite a smell, too!

name: Forgotten Belt
description: If all they can find of you is your belt, chances are you've had a pretty rough time of it.

name: Forgotten Belt
description: If all they can find of you is your belt, chances are you've had a pretty rough time of it.

name: Forgotten Cloak
description: This cloak is all that remains of the valiant warrior who faced down Ogrest. It still bears the marks of a battle that was as terrible as it was brief.

name: Forgotten Cloak
description: This cloak is all that remains of the valiant warrior who faced down Ogrest. It still bears the marks of a battle that was as terrible as it was brief.

name: Disembodier
description: With this sword in hand, you'll feel ready to bring peace and calm back to Mount Zinit.

name: Sword of Iop
description: Many fighters will bend the knee before the sword belonging to the lord of the brave. Some to be knighted… and others to beg for mercy.

name: Enutrof Shovel
description: This shovel turns up the most priceless of treasures, the key locks them away in the strongest of chests, and the weapon discourages even the wildest of thieves from approaching.

name: Sram Dagger
description: This nasty little dagger always finds the quickest path to slip between your enemies' ribs… or into your allies' backs.

name: Feca's Shield
description: Let governments fall, heroes stumble, justice fail and chaos rain down. Hope still lives on in one last line of defense: this shield.

name: Sacrier Axe
description: When martyrs decide to become executioners, they take up this weapon to spill the blood of others.

name: Sadida's Staff
description: This staff can bring forth an impressive burst of vegetation when it touches the ground, making the world a greener place with every step its bearer takes.

name: Pandawa's Bamboo
description: Legend has it that this sacred weapon was used to create the Pandamurai, zealous defenders of the Bambooshido code.

name: Osamodas' Hammer
description: When his whip was no longer sufficient to tame the most aggressive creatures, Osamodas decided to use a hammer instead.

name: Cra Bow
description:
This bow was made from Golden Apis, earning it great fame.
Its bearer will be more than happy with its fearful aim.

name: Ecaflip Cards
description: Whether you need a straight, a pair, three or even four of a kind, these cards win every game and ensure you've always got an ace in the hole.

name: Xelor's Hand
description: Controlling the flow of time isn't always easy for the Great Clockmaker, as this hand will always be there to remind you.

name: Eniripsa's Wand
description: Once borne by the Goddess Eniripsa, but originally created by Eni Nooni.

name: Disembodier
description: With this sword in hand, you'll feel ready to bring peace and calm back to Mount Zinit.

name: Sword of Iop
description: Many fighters will bend the knee before the sword belonging to the lord of the brave. Some to be knighted… and others to beg for mercy.

name: Enutrof Shovel
description: This shovel turns up the most priceless of treasures, the key locks them away in the strongest of chests, and the weapon discourages even the wildest of thieves from approaching.

name: Sram Dagger
description: This nasty little dagger always finds the quickest path to slip between your enemies' ribs… or into your allies' backs.

name: Feca's Shield
description: Let governments fall, heroes stumble, justice fail and chaos rain down. Hope still lives on in one last line of defense: this shield.

name: Sacrier Axe
description: When martyrs decide to become executioners, they take up this weapon to spill the blood of others.

name: Sadida's Staff
description: This staff can bring forth an impressive burst of vegetation when it touches the ground, making the world a greener place with every step its bearer takes.

name: Pandawa's Bamboo
description: Legend has it that this sacred weapon was used to create the Pandamurai, zealous defenders of the Bambooshido code.

name: Osamodas' Hammer
description: When his whip was no longer sufficient to tame the most aggressive creatures, Osamodas decided to use a hammer instead.

name: Xelor's Hand
description: Controlling the flow of time isn't always easy for the Great Clockmaker, as this hand will always be there to remind you.

name: Eniripsa's Wand
description: Once borne by the Goddess Eniripsa, but originally created by Eni Nooni.

name: Ogrest's Wrath
description: This ring is your proof of having braved the most fearful dangers the World of Twelve has ever known.

name: Ogrest's Tear
description: Hard to believe that one little tear could be so dangerous. Handle with care: dropping it by accident could easily flood an entire nation.

name: Zinit Amulet
description:
Many moons ago, people used to say that wisdom was golden.
Now the only wisdom left in this World is embedded deep inside this amulet.

name: Dragolyre
description: This splendid amulet, made from Dreggon remains, does a pretty impressive job fighting off the majority of your enemies.

name: Legano
description: Hold up... There's something funny about this ring!

name: The Wa's Seal
description: Affix your seal, impose your laws, and pose in front of the Wa!

name: Zinit Boots
description: These boots allow plain sailing on the plains of Mount Zinit.

name: Yugonets
description: Now you can try to get through customs without being stopped! But don't get too cocky…

name: Turq Tutu
description: Unfortunately, this one can't boast +20, but they say it's a relic handed down for generations, which has to count for something.

name: Pandawan Belt
description: This is the famous belt that Pandawans tend to take off when they’ve drunk too much. Let's just say they don't wear it too often.

name: Zinit Hat
description: This hat will probably give you hat hair.

name: Pandawan Hat
description: This must be the hat Magalouf was talking about in his rhyme 'eenie meenie hatty ho.' This information is completely useless. Much like yourself.

name: Zinit Cloak
description: This cloak will keep you dry on those rainy days.

name: Satiri Cloak
description: This cloak will applaud anything, even a badly made joke. As least you won't have to endure that awkward silence after yours anymore...

name: Pandawan Kimono
description: We told you it wouldn't be the last…

description: Thanks to these epaulettes, you can spread justice to the impoverished. Or you can become a power-thirsty lunatic with his own selfish ideas about justice.

description: People say the famous blacksmith Boulgur made this brooch. Yes, the guy who created weapons for the gods.

name: Tot' Belt
description: If you happen to have this belt on your hips, you're in luck: It used to belong to the strongest and most seductive bearded hero of all time.

name: Tot' Belt
description: If you happen to have this belt on your hips, you're in luck: It used to belong to the strongest and most seductive bearded hero of all time.

name: Elite Riktus Flagpole
description: Hold this flagpole high with pride. Let the colors of the bandit elite shine on!

name: Elite Riktus Flagpole
description: Hold this flagpole high with pride. Let the colors of the bandit elite shine on!

name: Hoodfella Ring
description: This ring will come in very useful as a rallying sign during Hoodlum meetings.

name: Hoodfella Ring
description: This ring will come in very useful as a rallying sign during Hoodlum meetings.

name: Hoodfella Ring
description: This ring will come in very useful as a rallying sign during Hoodlum meetings.

name: Hoodfella Boots
description: Nice! These boots are the best in the World for tracking down the Hoodlum clan.

name: Hoodfella Boots
description: Nice! These boots are the best in the World for tracking down the Hoodlum clan.

name: Hoodfella Boots
description: Nice! These boots are the best in the World for tracking down the Hoodlum clan.

name: Hoodfella Cloak
description: This cloak will keep you hidden from prying eyes. Well, as long as you keep your back to people.

name: Hoodfella Cloak
description: This cloak will keep you hidden from prying eyes. Well, as long as you keep your back to people.

name: Hoodfella Hood
description: Wearing a hood now, are you? Either you've got something to hide... or you really are streets ahead when it comes to fashion.

name: Hoodfella Hood
description: Wearing a hood now, are you? Either you've got something to hide... or you really are streets ahead when it comes to fashion.

name: Shadow Fragment
description: A piece of Shadofang's Shadow.

name: Hooklettes
description: Put on these epaulettes, stand perfectly still in a corner, and then smile. You are now a coat rack.

name: Shademail
description: If you spend all summer at the beach wearing this chest armor, you'll get a weird-looking tan but will have avoided sunburn.

name: Cape Hillary
description: This cape triples its wearer's shampoo consumption.

name: Horned Headgear
description: Don't make this helmet mad, or it'll have a cow.

name: Worn to a Shadow
description: You can wear this pair of boots when working yourself to death.

name: Collar of Shadows
description: This would be the hottest new accessory if it didn't suck up the wearer's soul.

name: Hairpin
description: This hairpin originally belonged to Shadofang.

name: Brrr Belt
description: As butchers say, "Keep meat in the shade to keep it from smelling bad." This could apply to other parts of your anatomy as well.

name: Breastplate of Shadows
description: The least favorite breastplate of the highwayman Mack Jessrine, who liked to say: "If you live in the shadows, you'll never get close to the sun."

name: Laughing Shovel
description: As irritating as its constant laughter is, this shovel is nevertheless a great traveling companion.

name: Laughing Ring
description: This enchanted ring (we won't call it cursed to avoid scaring off potential buyers) starts giggling when pointed east. Very useful for navigation.

name: Hairlarious Cloak
description: No matter how hairy your mood, this cloak will always have a smile for you.

name: Mocking Cap
description: Wearing this makes you kid around till you can't stop, at which point you might be wearing a straitjacket.

name: Jeering Epaulettes
description: Warning: These shoulder pieces could drive you mad, as they'll take turns teasing you relentlessly.

name: Hooklettes
description: Put on these epaulettes, stand perfectly still in a corner, and then smile. You are now a coat rack.

name: Shademail
description: If you spend all summer at the beach wearing this chest armor, you'll get a weird-looking tan but will have avoided sunburn.

description: This hairpin originally belonged to Shadofang.
