name: Laughing Ring
description: This enchanted ring (we won't call it cursed to avoid scaring off potential buyers) starts giggling when pointed east. Very useful for navigation.

name: Hairlarious Cloak
description: No matter how hairy your mood, this cloak will always have a smile for you.

name: Mocking Cap
description: Wearing this makes you kid around till you can't stop, at which point you might be wearing a straitjacket.

name: Jeering Epaulettes
description: Warning: These shoulder pieces could drive you mad, as they'll take turns teasing you relentlessly.

name: Stasis Rune Fragment
description: This item made of recycled equipment is used in the fabrication of extremely powerful epic and relic runes.

name: Mystical Sakura Wood
description: Mystical Sakura wood is prized for its rareness, how easily it can be worked, and its light pink color.

name: Sakuya Cape
description: This beautiful cape might be made out of wood but it's still nearly as light as fabric.

name: Dora Nami
description: This Dora, made from mystic Sakura wood, has a constant supply of buds growing from its crown.

name: Bell
description: After extended research on the subject, it has been discovered that Moogrrs use these bells to talk to one another. M aybe this could finally be a method of communication Iops understand?

name: Moogrrudder
description: From now on, this udder will make a very nice pocket. It's up to you to decide what you want to keep in it.

name: Royal Moogrr Mimilk
description: This Mimilk helps the adventurer build strong bones and a sturdy constitution, all the way up to the end of his short life.

name: Moogrr Seed
description: An experienced trapper toiled tirelessly to collect the sticky substance contained in this flask! A few drops should suffice.

name: Dried Dung
description: This dung reportedly has incredible powers of isolation. Build your house with it, and you won't have any trouble with the neighbors.

name: Moogrr Filet
description: This cut was taken from the heart, the softest and tenderest part of the Moogrr...

name: Cwab Eye
description: Worn as an earring, this Cwab Eye will make you look stylish and distinguished.

name: Albatrocious Feather
description: Albatrocious Feather trade is a big hit in Brakmar. Its inhabitants use it to torture Bontarians...

name: Royal Pincer
description: Apparently the Boowolfine used this very pincer to trim her Miliboowolves' manes. She didn't do a very good job of it, did she?

name: Cwab Slobber
description: Pour some of this into your sheath and you'll be able to stick any sword you like inside it.

name: Cwab Stick
description: Great for parties, this Cwab stick's vibrant color will really brighten up your buffet.

name: Kokoko Leaf
description: This thick and rubbery leaves make ideal raincoats.

name: Kokok Eye
description: It's easy to confuse these Kokoko eyes with Kokonuts. Don't think anyone will look the other way if you try to eat one, though.

name: Koko Beard
description: A Kokonut-flavored beard that you picked up from one of your conquests.

name: Kokonut
description: The Kokonut is quite a mystery. The only thing we know for sure about it is that if it has three holes, they must be to put your fingers in it.

name: Kokosap
description: The strong smell of Kokonut coming from this sap will probably make you want to put it in your mouth. Careful, though, as it'll most likely stick your teeth together!

name: Blibli Skin
description: This rough skin will need special treatment if you want to use it in your creations.

name: Blibli Gum
description: Even Bonta's weapons store isn't as well equipped and dangerous as this gum line.

name: Royal Blibli Tusk
description: Don't be annoyed if this tusk acts all defensive. It's just in its nature.

name: Blibli Hairs
description: Who would have thought that one day the fleece of a big hairy pig might interest you?

name: Snout
description: This is not a nose, it's a snout. Note the subtle difference.

name: Moskito Wings
description: Moskitos can't get very far without their wings, which is even more reason for you to pluck them off.

name: Moskito Paws
description: Four Moskito Paws! Now there's something that will make a nice addition to your collection!

name: TsarTsar Horn
description: This rare horn is still bursting with Wakfu.

name: Mushd Hand
description: There's not Mushd to it and it looks a bit Mushd but there we have it; a Mushd hand.

name: Sucked Blood
description: A bit of blood mixed with saliva and a touch of Moskito gastric acid...  umm, tasty!

name: Strich Beak
description: You can recognize Strich Beaks by their twisted appearance and their astonishing resistance. Many Brakmarian babies were given these to use as pacifiers when their teeth were coming through.

name: Strich Leg
description: Some claim it's impossible to find two Strich legs of exactly the same size, even if you take them from the same bird.

name: Gigantegg
description: Owning a Gigantegg in perfect condition is as rare as it is cumbersome. Don't be surprised if you feel little bird pecks coming from inside it.

name: Strich Feather
description: Some wonderful books have been written with quills made from Strich Feathers. You can also use it to decorate your hat.

name: Strich Neck
description: Prepared with strong spices, marinated a few days in an overpowering sauce, and cooked for a great many hours, this Strich neck can just about pass for edible.

name: Chafer Bone
description: If you happen to run into this Chafer, he might have a bone or two to pick with you!

name: Pelvis
description: A Chafer pelvis! Well, it certainly looks like one. Anyone brave enough to check in the past has ended up... looking like a pile of sliced sausage.

name: Royal Canine
description: Learn to love and respect this resource and its multiple uses will become apparent.

name: Bone Flour
description: This flour is made from old Chafer Bones which have been reduced to mush by years of fighting... and swords.

name: Tibia
description: Can be broken by sticks and stones.

name: Scara Horn
description: The Scara Horn is a symbol of veneration in many Brakmarian households. If you grind it down to powder you can also use it to make very bitter and gritty pancakes.

name: Scara Heart
description: Generally speaking, Scara Hearts decompose instantly when they die, which makes collecting them a particularly difficult job.

name: Golden Brown Dung
description: This is not just any old dung. This dung contains copious amounts of gold, which makes you wonder whether you should like or lump it.

name: Sip of Sulfur
description: These flasks, which can be easily reproduced, smell of fresh saffron and instill strength and suffering in anyone who drinks them.

name: Scarapace
description: Scarapaces are mostly used to make shields, armor, axes, and cradles.

name: Riktus Cloth
description: The old Riktus pastime of "spinning a yarn" comes from the fact that they used to spend their free time making their clothes.

name: Riktus Scalp
description: Under the cloth, you'll find a nice, bloody piece of scalp. This used to belong to a head, no doubt about it!

name: Riktus Standard
description: Drape yourself in this standard and you will have a very pretty loincloth. It might be a bit short, of course, but pretty all the same!

name: Riktus Essence
description: The essence of all evil... or almost!

name: Riktus Gold Tooth
description: This will really give you a sparkling grin!

name: Puddly Straw
description: If you can't find anything else to do with them, why not use these little bits of straw for cleaning out your ears.

name: Tensioning Wire
description: Who knows what this was used for before you got hold of it...

name: Puddle Royale
description: A moist, sludgy substance leaks out of it.

name: Spritaur
description: Only Taurs can drink this extra-strength api juice without turning their stomachs inside out.

name: Puddly Bottle
description: You wonder what the purpose of this bottle might very well be.

name: Fins
description: If you haven't got palms, start learning to swim using these fins instead.

name: Zorstrum
description: Legend has it that Ogrest used to use these Zordfish beaks as toothpicks... I dare you to do the same.

name: Dorsal Fin
description: Even all ripped up, this dorsal fin looks way cool.

name: Snapper Oil
description: Ideal for frying Grawns in, this oil is 100% fat-free. Oh no wait, it's 100% fat.

name: Snapper Flesh
description: Snapper Flesh is a delicacy for the taste buds. It will bring all the tastes of the tide to life for you.

name: Dark Root
description: This piece of wood is the foul-smelling irrefutable proof that Treechnids have foot-odor issues!

name: Treechnid Bud
description: Even Treechnids must endure the inconvenience of puberty...

name: Ancestral Treechnid Bark
description: This bark is one of the last existing pieces of the Ancestral Treechnid... You're holding a piece of history in your hands.

name: False Note
description: A false note. Let's just hope no one else noticed it.

name: Blop Guitar
description: You don't need to know how to play it to impress your guests.

name: Blopzart Essence
description: Owning this essence won't make you any more of a maestro in difficult times.

name: Blop Slop
description: It's a sort of mucus left behind by Blops when they move around.

name: Blop Essence
description: This flask contains a strange pink substance. And a multitude of melodies.

name: Magic Kwismas Tree Wood
description: Right after you cut it, it begins to grow back. It's truly magic! Maybe if you combine several, yours will be even bigger.

name: Monbow Tree
description: There'll always be a little piece of Kwismas in your haven bag.

name: Amakna Sword
description: This sword is one of the most formidable treasures in the World of Twelve. It cannot be carried without the Amakna Ring.

name: Sufokia Sword
description: This sword is one of the most formidable treasures in the World of Twelve. It cannot be carried without the Sufokia Ring.

name: Bonta Sword
description: This sword is one of the most formidable treasures in the World of Twelve. It cannot be carried without the Bonta Ring.

name: Brakmar Sword
description: This sword is one of the most formidable treasures in the World of Twelve. It cannot be carried without the Brakmar Ring.

name: Brrrbli Ring
description: Tiny, sweet, gentle and cool. Tough, white, and oh so powerful!

name: Brrrbli Ring
description: Tiny, sweet, gentle and cool. Tough, white, and oh so powerful!

name: Brrrbli Ring
description: Tiny, sweet, gentle and cool. Tough, white, and oh so powerful!

name: Brrrbli Boots
description: The Brrrblis trample the ice as they stampede, but the island's temperature instantly freezes the water after they have passed, creating pretty white ripples.

name: Brrrbli Boots
description: The Brrrblis trample the ice as they stampede, but the island's temperature instantly freezes the water after they have passed, creating pretty white ripples.

name: Brrrbli Boots
description: The Brrrblis trample the ice as they stampede, but the island's temperature instantly freezes the water after they have passed, creating pretty white ripples.

name: Brrrbli Belt
description: It's not a good idea to tighten your belt in such freezing conditions! Better go out on a full stomach. After all, you're not endowed with an extra layer of fat like a Brrrbli.

name: Brrrbli Belt
description: It's not a good idea to tighten your belt in such freezing conditions! Better go out on a full stomach. After all, you're not endowed with an extra layer of fat like a Brrrbli.

name: Brrrbli Belt
description: It's not a good idea to tighten your belt in such freezing conditions! Better go out on a full stomach. After all, you're not endowed with an extra layer of fat like a Brrrbli.

name: Brrrbli Breastplate
description: This breastplate shields your front and behind, so feel free to take some hits for the others!

name: Brrrbli Breastplate
description: This breastplate shields your front and behind, so feel free to take some hits for the others!

name: Icehorn Epaulettes
description: These shoulder pads are incredibly frost-resistant and are very useful when plunging headlong into a blizzard, as you do.

name: Icehorn Epaulettes
description: These shoulder pads are incredibly frost-resistant and are very useful when plunging headlong into a blizzard, as you do.

name: Icehorn Epaulettes
description: These shoulder pads are incredibly frost-resistant and are very useful when plunging headlong into a blizzard, as you do.

name: The Steel Chill
description: The slightest stroke of this sword is enough to break the ice!

name: The Steel Chill
description: The slightest stroke of this sword is enough to break the ice!

name: Horned Hammer
description: This hammer would be the ultimate ice-breaker, if it weren't so cold to handle.

name: Horned Hammer
description: This hammer would be the ultimate ice-breaker, if it weren't so cold to handle.

name: Brrrblific Helmet
description: You've got to wrap up warmly on Frigost Island, especially your head. You wouldn't want to end up with Iop brain-freeze, would you?

name: Brrrblific Helmet
description: You've got to wrap up warmly on Frigost Island, especially your head. You wouldn't want to end up with Iop brain-freeze, would you?

name: Brrrbley Spears's Ring
description: This ring is the centerpiece of Brrrbley Spears's collection and would be worth its weight in gold if only the market wasn't frozen.

name: Brrrbley Spears's Ring
description: This ring is the centerpiece of Brrrbley Spears's collection and would be worth its weight in gold if only the market wasn't frozen.

name: Brrrbley Spears's Headgear
description: In the midst of the icicles rearing up all over the Ice Floe, Brrrbley Spears watches over her children.

name: Brrrbley Spears's Headgear
description: In the midst of the icicles rearing up all over the Ice Floe, Brrrbley Spears watches over her children.

name: Brrrbley Spear
description: This dagger is as lethal as the ice floe that Brrrbley Spears has chosen to make her home!

name: Brrrbley Spear
description: This dagger is as lethal as the ice floe that Brrrbley Spears has chosen to make her home!

name: Wand-4-U
description:
This wand will make all Brrrblis completely crazy about you!
You'll have little monsters coming at you by the bucket load!

name: Wand-4-U
description:
This wand will make all Brrrblis completely crazy about you!
You'll have little monsters coming at you by the bucket load!

name: Brrrbwi Staff
description: This staff is made principally of Frozen Wood, which lends it a shiny and fragile appearance. One of its special features is its ability to split enemies in two!

name: Brrrbwi Staff
description: This staff is made principally of Frozen Wood, which lends it a shiny and fragile appearance. One of its special features is its ability to split enemies in two!

name: Brrrblimulet
description: Avoid tying this too tightly, as it instantly freezes anything it touches. Hello, stiff neck!

name: Amakna Ring
description: This epic ring lets you equip the fabulous sword of Amakna.

name: Sufokia Ring
description: This epic ring lets you equip the mystical sword of Sufokia.

name: Bonta Ring
description: This epic ring lets you equip the proud sword of Bonta.

name: Brakmar Ring
description: This epic ring lets you equip the vicious sword of Brakmar.

name: Bandit Breath
description: Try not to breathe in the contents of this flask. Bandits aren't exactly known for good oral hygiene...

name: Hamma-Whip
description: Not to be used on sensitive butts!

name: Grossanto Serum
description: The famous Grossanto serum. It can be lethal in high doses.

name: Riktus Chief Cloth
description: A piece of the chief's loincloth that can also be used as a banner. How ingenious!

name: Eternal Sword
description: The fine line between creator and destroyer is fuzzy.

name: James Bomb
description: Have you met our secret agent bomb? Now you have...

name: Bonbomb
description: This is gonna liven the palace up!

name: Remington Fragment
description: A strange fragment from a not-so-precious stone.

name: Rogue Treasure
description: Fabulous pirate treasure!

name: Supple Sole
description: This sole lets your feet breathe.

name: Stalagmite
description: This stalagmite is actually a stiff Stalagmote paw.

name: Lava Eye
description: This eye gives the somewhat disconcerting impression that you're always being watched. It seems to spy on everything you do.

name: Stalagspread
description: Every spoonful of this spread is chock-full of calories. Use it as the basis of your new diet and you're guaranteed to gain one dress size per month!

name: Stalagrain
description: This brownish substance will probably put you off your food, but it tastes delicious, I swear!

name: Stalagmama
description: Many a scientist has asked themselves what part of the Mamagmote this is - the answer is simple: it's a nail!

name: Mechanical Shovel
description: Those of you who think less is more, in terms of effort, are going to love this shovel. All you have to do is press the button and it does all the work for you. Unfortunately, no one's found the button yet.

name: Mechanical Shovel
description: Those of you who think less is more, in terms of effort, are going to love this shovel. All you have to do is press the button and it does all the work for you. Unfortunately, no one's found the button yet.

name: Hoodfella Amulet
description: Evil and covered in mysterious runes, this amulet will increase your powers tenfold.

name: Hoodfella Amulet
description: Evil and covered in mysterious runes, this amulet will increase your powers tenfold.

name: Multimonk
description: A slightly outdated version of the Solomonk, but it'll do for costume parties.

name: Multimonk
description: A slightly outdated version of the Solomonk, but it'll do for costume parties.

name: Multimonk
description: A slightly outdated version of the Solomonk, but it'll do for costume parties.

name: Multimonk
description: A slightly outdated version of the Solomonk, but it'll do for costume parties.

name: Floral Breastplate
description: A flowery breastplate to brighten up your days! Make sure you water it every day and give it plenty of sunlight.

name: Floral Breastplate

name: Lifen Sole Boots
description: With these Lifen Sole Boots on, you'll really know how to kick your opponent into shape!

name: Lifen Sole Boots

name: Hoodlum Cloak
description: You instantly have a dark and mysterious past as soon as you put on this cloak.

name: Hoodlum Cloak
description: You instantly have a dark and mysterious past as soon as you put on this cloak.

name: Hoodlum Cloak
description: You instantly have a dark and mysterious past as soon as you put on this cloak.

name: Kikbox Ring
description: Communication isn't exactly Jo-Chlo Vandam's forte. It took a whole fall for the Iopette to figure out how to put this ring on.

name: Kikbox Ring
description: Communication isn't exactly Jo-Chlo Vandam's forte. It took a whole fall for the Iopette to figure out how to put this ring on.

description: Communication isn't exactly Jo-Chlo Vandam's forte. It took a whole fall for the Iopette to figure out how to put this ring on.

name: Kikbox Ring
description: Communication isn't exactly Jo-Chlo Vandam's forte. It took a whole fall for the Iopette to figure out how to put this ring on.

name: Ur Belt
description: This belt, which was made by a group of Iops who preferred suffering to looking good, is armed with two big metal spikes which cut at your thighs with every step.

name: Ur Belt
description: This belt, which was made by a group of Iops who preferred suffering to looking good, is armed with two big metal spikes which cut at your thighs with every step.

name: Ur Belt
description: This belt, which was made by a group of Iops who preferred suffering to looking good, is armed with two big metal spikes which cut at your thighs with every step.

name: Midnight Hand
description: Legend has it that this hand also has the power to turn Dragoturkeys into pumpkins if the bearer sits on one after the twelfth strike of midnight.

name: Midnight Hand
description: Legend has it that this hand also has the power to turn Dragoturkeys into pumpkins if the bearer sits on one after the twelfth strike of midnight.

name: Midnight Hand
description: Legend has it that this hand also has the power to turn Dragoturkeys into pumpkins if the bearer sits on one after the twelfth strike of midnight.

name: Pepepew Sword
description: This sword was taken from a Blacksmith's shop sign... Let's hope you'll be able to hit harder with it. If not, it's not going to be much good unless you open your own shop.

name: Pepepew Sword
description: This sword was taken from a Blacksmith's shop sign... Let's hope you'll be able to hit harder with it. If not, it's not going to be much good unless you open your own shop.

name: Pepepew Sword
description: This sword was taken from a Blacksmith's shop sign... Let's hope you'll be able to hit harder with it. If not, it's not going to be much good unless you open your own shop.

name: Sinistring
description: Actually, it's not all that sinister in the end. This little ring contains a funny mini-Sinistro who cheer you up any time by fluttering its little wings.

name: Sinistring
description: Actually, it's not all that sinister in the end. This little ring contains a funny mini-Sinistro who cheer you up any time by fluttering its little wings.

name: Trance Belt
description: This belt is highly sought-after because whoever equips it enters into a trance in which they see the galloooping haaands of tiiime slooowing dooown ooon the liiit diiiaaaaals.

name: Trance Belt
description: This belt is highly sought-after because whoever equips it enters into a trance in which they see the galloooping haaands of tiiime slooowing dooown ooon the liiit diiiaaaaals.

name: Dark Cloth
description: Don't worry, it'll keep its deep, dark, mysterious color even after dozens of washes.

name: Hoodlum Pin
description: This pin isn't so bad, especially if you wear it on a tie.

name: Show-Stopper Nail
description: This nail hit it on the head.

name: Dark Fairy
description: This fairy cannot revive.

name: Mechanical Shovel
description: Those of you who think less is more, in terms of effort, are going to love this shovel. All you have to do is press the button and it does all the work for you. Unfortunately, no one's found the button yet.

name: Timepieth
description: Every time you thee thith timepieth, you'll crave a nithe tall glath of fruit juithe.

name: Timepieth
description: Every time you thee thith timepieth, you'll crave a nithe tall glath of fruit juithe.

name: Tot' Belt
description: If you happen to have this belt on your hips, you're in luck. It used to belong to the strongest and most seductive bearded hero of all time.

name: Masked Riktus Epaulettes
description: These epaulettes are covered in mucus, the taste of which reminds you of someone you know well. This peculiar feature makes them airtight and dashes any hopes you may have of meeting your soulmate.

name: Ave Cape
description: The Ave Cape: It's OP!

name: Spite Dagger
description: This little number won't hurt as much as a Trool bludgeon, but it's a much more subtle, tasteful means of attack.

name: Crabby Breastplate
description: This breastplate is covered with sap that has neurotoxic effects that brighten adventurers' dispositions. Quite the curmudgeon when they met you, they'll (ahem) surly (ahem) love you when you're just grumpy.

name: Crabby Breastplate
description: This breastplate is covered with sap that has neurotoxic effects that brighten adventurers' dispositions. Quite the curmudgeon when they met you, they'll (ahem) surly (ahem) love you when you're just grumpy.

name: Piss Still
description: The jeweler who named this ring was a huge botany buff, but he struggled mightily with spelling.

name: Piss Still
description: The jeweler who named this ring was a huge botany buff, but he struggled mightily with spelling.

name: Bootanist Boots

description: This trunk will drive your opponents off their rockers and keep you firmly on yours.

name: Thirsty Bulb
description: Some living beings need to be watered (cough with alcohol cough) constantly to grow and blossom.

name: Root of Evil
description: This strange root was long studied by the illustrious botanist, Dar Kandire. No one knows what conclusions he reached.

name: Kavortin' Plantala
description: Don't put them next to each other or these plants could start dancing a rousing conga line.

name: Alamode Plantala
description: Plant them with your feet, your knee or your nose, but whatever you do, don't forget a scoop of vanilla ice cream on the side.

name: Pandissident Skin
description: Smooth in front, raspy behind. This skin brings back bad memories.

name: Glass of Fermented Bamboo Milk
description: Is it half empty or half full?

name: Pandora's Box
description: Are you sure you want to open it?

name: Pandissident Hairs
description: Irritating and smelly. Just like children.

name: Pandissident Claw
description: This claw is in the top 5 of all "claws that annoy smiths".

name: Blightopard Fur
description: This lovely fur will keep you warm and toasty. The fleas are just a free bonus.

name: Blightopard Fabric
description: Soaked through and through with the pheromones of an alpha male, this fabric makes wonderful clothes!

name: Blightopard Totem
description: Blightopards only use these totems to bash overly curious adventurers over the head.

name: Tuft of Blightopard Fur
description: It's just a tiny tuft of fur, but it's more than smelly enough already.

name: Blightopard Meat
description: This meat is disgusting to look at, but really quite edible.

name: Pandala Ghostoplasm
description: Only Ghostofs can produce a substance as strange as this. Well, either them or Gobblettes in heat...

name: Pandala Intemporal Dust
description: This powder might come from the Dofus Era, and its effects are surprising. It instantly ages anything it's mixed with. Magic, right?

name: Tanukouï's Testicool
description: It's so heavy you wonder how anyone could ever carry two at once.

name: Old Pandala Fabric
description: This piece of old fabric is so worn out that it seems very suspicious...

name: Forgotten Dream
description: This dream was a thing of rare beauty, and yet you still forgot it the instant you opened your eyes.

name: Powder
description:
Riddle: I'm made out of recycled waste. What am I?
a) A mother-in-law.
b) Powder.
c) A cliche about mother-in-laws.
d) All of the above.

name: Thirster Scalp
description:
This resource from the past can be used to activate steles in several dungeons from levels 126 to 215:
Blackspore Dungeon, Dirty Trouffe Estate, Treechnid Dungeon, Great Zomkin's Compost, Lenald Palace, Kween's Gawden, Sandyoptera Mother-Hive, Womewo's Labowatowy, Srambad Dungeon, Enurado Dungeon, Blopera, Wellspring of Evil, Ow El Dungeon, Mecha Factory, Tropickle Dungeon, Crocodyl Dungeon, Kanniball Dungeon, Kannivore Dungeon, Or'Hodruin Volcano, Dreggons' Sanctuary, Iced-Over Crest, Badgeroxes' Lair, Pandala Tomb, Blightopard Canyon, Mineral Tower, Tundrazor Dungeon, Crabstacean Dungeon, Sunsloth Dungeon, Vandalophrenic Dungeon, Plantiguard Dungeon, Pingwin Dungeon, and Scramshell Dungeon.

name: Thirster Chunk
description: This resource from the past - or perhaps the future, depending on when you are - can be used to make a Thirster scalp.

name: Xeric Helmet
description: Nothing can grow on your head now. Nothing.

name: Xeric Helmet
description: Nothing can grow on your head now. Nothing.

name: Ax of Reason

name: Ax of Reason

description: Its aroma seems to be something out of this world.

name: Gerbean Skin
description: Positively crackling with static electricity. Handle with care!

name: Gerbean Claw
description: Enough electricity to power an entire city... Too bad nobody uses electricity these days.

name: Mama Gerbean Tail
description: Looking for a long, flexible tail? Look no further! And it's fashionable, too! Stiff, unmanageable tails are so 970.

name: Gerbean Fur
description: Thanks to the static electricity pouring out of it, these hairs are permanently standing on end.

name: Gerbean Meat
description: A succulent, savory delight. E.Z. Yeast recommends sampling it in a chocolate fondue with Arachnee legs.

name: Bubourg Claw
description: Be careful when picking up the Bubourg claw... it's surprisingly sharp. It may be badly damaged, but it can still do plenty of damage itself.

name: Bubourg Armor Fragment
description: A small mechanical piece collected from the strange armor that Count Harebourg placed on the Bubourgs.

name: Night Chestnut
description: You don't know why the proud, somber leader of the Bubourgs was keeping this little chestnut tucked away in a safe place. Was it a symbol of his past? A way to always remember something important to him? You close your hand around it, vowing to forge bravely ahead with your adventure.

name: Bubourg Feather
description: This feather is organic in nature, but it exudes a sense of something darker.

name: Bubourg Meat
description: This delicious Bubourg meat will have you coming back for more! Just watch out for splinters.

name: Neval's Blade
description: This weapon is why swords are no longer allowed in Gobbowl competitions. Its owner, a certain E. Neval, won every one of his matches 4 to 0, causing much consternation among spectators.

name: Neval's Blade
description: This weapon is why swords are no longer allowed in Gobbowl competitions. Its owner, a certain E. Neval, won every one of his matches 4 to 0, causing much consternation among spectators.

name: Kiotamm's Saw
description: Kiotamm always commented loudly on his opponents' actions... then took advantage of their confusion to quickly cut them down to size (literally!). When this type of weapon was ultimately banned from Gobbowl competitions, this illustrious player's career was tragically cut short.

name: Kiotamm's Saw
description: Kiotamm always commented loudly on his opponents' actions... then took advantage of their confusion to quickly cut them down to size (literally!). When this type of weapon was ultimately banned from Gobbowl competitions, this illustrious player's career was tragically cut short.

name: Lin's Sandals
description: These sandals feature an automatic tackling function, which is why they were banned from Gobbowl competitions. The player who wore them, Dulda Lin, kept tackling his opponents until he won all his matches by... "forfeit". In his defense, he always insisted that it wasn't him, it was his sandals.

description: Attacks that pierce this breastplate may be deflected by 90 degrees. But since the breastplate is indestructible, that's not yet completely confirmed.

description: Between his castle, his soul, his island, and his monsters, Count Harebourg's feet are the only thing not frozen solid, thanks to these boots.

name: Count Frigost's Hat
description: It's said that nary a living soul has ever seen Count Harebourg's face, even before the deep freeze that forced him to live in seclusion. What could he be hiding beneath this hat, and what strange transformations may have ravaged his face over the years?

name: Count Frigost's Ring
description: The Count uses this ring to redirect the surplus energy produced by his excessive power, which could easily destroy him if ever he lost control of it. Fortunately, that's not an issue for you.

description: Goes around your waist so fast, it'll make your head spin.

name: Sunsloth Tail
description:
Sunsloth tails grow back over time if they are cut off.
Just be careful not to cut anything else off, because that won't grow back.

name: Stompion Tail
description: If a Stompion can stomp on things with its tail, then what does it do with its feet?

name: Sunsloth Scale
description: This protects Sunsloths from sunburn, but not from any burns you might inflict.

name: Sunsloth Meat
description: Don't bother cooking it: The sun already gave it enough of a beating.

name: Sirius Pincer
description: Don't make too much fun of this pincer or it'll return the favor.

name: Lashing Pincer
description: Long exposure to this pincer can be very hard on the skin.

name: Cerebratacean Carapace
description: It's so strong you could balance Mount Zinit on it and it wouldn't break.

name: Crabstacean Scale
description: When a Crabstacean loses a scale, a new one quickly grows back. That's why it's so difficult to beat them.

name: Crabstacean Meat
description: Crabstacean meat is extremely tender and tasty, and surprisingly, it has aphrodisiac properties. You know what to cook for your next date!

name: Tundrazor Leather
description: You really shouldn't try to make warm clothes with this leather, which has cooling properties. Then again, it might make you looker cooler...

name: Tundrazor Claw
description: It's said that the injuries this claw inflicts never heal.

name: Totem Fragment
description: This is a remnant of the Flamboyffalo's strange kind of magic. Even a genius inventor would have a hard time using it.

name: Tundrazor Hairs
description: Now that's some rough hair!

name: Tundrazor Meat
description: It needs to be cooked for many hours to properly heat and defrost it.

name: Vandalophrenic Leather
description: This leather is really tough and subtly colored.

name: Vandalophrenic Horns
description: This wood isn't really that tough.

name: Hogincubus Tusks
description: Be careful not to sit on them by accident!

name: Vandalophrenic Spikes
description: These should make for a thorny reception...

name: Vandalophrenic Meat
description: You'll have to simmer it for a long time and add a lot of spices to obscure its hideous flavor.

name: Carya Wood
description: This wood is so tough that it's almost impossible to chop it.

name: Caryoka Wood
description: Can you dance the Caryoka?

name: Twisted Seaweed Wood
description: This seaweed is delicious in salads, but it is also recognized as a solid crafting material.

name: Algae Rhythm Wood
description: Instead of being made of musical notes, this wood is the product of thousands of complex formulae. Got it, Iop brain? Hands off!

name: Iced Cranberry
description: The neutral, almost-bland taste of this cranberry is in stark contrast to the sky-high calorie content.

name: Burning Cranberry
description: Since it's always on fire, you can't really hold it for more than a second.

name: Hactus
description: Hactuses contain a slightly sticky, salty juice, making them a highly esteemed ingredient for meals for mothers-in-law everywhere.

name: Catchoo
description: Please wash you hands thoroughly after handling a Catchoo.

name: Delphes Inium
description: A lovely violet flower.

name: Delphinia
description: This is a favorite among florists.

name: Flowerflake
description: Its purity is matched only by its iciness.

name: Everlasting Flake
description: This rare flowerflake will never melt.

name: Frozen Garnet
description: This ore turned pale after being frozen for many centuries.

name: Absolute Garnet
description: Is this ore cold because it's in a cold area, or is the area cold because of this ore?

name: Zircon
description: Its color looks otherworldly.

name: Polished Zircon
description: Not just a stone, this Zircon also speaks extremely eloquently. It must be polished in every sense of the word.

name: Schrymp
description: A gentle creature.

name: Grawnble
description: This nice little Grawn has a habit of mumbling, but it's still great in salads.

name: Oyster
description: You can be sure the party will be great when there are oysters on the table!

name: Newtral
description: "So, what's Newtral?"

name: Divine Plank
description: This plank is used to make furniture, armor, or weapons.

name: Divine Flour
description: This flour is used to make good, warm bread.

name: Divine String
description: This string is used to craft headgear and helmets, but also amulets and rings.

name: Divine Steel
description: This steel is used to craft weapons, breastplates, epaulettes and shields.

name: Divine Tiramisoup
description: This Tiramisoup lets you make lovely little dishes.

name: Divine Essence
description: This essence contains monsters' souls, and can instill their power into almost all types of items.

name: Divine Spice
description: This spice is used to make lovely little dishes.

name: Divine Fiber
description: This fiber is mainly used to craft capes and headgear.

name: Divine Handle
description: This handle is mainly used to make weapons.

name: Divine Leather
description: This leather is mainly used to craft boots, belts, and bags.

name: Divine Plate
description: This plate is mainly used to make breastplates, epaulettes, and shields.

name: Divine Gem
description: This gem is mainly used to craft rings and amulets.

name: Divine Oil
description: This oil is used to make good, rich bread, and to fry your ingredients to prepare dishes.

name: Divine Bracket
description: This bracket is used in all types of woodwork.

name: Divine Orb
description: The power this orb contains is unmatched in the World of Twelve.

name: Divine Souper-Glou
description: Souper-Glou is the ideal ingredient to assemble your items. You can get it as a reward for the level 201 to 215 Environmental Quests.

name: Aguabrial's Intervention Key

name: Theater Pocket

name: Beltrophy
description:
Its original owner was a remarkable fighter. A winner of numerous tournaments, he was an expert at recognizing his opponents' skills, and eventually joined forces with them to complement his own strengths. Reliable and always true to himself, his core principle was to always follow his convictions - an approach that brought him great success.
He was honest and pragmatic, and tough yet fair with his friends. He never hesitated to say what he was thinking without mincing his words. In an argument, it was better to be on his side if you didn't want to hear him saying "C'mon, seriously?!" every two sentences without even noticing it.

name: The Tock
description:
They say that this headgear once belonged to a robust Xelor who was deeply invested in his work. Though he was always ready to share a helpful tip and help his fellow Twelvians, many people didn't think much of his inventions, and audiences often shouted him down at his public appearances. 
He was totally inseparable from his Tick, and together they sometimes drove their friends crazy. It seems he even cut one of them loose completely after a nasty business involving a piece of farm equipment...

name: The Tock
description:
They say that this headgear once belonged to a robust Xelor who was deeply invested in his work. Though he was always ready to share a helpful tip and help his fellow Twelvians, many people didn't think much of his inventions, and audiences often shouted him down at his public appearances.
He was totally inseparable from his Tick, and together they sometimes drove their friends crazy. It seems he even cut one of them loose completely after a nasty business involving a piece of farm equipment...

name: The Tick
description:
This cloak once belonged to an Eniripsa with a preposterously inflated image of herself. She genuinely thought she was the queen of Ecaflipus. Her sense of style, on the other hand, was anything but preposterous, and people all around the world were constantly seeking her favor.
She was totally inseparable from her Tock, and together they sometimes drove their friends crazy. Lots of people were jealous of her because she always had the best people around her, and wasn't afraid to say it. She was even a bit too talkative, in fact. You couldn't spend a day in Ecaflipus without hearing her gossiping with the local elites.

name: Shoulder Throws
description:
These epaulettes belongs to a courageous Feca known for his many charms. He seemed to have a new girlfriend every week, not to mention the countless young women he enchanted with his romantic letters.
He was also an extraordinary strategist who took down the greatest threats the world had ever faced, with the help of his traveling companions. His combative and competitive nature made him a fearsome opponent, as defeat was not an option for him. Legend has it that he even single-handedly bested some of the greatest arena fighters, and will always be remembered for having subjected one of the Wakfu era's greatest legends to a humiliating defeat in record time.

name: BenK'ap
description: This cap once belonged to a legendary architect. Always suggesting original and sometimes disturbing concepts, BenK had a really strong appetite for risk. This is a personality trait that manifested itself during the countless times he participated in the Hellfists, the outcome of which could not always be categorized as "for all ages". Sometimes reserved, sometimes casual, he left an undeniable mark on the environments of the World of Twelve, and he single-handedly carried out many restoration projects that the future of the whole Krosmoz depended on.

name: Forl'Ornate Epaulettes
description: These epaulettes were made by a broken-hearted armorer. The many precious stones that adorn it represent the number of years he spent waiting for his beloved, who had left on an expedition to unknown lands. When she finally returned, she was no longer the same, as a demon had taken possession of her soul. Out of love, the man desperately agreed to sell his soul to Rushu to be reunited with his true love, and was transformed into a Horridemon to be possessed for all eternity by a demon consumed by resentment.

Her sharp eye for problems sometimes gets her into tricky situations, but that doesn't change the fact that she's good enough, she's strong enough, and doggone it, people like her as an ally. Her keen and pragmatic mind have made her one of the greatest thinkers of our time.

So the next time you think your family is bad, wear these to put things in perspective.

name: Indescribable Breastplate
description: It's an interesting experiment, trying to come up with a description for an indescribable item. Some would opt for the easy and economic solution of not describing the item at all. But we're better than that. If a wall of text must be written, so be it! Here we go. There's a lot that you can say about what it means to be indescribable. It could have several meanings. It might mean that we don't have the right words to describe the thing in question, because it's completely unprecedented, because it's unlike anything we've ever known, or maybe also because we don't have the lexical knowledge necessary to choose the right words that will best express the indescribable nature of the thing. So we hide all this uncertainty behind phrases like: "You see?! It's indescribable!", said with deep conviction. But is that really the end of the story? If we search deep inside, maybe an exact and appropriate description will reveal itself. Something sufficiently clear, and at the time sufficiently abstract to facilitate understanding of the described thing. If the words aren't sufficient, maybe it's necessary to invent new ones? Words coming from the heart. Words which speak for themselves when the limits of language have been reached. The indescribable, ultimately, is above all an unknown, which requires only that we put forth the effort to understand it, to let your imagination, your reason, and your feelings play in order to better understand and therefore find the words that could describe it. But that would be too much work for a simple breastplate description.

name: Nonsensical Epaulettes
description: The good news is, you'll never misunderstand their meaning, because they have none.

name: Nonsensical Epaulettes

name: Mysterious Boots
description: This mysterious headgear seem to be inhabited by some evil presence. You'll often hear it whispering sweet nothings like "What, lost again? You're losing your marbles, old pal!"

name: Mysterious Boots
description: This mysterious headgear seem to be inhabited by some evil presence. You'll often hear it whispering sweet nothings like "What, lost again? You're losing your marbles, old pal!"

name: All-Terrain Helmet
description: Neither snow nor rain nor sleet nor hail shall stop this helmet from protecting you on your appointed missions. Some even say that when you equip it, you can literally walk on your head.

name: All-Terrain Helmet
description: Neither snow nor rain nor sleet nor hail shall stop this helmet from protecting you on your appointed missions. Some even say that when you equip it, you can literally walk on your head.

name: Lyfamulet
description: What is the meaning of this amulet? Who are we, where do we come from, and where are we going? If you ever ask yourself these questions, you're just a normal, thoughtful person. If not... maybe not.

name: Lyfamulet

name: Othannular
description: This avid and exciting ring will give you an energy boost every morning. It'll always be useful for getting through the day and chasing dark thoughts away.

name: Gennius Cloak
description:
You hold in your hands a cloak that belonged to one of the World of Twelve's calmest disciples of Pandawa. Thoughtful, creative and curious, he shared his knowledge and was always happy to help the adventurers he met along the way.
He probably never expected that one of them would make him this cloak to express their thanks.

name: JonTurk Breastplate

name: Despairdrilles
description: Sporting these sandals will give your enemies a sense of dread.

name: Tinker Belt
description: Biggs Tinker was a popular adventurer who explored many caves around the World of Twelve. He disappeared on a mission to Moon Island.

name: Unyielding Sword
description: No matter how strong you are, you'll never succeed in moving or wielding it. It is literally unyielding.

name: Unyielding Sword
description: No matter how strong you are, you'll never succeed in moving or wielding it. It is literally unyielding.

name: Greedery Overalls
description: The wearer of these overalls rarely lost a fight. He was so powerful and skilled that no one was able to defeat him for years. He even spent time training and teaching his opponents so that they might surpass him one day, but no one ever managed it.

description: Woven from strips of real Destroyer hide, this belt is as unbreakable as your self-confidence. Wear it proudly with your finest dress pants.

description: Your friends had tried to warn you that a so-called Shushu hairstylist that you met in an alley in the middle of the night clearly wouldn't have your best interests at heart. Next time, think twice before ordering that eighth pint on a Thursday night.

description: Never worry again about what to wear to those high-society balls. With this cloak, you'll be positively ravaging.

description: Far from the pain and rage that normally drives the Destroyers, these epaulettes are as comfy as can be. Who said Shushus don't like nice things?

description: A precious jewel fashioned with a loving hand. It has been passed down from generation to generation and used to win over many hearts over the years. If you wear this pendant, you may be able to seduce a Destroyer or two yourself...

description: The eye on this breastplate will make sure you never lose your way.

name: Destroyer Breastplate

name: Destroyer Ring
description: It seems to be inhabited by someone or something. Late at night, you could swear you've heard it say: "Bill Ding, what in the world is wrong with you? The boy's completely destroyed!" Totally traumatizing. And who the heck is "Bill Ding"?

description: No matter where you go or what the weather is like, you can count on these epaulettes to keep you nice and warm.

name: Sovereign Coat
description: When you equip this cloak, everyone you meet cries out, "The King in the North! Long may he reign!" You don't understand why, but it's pretty enjoyable. Just be careful you don't let it go to your head.

name: Amulet of the Great Beyond
description: Legend has it that this amulet allows you to travel to the Great Beyond. Whether or not you can ever come back is never mentioned.

name: Le Pidoptera
description: The artisan and entrepreneur who created this breastplate was also an entomologist par excellence. He took inspiration from his research to create a breastplate that would scare his enemies off in a natural and efficient way with painted designs made to look like predators, much like butterflies' wings. Note: Do not attempt to fly wearing this.

description: K'abah'al likes to wear this loincloth when he wants to dress up a bit. Unfortunately, it doesn't cover much. But still, it's a really nice loincloth.

description: With this mask, you've got a solid claim to the title of guardian of the dead - even the dead are afraid of you.

name: Sceptering
description: This ring was passed down from K'abah'al, and was made from part of his scepter. You'll occasionally catch it giggling as it sets your friends on fire.

name: Sceptering
description: This ring was passed down from K'abah'al, and was made from part of his scepter. You'll occasionally catch it giggling as it sets your friends on fire.

name: Boots of Legend
description: They say that these boots enabled some bearded old nutcase to walk on the surface of the Ch'Tyx. Why not turn the water into beer while you're at it?

name: Boots of Legend
description: They say that these boots enabled some bearded old nutcase to walk on the surface of the Ch'Tyx. Why not turn the water into beer while you're at it?

name: Koaxx Kimono
description: The sounds this kimono makes as you move have been studied and measured to be maximally pleasant to the ear.

description: The sounds this kimono makes as you move have been studied and measured to be maximally pleasant to the ear.

name: Gufet'Helm
description: Gufetto was a gobbowl player better known for his wild hair color than his athletic prowess. The fans loved him, though, and followers of his team even nicknamed him Red-naldinho.

description: Gufetto was a gobbowl player better known for his wild hair color than his athletic prowess. The fans loved him, though, and followers of his team even nicknamed him Red-naldinho.

name: Gufet'Helm
description: Gufetto was a gobbowl player better known for his wild hair color than his athletic prowess. The fans loved him, though, and followers of his team even nicknamed him Red-naldinho.

name: Suspect Cape
description:
This clock belongs to an elusive Brakmarian Sacrier. This warrior founded one of Brakmar's greatest taverns, a welcoming place for Twelvians of every kind.
Despite his fragile constitution, he was positively bursting with ideas to improve his friends' daily lives. Anyone who's met him considers him a fast friend.

name: Asthenis Greaves
description: Wherever these boots take you, you can be sure you'll be supported for life.

name: Asthenis Greaves
description: Wherever these boots take you, you can be sure you'll be supported for life.

name: Ethylettes
description: These epaulettes have been soaked in plant extract, which causes the wearer to become dazed but merry.

name: De Nyl Amulet
description: This charm won't bring you luck; it's just a piece of string with a feather and a bone. It's quite nice though.

name: Pseudopod
description:
What caused this appendage to appear? The need to tickle? Walk? Itch? Pinch?
Some questions will forever remain unanswered. Be grateful.

name: Phytomato
description: Fruit? Vegetable? Who knows! But the locals love it. (Yes, believe it or not, the locals do love something...)

name: Vaal'Endew
description: This residue of Vaal'Enthia tries to corrupt you by talking to your subconscious while you sleep. For example, it might whisper, "Honest, I'll totally pay you 50 kamas if you jump out the window..."

name: Phytomorph Piece
description:
This demonic growth is great for wiping up all kinds of things.
It'll take care of even the toughest stains, like the pools of blood your enemies left all over your kitchen.

name: Phytomorph Hand
description: Shaking this hand will give you a strange feeling in the pit of your stomach.

name: Voidivion Skin
description: It's supposedly indestructible and never wears out.

name: Voidivion Claw
description: Despite its startling appearance, this claw is not dangerous.

name: Ar'Nan Scalp
description: This is Ar'Nan's skull. Empty. Crazy, right?

name: Voidivion Hide
description: For the last time, people, you can't make bacon out of it.

name: Voidivion Remains
description: You picked this up off the ground without really knowing what it was. It's probably better that way.

name: Horridemon Wing
description: Do not attempt to fly with this.

name: Bloodcensor Tentacle
description: Despite its unappetizing appearance, this tentacle makes an excellent shish kebab.

name: Crateros Hook
description: Crateros particularly enjoys flaying his victims alive with his impressive hook.

name: Horridemon Mask
description: You regret having torn this from its old owner's face. What was under the mask was far worse.

name: Horridemon Hand
description: It seems to be trying to point something out to you.

name: Reman'haunt Scalp
description: Handle with care.

name: Dementya's Snitches
description: You always feel like... Dementya's watching you-u-u!

name: !@#dh`~ Trophy
description: You came, you saw, you conquered, but you still can't pronounce that freaky name.

name: Streye Leg
description: Not really sure how you managed to get hold of this, but nice work.

name: Streye Belly
description: Makes an excellent pillow for those cozy nights around the campfire.

name: Destroyer Arm
description: This arm seems to be inhabited by a mysterious force.

name: Destroyer's Heart
description: Don't offer them your own in exchange - it'll only end in tears.

name: K'abah'al Scepter Tip
description: Don't expect to work miracles with this piece of a scepter. You're not much of a magician in the first place.

name: Destroyer Teeth
description:
Put these under your pillow at night, and you may find yourself with a few extra kamas the next morning.
Although we also recall a few folks waking up minus an ear.

name: Destroyer Remains
description: Not so tough now, huh?!

name: Demonic Door
description: The barrier we all know and love for its ability to stop people breaking on through to the other side.

name: Decorative Wheat
description: Deco wheat, deco wheat... Can't be beat!

name: Anathar Armor Fragment
description: To this day, nobody knows how this exceptionally powerful demon managed to escape the Justice Knight's vigilance. It's just amazing what the Eliocalypse can lead to...

name: Anathar's Intervention Key
description: This key can be used to unlock an Intervention Stele level in the Phytomorph, Voidivion, Horridemon, Streye, and Destroyer dungeons.

name: Anathar Epaulettes
description: These epaulettes have got their eye on you.

name: Anathar Epaulettes
description: These epaulettes have got their eye on you.

name: Anathar Cloak
description: No one really knows why people's attention is always focused on entertainment or false controversy, while real problems continue to grow every day.

name: Anathar Cloak
description: No one really knows why people's attention is always focused on entertainment or false controversy, while real problems continue to grow every day.

name: Anathar Breastplate
description: Be careful, it might just copy your abilities. It would be a real shame to have to stoop to the level of someone as useless as you...

name: Anathar Breastplate
description: Be careful, it might just copy your abilities. It would be a real shame to have to stoop to the level of someone as useless as you...

name: Demonic Stele
description: You can feel it staring back at you.

name: Phytomorph Key Fragment
description: Collect the five key fragments from the forgotten islands of the Shustuft Crust to make Rushu's Palace key.

name: Voidivion Key Fragment
description: Collect the five key fragments from the forgotten islands of the Shustuft Crust to make Rushu's Palace key.

name: Horridemon Key Fragment
description: Collect the five key fragments from the forgotten islands of the Shustuft Crust to make Rushu's Palace key.

name: Streye Key Fragment
description: Collect the five key fragments from the forgotten islands of the Shustuft Crust to make Rushu's Palace key.

name: Destroyer Key Fragment
description: Collect the five key fragments from the forgotten islands of the Shustuft Crust to make Rushu's Palace key.

name: The Portal
description: You don't know where the finger that goes through this portal will end up, but it seems like a warm and inviting place.

name: Rushu Ring
description: Many scientists tried to figure out just how powerful Rushu was. No one had yet figured out that his power was limitless. A bit like you, I guess.

name: Rushu Ring
description: Many scientists tried to figure out just how powerful Rushu was. No one had yet figured out that his power was limitless. A bit like you, I guess.

name: Rushu Helmet
description: Wearing this helmet is an excellent remedy when you're feeling wrung out and hung over.

name: Rushu Helmet
description: Wearing this helmet is an excellent remedy when you're feeling wrung out and hung over.

name: Rushu Cloak
description: This cloak was forged by Rushu himself as protection from attacks from behind. You've inherited it, but no living soul would dare attack you from behind... or from the front for that matter.

name: Rushu Cloak
description: This cloak was forged by Rushu himself as protection from attacks from behind. You've inherited it, but no living soul would dare attack you from behind... or from the front for that matter.

name: Rushu Boots
description: When they hear your footsteps, your opponents will start to pray to the god of hatred and destruction, who is none other than yourself.

name: Rushu Boots
description: When they hear your footsteps, your opponents will start to pray to the god of hatred and destruction, who is none other than yourself.

name: Rushu Breastplate
description: It is impossible to put on or take off without cutting your arms. But it's not like you need your arms to destroy your opponents.

name: Rushu Breastplate
description: It is impossible to put on or take off without cutting your arms. But it's not like you need your arms to destroy your opponents.

name: Rushu Amulet
description: We don't know what this amulet represents, but one thing is certain: If it belonged to Rushu, it doesn't bode well for your competition.

name: Rushu Amulet
description: We don't know what this amulet represents, but one thing is certain: If it belonged to Rushu, it doesn't bode well for your competition.

name: Rushu Belt
description: The buckle at the front of this belt is perfect for gripping a defeated enemy and dragging them on the ground.

name: Rushu Belt
description: The buckle at the front of this belt is perfect for gripping a defeated enemy and dragging them on the ground.

name: Rushu Epaulettes
description: The magnetism in these epaulettes draws all your enemies to you at once. Very practical for putting an end to those miserable louts as quickly as possible.

name: Rushu Epaulettes
description: The magnetism in these epaulettes draws all your enemies to you at once. Very practical for putting an end to those miserable louts as quickly as possible.

name: Tatsus Shushu
description:
Tatsu the Xelor was a fervent defender of law and justice. Everyone liked him and thought he was very nice, that is until he made a pact with a demon called Gor'fab. He developed exceptional skill at the guitar, but the Shushu came with a curse that prevented everyone from laughing at his practical jokes. Thus, Tatsu made many, many enemies. Many still remember him as a naughty troublemaker.
Luckily for him, a few friends remained loyal and managed to lift he curse temporarily. They exiled Gor'fab and his accomplice, Kaietan, far from the World of Twelve.
What followed are adventures that I, your devoted servant, dare not tell in full without risk. But the moral of the story is that justice can be subjective, and no one likes Tatsu's songs.

name: Tatsus Shushu

What followed are adventures that I, your devoted servant, dare not tell in full without risk. But the moral of the story is that justice can be subjective, and no one likes Tatsu's songs.

name: Abyssal Trencher
description: This ax belonged to the god of war, violence, darkness and death. Yep, all that at once. Nope, we're not talking about Rushu. We're talking about an entity so terrible that his very presence is enough to send snow fleeing back into the clouds from which it fell. I guess you could call that snowflee instead of snowfall.

name: Abyssal Trencher
description: This ax belonged to the god of war, violence, darkness and death. Yep, all that at once. Nope, we're not talking about Rushu. We're talking about an entity so terrible that his very presence is enough to send snow fleeing back into the clouds from which it fell. I guess you could call that snowflee instead of snowfall.

name: Mysterious Blade
description: The Dofus Era and the Wakfu Era are separated by many long years. A closer look shows that very little remains. Many realities have been transformed by time, and once-factual tales have become fiction and legend. But among all these adventures, one thing remains unchanging and eternal: the tale of a Pandawa wielding a Dora Lagoole.

name: Mysterious Blade
description: The Dofus Era and the Wakfu Era are separated by many long years. A closer look shows that very little remains. Many realities have been transformed by time, and once-factual tales have become fiction and legend. But among all these adventures, one thing remains unchanging and eternal: the tale of a Pandawa wielding a Dora Lagoole.

name: Vylus Shushu
description:
They say that this shovel was mostly used to whack mischievous children. It was forged by an Ecaflip who behaved oddly. He was sometimes very friendly but had a few very questionable habits such as tying his servants to his radiator.
He wasn't a great warrior, but his mythic unpredictability has remained engraved in memory. Legend says that once, alone and circled by fearsome fighters, he took five opponents down with him before succumbing to his wounds.

name: Vylus Shushu
description:
They say that this shovel was mostly used to whack mischievous children. It was forged by an Ecaflip who behaved oddly. He was sometimes very friendly but had a few very questionable habits such as tying his servants to his radiator.
He wasn't a great warrior, but his mythic unpredictability has remained engraved in memory. Legend says that once, alone and circled by fearsome fighters, he took five opponents down with him before succumbing to his wounds.

name: The Aviolbow
description: This bow was forged by Aviola, a master musician obsessed with the parties in Bilbiza. The arrows it shoots make their targets dance until they drop. Some have died of exhaustion, but the effect wears off if the target drinks a cocktail.

name: The Aviolbow
description: This bow was forged by Aviola, a master musician obsessed with the parties in Bilbiza. The arrows it shoots make their targets dance until they drop. Some have died of exhaustion, but the effect wears off if the target drinks a cocktail.

name: The Augaromace
description: This mace has a legendary reputation. It was wielded by Augaroma, one of the most valiant warriors to ever live. She was a Lenald known for having broken the neals of all her enemies, and for being an accomplished illustrator who brought comfort to the eyes of many adventurers.

name: The Augaromace
description: This mace has a legendary reputation. It was wielded by Augaroma, one of the most valiant warriors to ever live. She was a Lenald known for having broken the neals of all her enemies, and for being an accomplished illustrator who brought comfort to the eyes of many adventurers.

name: Last Rest Scepter
description:
Whoever suffers the effects of this scepter will know profound, peaceful and eternal rest (in other words, death).
Make sure it's always pointed in the right direction.

name: Last Rest Scepter
description:
Whoever suffers the effects of this scepter will know profound, peaceful and eternal rest (in other words, death).
Make sure it's always pointed in the right direction.

name: Kraivus Shushu
description:
A thick veil of mystery surrounds all that now remains of one of the most enigmatic creatures in the World of Twelve that spent years striding across Moon Island and Xelorium.
Some say that Kraive was a great warrior who took part in epic tournaments, both organizing them and competing in them. Others say she was a painter who painted indescribable works of art. One final theory, and by far the most surprising, is that she was a mere chair, nothing more nothing less.
All that we know for sure is that we sometimes hear a phrase echoing through Ecaflipus: "I want my forum title"...

name: Kraivus Shushu
description:
A thick veil of mystery surrounds all that now remains of one of the most enigmatic creatures in the World of Twelve that spent years striding across Moon Island and Xelorium.
Some say that Kraive was a great warrior who took part in epic tournaments, both organizing them and competing in them. Others say she was a painter who painted indescribable works of art. One final theory, and by far the most surprising, is that she was a mere chair, nothing more nothing less.
All that we know for sure is that we sometimes hear a phrase echoing through Ecaflipus: "I want my forum title"...

name: End of Time Aegis
description: Sometimes moving forward, sometimes moving backward, the Krosmoz continues along its inexorable path to the end of everything.

name: End of Time Aegis

description: If you wield this dagger in conjunction with the Shadows of the Veiled Souls, it can defeat any Pandawa in solo combat.

description: This belt was cursed by a trickster spirit and now it has a real tendency to drop its wearer's clothing at the worst possible moment, like just when you're about to ask your boss for a raise.

description: You were warned, though. It's to be worn for five nights, five times per day!

name: Cursed Five Cawat Ring

name: Cursed High Priestess Belt
description: This belt keeps you in shape by sticking loads of huge spikes into your skin. Very painful, true, but also very effective.

description: This belt keeps you in shape by sticking loads of huge spikes into your skin. Very painful, true, but also very effective.

name: Cursed Janairo Helmet
description: This helmet once adorned the head of a lost gobball, or so the story says. He appeared suddenly in demon lands without any special signs. Since then, he sometimes travels in his dreams searching for the fields that made up his estate.

description: The cursed cloak of a cursed Cra.

description: The cursed cloak of a cursed Cra.

name: Cursed Abreastplate
description: Genius is no guarantee of a radiant future. The most enlightened in this world are also very tortured.

description: A reconnaissance mission went a bit too far, clearly.

name: Cursed Otomai's Scouts Greaves

name: Cursed Black Crow's Epaulettes
description: Rushu fears nothing, except maybe his own power.

name: Cursed Black Crow's Epaulettes

name: Rushu Beard
description: This beard has a certain charm.

name: Rushu's Palace Key
description: Many people thought that Rushu was just a myth or, at the very least, that the tales of his power were exaggerated. Now that you hold this key in your hands, you'll be able to verify just how misleading the stories are since the Lord of the Shadows is much stronger than the legends say.

name: Wakfu Wood
description: Right after you cut it, it begins to grow back. It's truly magic! Maybe if you combine several, yours will be even bigger.

name: 10-Year Hat
description: So much has happened since the start of the Wakfu Era!

name: 10-Year Cape
description: So much has happened since the start of the Wakfu Era!

name: The Constant
description: A mathematical constant, by definition, does not change. Life is still interesting because despite its rigid rules, you can see that something new happens at every moment in time. The saying "some things never change" simply needs to be constantly challenged.

name: The Constant
description: A mathematical constant, by definition, does not change. Life is still interesting because despite its rigid rules, you can see that something new happens at every moment in time. The saying "some things never change" simply needs to be constantly challenged.

name: Shustuft Crust Ultimate Rift Key
description: This key can be used to start a fight in the ultimate rift in the Shustuft Crust.

name: Common Demonic Wood
description: This wood has a slightly ashy smell that is characteristic of the Shustuft Crust.

name: Demonic Intemporal Dust
description: This powder might come from the Dofus Era... Its effects are surprising! It instantly ages anything it's mixed with. Magic, right?

name: Mount Zinit Peak Key
description:
This is where your journey ends. Everything you've been through so far has led you to the same objective: saving the World of Twelve from Ogrest's Chaos. Climbing Mount Zinit was just a taste of what's to come, because many adventurers have never returned.
Use this key to reach the Mount Zinit Summit and face Ogrest to prove you're the hero this world is waiting for!

name: Badgerox Key Fragment
description: Collect the four key fragments from Mount Zinit to make the Mount Zinit Peak key.

name: Dor'Mor Key Fragment
description: Collect the four key fragments from Mount Zinit to make the Mount Zinit Peak key.

name: Dreggon Key Fragment
description: Collect the four key fragments from Mount Zinit to make the Mount Zinit Peak key.

name: Ethernal Key Fragment
description: Collect the four key fragments from Mount Zinit to make the Mount Zinit Peak key.

name: Ogrest Hairs
description:
You got this clump of hair while grappling with Ogrest, don't you remember?
He gave you a good whack on the head in return. It goes without saying that that whack is probably why you don't remember your whack.

name: Age-Old Sword
description: Can this sword help you save everything that was and will be?

name: Age-Old Sword
description: Can this sword help you save everything that was and will be?

name: Great Age-Old Blade
description: This sword is so powerful that it is said to have once separated and then reunited two worlds.

name: Great Age-Old Blade
description: This sword is so powerful that it is said to have once separated and then reunited two worlds.

name: Age-Old Ax
description: A strange technology seems to have crafted these weapons. You might wonder where Ogrest got his hands on it.

name: Age-Old Ax
description: A strange technology seems to have crafted these weapons. You might wonder where Ogrest got his hands on it.

name: Age-Old Shovel
description: This shovel can be used for two things: digging small graves for your enemies, and making your enemies stay there forever more.

name: Age-Old Shovel
description: This shovel can be used for two things: digging small graves for your enemies, and making your enemies stay there forever more.

name: Age-Old Scepter
description: It shines a little brighter at night, so it will light your way and guide all the monsters in the area toward you.

name: Age-Old Scepter
description: It shines a little brighter at night, so it will light your way and guide all the monsters in the area toward you.

name: Age-Old Hammer
description: According to a legend from another world, this magical hammer is an ultra-powerful divine weapon. It is used to protect the universe from chaos and especially from giants. That should teach Ogrest a lesson, if you can even lift the thing.

name: Age-Old Hammer
description: According to a legend from another world, this magical hammer is an ultra-powerful divine weapon. It is used to protect the universe from chaos and especially from giants. That should teach Ogrest a lesson, if you can even lift the thing.

name: Great Age-Old Staff
description: This staff is a remnant of the wisdom of the ancients, but not even the greatest of sages could have soothed and contained Ogrest's sorrow.

name: Great Age-Old Staff
description: This staff is a remnant of the wisdom of the ancients, but not even the greatest of sages could have soothed and contained Ogrest's sorrow.

name: Age-Old Bow
description: Arrows shot from this bow leave a ray of light floating behind them, so it's a must-have for intrepid navigators.

name: Age-Old Bow
description: Arrows shot from this bow leave a ray of light floating behind them, so it's a must-have for intrepid navigators.

name: Age-Old Cards
description: These magical cards are so powerful that you can stop cheating and you'll still win.

name: Age-Old Cards
description: These magical cards are so powerful that you can stop cheating and you'll still win.

name: Age-Old Wand
description: The age-old wand has a fascinating characteristic. If you use it as a makoffee stirrer, not only will your drink taste better, but the wand will even leave a little drawing in the cream, such as a heart, a star, or a piwi's head. It's a must for all baristas worthy of the name.

name: Age-Old Clock Hand
description: This clock hand has been around the block more times than you can count. Assuming you know how to count, of course.

name: Age-Old Clock Hand

description: Despite this artifact's age, the only things that will turn to dust are the enemies you'll meet on your adventure.

name: Age-Old Dagger

description: This beautiful wall made of wood will make your interior much nicer.

name: Excarnal Potion
description: All your adventures in the Wild Estate have convinced you of one thing: You must go up against Excarnus and his army of reincarnated gobballs. This potion turns you into an excarnate and lets you enter his lair. Give it everything you've got if you want to stay alive!

name: Full Moon
description: This moon-shaped little bell is feared throughout the Sadida Kingdom. Many have tried to use it, very few have come back. Take your courage (and this bell) in both hands and head into Milkar's lair. The bell is sure to wake the Moowolf himself!

name: The Black Crow's Lair Symbol
description: It is said that this rod decorated with the Black Crow's feathers can be used to summon him by waving it at his peak on Kelba Island. Get ready, as you're about to fight one of the most wanted men in the World of Twelve!

name: The Gobbalrog's Lair Key
description: The touch of this key makes you feel capable of withstanding the most extreme heat. Head to the Brakmar volcano to cool Magmog down because it's time to show that two-bit gobball who's boss!

name: Dragon Pig's Den Key
description: This key grants access to the dungeon at the bottom of Dragon Pig Island, where it is said that he lives... and destroys all his opponents one by one. Head to the Thicket of Yurbut, and have a good stretch, because you're about to challenge the greatest boxer in the World of Twelve!

name: High Wind Plateau Symbol
description: Your efforts all over the World of Twelve are finally paying off. Use this standard to call Steel Beak to the High Wind Plateau and show all Twelvians what you're made of!

name: Moon Totem
description: Your adventures across Moon Island didn't leave you indifferent. And the outcome is that you finally have the Top of Giant Totem key. You'll be able to free Moon from his curse and see whether the legends about his immeasurable power are true!

name: Nogord Wungleezared's Lair Key
description: This bust in the shape of a prismatic dragon appears to be a key that will let you fight the strongest of them all by going to his era. Your experience with the divine dimensions is undisputed, so it's time to go up against the great Nogord Wungleezared!

name: Shadowed Potion
description: One of the greatest Major Shushus has stolen part of your shadow. After asking around, you heard about a ring that is said to make cackling noises in Wagnar's Castle basement. Go there to challenge Shadofang, because it's time to prove to the world that you're a true legend!

name: Raw Feca Incantation
description: This talisman was made from Feca's Aegis. It will protect you from the Trool Academy's influence for a certain amount of time.

name: Solid Feca Incantation
description: This talisman was made from Feca's Aegis. It will protect you from the influence of Alkatrool for some time.

name: Durable Feca Incantation
description: This talisman was made from Feca's Aegis. It will protect you from the influence of the Tormentor Pit for some time.

name: Arcus Shushu
description: A real tactical throw weapon, the hunters use it when hunting in the Shustuft Crust.

name: Brutus Shushu
description: As heavy as it is imposing, this great mass will put off all but the most foolhardy of adventurers. However, Moskito hunting could be little taxing.

name: Cartus Shushu
description: When these cards are cast, new ones will immediately appear in the hands of their owner. With practice, you will also be able to use them to slice your enemies into little slivers.

name: Excavatus Shushu
description: Useful for digging the graves of your enemies, just the site of this shovel is sometimes enough to make your enemies dig their own.

name: Frappus Shushu
description: When you stick this staff violently in the ground, all the creatures in the nearby area fall asleep. However, we don't advise you use it around children.

name: Glaivus Shushu
description: Able to pierce through even the most resistant armor, his blade is formed from two blocks held together by Victus's own saliva.

name: Martus Shushu
description: Those who have noticed the shock wave that is emitted with each blow don't tend to live long enough to tell the tale. That said, some clever observers also use it to shake fruit down from trees or catch fish.

name: Picus Shushu
description: Despite its mortal qualities, a simple flourish with this is all it takes to scare your target stiff. Only its owner is immune to its portal.

name: Tigus Shushu
description: Once you've mastered this wand, the energy that binds it to its bearer means it can be also used as a boomerang.

name: Tranchus Shushu
description: Lightly built, this is the ideal axe to chop everything that moves into smithereens. It is so resistant, some Enutrofs even use it to cut through rocks when they're mining for precious stones.

name: Tormented Essence
description: A terrifying essence that only the boldest can handle!

name: Adventure Stone
description: This stone can be obtained in adventure dungeons (four rooms). You have to be the right level to obtain it as loot.

name: Balance Stone
description: This stone can be obtained in balanced dungeons (three rooms). You have to be the right level to obtain it as loot.

name: Speed Stone
description: This stone can be obtained in quick dungeons (two rooms). You have to be the right level to obtain it as loot.

name: Companionship Stone
description: This stone can be obtained in three-player dungeons.

name: Ultimate Stone
description: This stone can be obtained from Ultimate Bosses.

name: Palablue Ring

His helmets are said to have saved many a coastal guard from cwab and kokonut attacks.
