description: Direct, logical, and sometimes a bit curt, Harry often impressed strangers with his sharply stated opinions. But those who got to know him a bit better also knew him to be a wise and kindly person who put body and soul into the causes he cared most about.

name: Zaza's Boots
description:
In the era that followed Ogrest's Chaos, there was a great Amaknian merchant by the name of Zaza. With the help of his loyal allies, he pushed back against the Amaknian ministries with wisdom and diplomacy to adopt fair and just laws for the people of the World of Twelve. His pricing policies were studied by economists. His goods were well-designed and long-lasting. His garments were silky smooth and a delight to wear. He will forever be considered one of the Wakfu Era's most beloved merchants.
One day, having established a climate of confidence and trust among the merchants of Amakna, he disappeared to seek out new adventure in Vulkania.
Some say he went there to pick strawberries, but no one ever went to Vulkania to check.

description: This unusual-looking ring was once worn by a certain mischievous Huppermage. Cunning, wise, and yet also very generous, he often called his friends together to play cards. His legendary clumsiness lost him many a game. After all, it's much harder to win when you're dropping your cards all the time.

name: Baba's Epaulettes
description: Once upon a time, there was a young adventurer with many positive qualities. He was valiant, altruistic, and calm to all appearances, but hid a deep malaise within that was slowly eating away at him. Despite his strong attachment to Sufokia, living close to the port rekindled a rare illness that left him unable to tolerate the salt and iodine that fill the air there. He eventually left to seek out new horizons: someplace with shifting ground underfoot and mountains ringing the horizon.

name: Bombyxolite Sword
description: This unmatched blade is legendary... But perhaps you've heard the same of other weapons. With Ogrest's Chaos, it can be difficult to sort fact from fiction. The links between legend and reality aren't always easy to authenticate. It takes extensive work to piece together all the historical elements of the World of Twelve. Luckily, there are numerous methods for getting your bearings in the mishmash of mythical and forgotten artifacts. Exceptional skills and expertise are needed to establish a timeline and render a meaning and identity to each object.

description: While wearing this helmet, you won't see anything around you. It's difficult for any adventurer to travel the world and fight while blind. You should get really ingenious and rely on your other senses to overcome your trials. Through intuition and determination, you'll emerge victorious. In a way, accomplishing something so difficult will make you even better.

name: Nono Ring
description: If you feed it little nails, this ring will grant incredible strength.

name: Nono Ring
description: If you feed it little nails, this ring will grant incredible strength.

name: Odysseus Jazerant
description: Usually comes with a retro-rocket system, a shield gauntlet, and a sword containing a laser gun.

name: Odysseus Jazerant

name: Wambo's Ammo-Belt

name: Capeybara
description: Besides making you utterly serene to everyone around you, this textile will boost your adorableness.

name: Capeybara

name: Infected Necklace
description: Warning: Do not ingest any of its secretions.

name: Infected Necklace
description: Warning: Do not ingest any of its secretions.

name: Genetically Modified Armor
description: Patented for your protection... and the patent holder's material gain.

name: Genetically Modified Armor
description: Patented for your protection... and the patent holder's material gain.

name: Armor of Trust
description:
Trust is a complex concept. Like a delicate flower, it needs a fertile soil of transparency, loyalty, and honesty to fully bloom. Some consider trust a valuable form of currency, to be invested in those who demonstrate their reliability over time. Others can be stingier, jealously guarding every morsel of trust like a well-hidden treasure.

It's interesting to see how certain stubborn souls will struggle to give their trust away, even to their closest friends. When dealing with such individuals, building trust can seem like navigating an emotional minefield, requiring great patience and understanding.

But in the delicate balance of trust and distrust, you just have to ignore them. Sticks and stones, as they say...

name: Nowera Boots
description: You'll keep away from danger if no whereabouts are traced back to you.

name: Nowera Boots
description: You'll keep away from danger if no whereabouts are traced back to you.

name: Cursed Ankle Boots
description: These have a strong smell. Maybe it's the terrible curse of their wearer, or maybe it's something else...

name: Cursed Ankle Boots
description: These have a strong smell. Maybe it's the terrible curse of their wearer, or maybe it's something else...

name: Circular Bandages
description: These bandages may start to crawl up your hand, then your arm, and finally your whole body.

name: Circular Bandages

name: Parasiticasque
description: It seems ironic to call someone a parasite after using their skull as equipment.

name: Parasiticasque
description: It seems ironic to call someone a parasite after using their skull as equipment.

name: Parasitail

name: Tal Kasha's Hair
description: Hair from Tal Kasha's head.

name: Tomb Horus
description: You may be confused for the sky or the sun while wearing this. Be the bigger person and don't correct them.

name: Tomb Horus
description: You may be confused for the sky or the sun while wearing this. Be the bigger person and don't correct them.

name: Talisman Go
description: Despite the relentless passage of time, the blazing light from this amulet hasn't faded. It glistens and will long continue to glisten, in honor of the brightest and most misunderstood warrior of all time.

name: Talisman Go
description: Despite the relentless passage of time, the blazing light from this amulet hasn't faded. It glistens and will long continue to glisten, in honor of the brightest and most misunderstood warrior of all time.

name: Tal Kasha's Broadsword
description: The handle is very soft to the touch, but holding it for too long could plunge you into an eternal slumber.

name: Zams's Buskins
description:
You can't deny the power of the spoken word. Zams knew this well, from her diminutive vantage point. That passion is what took her beyond words' use in simple day-to-day communication. She was especially attuned to music and the arts in general, and therein lay her unique power.

In her small village, Zams was known as an exceptional storyteller. She didn't need a booming voice, for her words alone captivated her audience. She knew how to imagine herself in the stories she told; beyond simply describing them, she experienced them vividly. Her words weren't merely heard, they were intensely felt by those listening.

Though her views could seem farfetched at times, the world will never forget her storytelling prowess. She had a unique way of imbuing words with emotion and making them resonate in others' hearts like no one else. Her words left an indelible mark on those who had the privilege to hear them.

name: Pelisthmus
description: Careful not to lose the middle section. You'd look pretty silly holding two pieces of cloak.

name: Pelisthmus

name: Tal Kasha Nemes
description: Will make you look supremely classy, but it smells a bit rank.

name: Tal Kasha Nemes
description: Will make you look supremely classy, but it smells a bit rank.

name: Funeral Mane
description: Needs to be brushed from tip to root every day. That way it'll stay pliable and you won't get stuck. Apparently, doing so will also give it a euphoric feeling, if a mere cloak can even experience emotions...

name: Eternal Stripes
description: They're very sturdy, but they don't attach to the shoulders.

name: Eternal Stripes
description: They're very sturdy, but they don't attach to the shoulders.

name: Tal Kasha's Gaiters
description: Tal Kasha was always fond of equipment that had a good side weighed against a bad side. Take these gaiters, which keep your ankles looking nice and slim, but once equipped, are almost impossible to take off.

name: Tal Kasha's Gaiters
description: Tal Kasha was always fond of equipment that had a good side weighed against a bad side. Take these gaiters, which keep your ankles looking nice and slim, but once equipped, are almost impossible to take off.

name: Tomb Cord
description: This was originally intended to hold up an ordinary round-the-waist belt. It's been used in different ways by each new owner over the years, ultimately serving to store a collection of Crobak feathers.

name: Tomb Cord
description: This was originally intended to hold up an ordinary round-the-waist belt. It's been used in different ways by each new owner over the years, ultimately serving to store a collection of Crobak feathers.

name: Morgouz's Epaulettes
description:
From the bottomless well that is Twelvians' good nature, rises the wide frame of a contagiously good-natured cook.

Often admired for his explosive repartee, the ancestral mastery he demonstrated in his craft was truly staggering. It's said he made his weapons right in the kitchen, always accompanied by a loyal acolyte known only for her kindness.

Senior-level Twelvians will remember them for their legendary preparation of muvegitants and sandyoptera, which many still clamor for today.

name: Morgouz's Epaulettes
description:
From the bottomless well that is Twelvians' good nature, rises the wide frame of a contagiously good-natured cook.

Often admired for his explosive repartee, the ancestral mastery he demonstrated in his craft was truly staggering. It's said he made his weapons right in the kitchen, always accompanied by a loyal acolyte known only for her kindness.

Senior-level Twelvians will remember them for their legendary preparation of muvegitants and sandyoptera, which many still clamor for today.

name: Ermina's Ring
description:
They say the pearl inside it produces such a bright warm light that it can guide an adventurer over long distances - a trick that would be a perfect match for the worthy cook it makes reference to.

Naturally affable, Ermina was remembered for her affable nature and constant goodwill toward her loved ones. Far beyond those human qualities, she also formed a close duo with one of her companions, whom legends only describe as broad-shouldered. Their impact on the world is unquestionable, and many a Twelvian still relish their signature dish, made from sandyoptera and muvegitants.

name: Necwotized Heawt
description: It's amusing that the changes made to Zwombbits resulted in the use of their organs being altered. Now their heawt is only good for collecting their earwax.

name: Pyram Belt
description: The eye represents divine omniscience. It signifies that Tal Kasha can see all despite being in an eternal slumber.

name: Pyram Belt
description: The eye represents divine omniscience. It signifies that Tal Kasha can see all despite being in an eternal slumber.

name: Key to Tal Kasha's Tomb
description: It would seem this pyramidal tuning key gives you the chance to challenge Tal Kasha. But be prepared, as you'll face an absolute terror in her pyramid that's lain hidden for centuries.

name: Lenald Key Fragment
description: Collect all five cursed key fragments to craft the key to Tal Kasha's tomb.

name: Lenald Tabi
description: These shoes are particularly comfy; walking feels very natural, as if you weren't wearing anything.

name: Epollenettes
description: The pollen on these epaulettes brings you back to those warm spring days filled with endless sneezing and nose-blowing. If you're not careful, you could unleash an environmental disaster with all the tissues that'll need to be used.

name: Artichokane
description: But... That's a leek!

name: Pompom Shield
description: Cushions blows from falls or bounces.

name: Wambomulet
description: Before wearing his trademark bandana, Wambo proudly wore this amulet for outings in public.

name: Full-Circle Loop
description: You think you've seen it all and then, bam! Suddenly you come full circle. Search as you might, there's no end in sight...

name: The Day's Edge
description: Excessive use of this sword may corrupt the owner's soul. It embodies the duality between light and dark, reminiscent of a legendary symbol to which balance-seeking adventurers are drawn.

name: Zwombbit Torso
description: This torso is putrid and covered in filthy hairs, but that doesn't stop you from wearing it because it assures unparalleled close-combat protection.

name: Genetically Modified Belt
description: This torso is putrid and covered in filthy hairs, but that doesn't stop you from wearing it because it assures unparalleled close-combat protection.

name: Wa Wabbit's Cwown
description: The legendary Wa Wabbit's Cwown! Finally in your clutches! You know you were hoping to try it on at least once in your life as an adventurer, don't pretend you weren't.

name: Gauwd Cloak
description: Pewfect fow making an impwovised sheltew undewgwound.

name: Acidic Slobber
description: Careful: If you drop some on your clothes, you'll never get the stain out!

name: Necromized Skin Sample
description: Careful not to let it flake!

description: Despite the name, this headgear does not easily stick to itself.

description: Its function is rather limited since being corrupted. At best, it may protect you from evil spirits from time to time, if you're lucky.

name: Corrupted Hero Headgear
description: Having too much power will go to your head. And that can trigger nausea, evil grinning, and various other side effects... So, arm yourself with humility before you don this headgear.

description: Can get stretched out from overuse, like how you feel after that week from the Shustuft Crust at your job.

description: Its violet hue evokes the crystalline reflections of a lavender sea.

name: Necroworld Crystal
description: Its violet hue evokes the crystalline reflections of a lavender sea.

name: Necromized Necromic Signet Ring of the Necroworld
description: There's quite a mystery surrounding the people who made this ring. No one knows who they are or where they come from.

description: There's quite a mystery surrounding the people who made this ring. No one knows who they are or where they come from.

name: Contrescutcheon
description: The more Wakfu there is, the more Necros there are. But the more Necros there are, the less Wakfu there is. Ergo, the more Wakfu there is, the less Wakfu there is.

name: Infernal Feca Incantation
description: This talisman was made from Feca's Aegis. It will protect you from the pressure of the Necroworld for a certain amount of time.

name: Necro Fragment
description: This fragment seems to come from another world.

name: Necro Stone
description: This stone seems to contain powerful magic from another world. Handle with care!

description: This sublimation fits into a relic item to increase the wearer's stats.

name: Time Control
description: This sublimation fits into a relic item to increase the wearer's stats.

name: Measure III
description: This rune fits into an epic item to increase the wearer's stats.

name: Epic and Relic Sublimation Pouch
description: Open this pouch and behold the gift within!

name: Sufokian Lucky Charm
description: The kind of thing you'd find in a Sufokia souvenir shop. It's made from a shell found on some beach and a piece of rope. This one appears to contain a marble packed with a lethal amount of Stasis.

name: Primitive Scale
description: It's as cold and hard as your mother-in-law's heart.

name: Ferocious Fossil
description: Don't look it in the eye for too long, because you never know.

name: Wingstone Shard
description: Thunderbolts guaranteed!

name: Ferociraptor Beak
description: The jaws are still moving ever so slightly, which is probably a reptilian reflex...

name: Primal Skin
description: You haven't yet seen its animal side.

name: Primount Tail
description: Once again, you find yourself disgusted and unsettled by a random monster chunk.

name: Imagoribs
description: A bitter maniok salad, Imagoribs with herbs and spices, and citronana flambé for dessert make for the best barbecue spread in the whole World of Twelve.

name: Primal Rock
description: This rock touches something deep in your soul. It moves you. It affects you. It puts you in a state of serenity and calm that you've never experienced before.

name: Celestial Flake
description: No one knows what the drawing on this ear is supposed to represent.

name: Vesperal Tusk
description: At night, the little symbols glow in the dark.

name: Crocodyl Skull
description: This sinister-looking crocodyl skull seems to have been used by Timo for some unknown scheme.

name: Starvannah Tuft
description: Do not, under any circumstances, place this hair in a red bucket filled with water. The consequences could be disastrous for the whole World of Twelve. There's already enough going on with Ogrest's Chaos.

name: Rusted Metal
description: Crafted from unknown materials, this piece of metal, all eaten away by rust, leaves you feeling bitter and sad. At first glance, you can see the fragile nature and deterioration through years of work and battles... Unless that's just your reflection.

name: Tick Intockt
description: This tick can absorb Wakfu using the machinery that comes with it. Once the wearer takes it off, it won't be of much use, but you'll look quite classy if you use it as a toothpick.

name: Water Clock
description: It might seem surprising to find such an item in Protozetime. But when you stop to think about it, Nox isn't the only slightly unhinged Xelor who wants to regulate his machinery using a water clock... It's both exciting and terrifying to think that such a fragile item could serve as something decorative while being the centerpiece of a new chaos descending on the world.

name: Pipedream Tube
description: In Nox's machinery, the circulation of Wakfu follows a very precise protocol: from top to bottom in a clockwise motion. It would be a well-oiled machine if the various tubes and pipes all worked as they should. But perhaps that's just a pipe dream.

name: Carminite Gem
description: There's a wicked energy within this gem.

name: Primitive Statuette
description: A rough-hewn statuette of some sort of female figure.

name: Zulnara Ribbon
description: Almost as soft and delicate as its owner.

name: Clan Emblem
description: A unique symbol has been meticulously embroidered on this emblem.

name: Ancestral Essence
description: This essence contains monsters' souls, and can instill their power into almost all types of items.

name: Ancestral Tiramisoup
description: This Tiramisoup lets you make lovely little dishes.

name: Ancestral Flour
description: This flour is used to make good, warm bread.

name: Ancestral Steel
description: This steel is used to craft weapons, breastplates, epaulettes and shields.

name: Ancestral String
description: This string is used to craft headgear and helmets, but also amulets and rings.

name: Ancestral Plank
description: This plank is used to make furniture, armor, or weapons.

name: Ancestral Fiber
description: This fiber is mainly used to craft capes and headgear.

name: Ancestral Leather
description: This leather is mainly used to craft boots, belts, and bags.

name: Ancestral Handle
description: This handle is mainly used to make weapons.

name: Ancestral Spice
description: This spice is used to make lovely little dishes.

name: Ancestral Oil
description: This oil is used to make good, rich bread, and to fry your ingredients to prepare dishes.

name: Ancestral Gem
description: This gem is mainly used to craft rings and amulets.

name: Ancestral Plate
description: This plate is mainly used to make breastplates, epaulettes, and shields.

name: Ancestral Orb
description: The power this orb contains is unmatched in the World of Twelve.

name: Ancestral Bracket
description: This bracket is used in all types of woodwork.

name: Ancestral Feca Incantation
description: This talisman was made from Feca's Aegis. It will protect you from the power of Nox's henchmen for some time.

name: Ancestral Souper-Glou
description: Souper-Glou is the ideal ingredient to assemble your items. You can get it as a reward for the level 231 to 245 Environmental Quests.

name: Sea Boss
description: Its meat is juicy, tender, and delicious. But beware: Eating too much Sea Boss can lead to severe stomach aches, especially when it regenerates and comes back to life to chew on your entrails.

name: Ull-Timmit Sea Boss
description: This fish doesn't look like most ordinary fish. If you ran into one in some sort of lair with magic pillars, you'd swear it was an Ultimate Boss.

name: Lunafish
description: Glows both day and night. Makes your heart feel warm and bright.

name: Moonafish
description: Some people would never think to moon a fish. Then there's you.

name: Bloodiflower
description: This leaf exudes a gentle aroma of grilled api.

name: Bloodiflortune
description: Brings happiness and prosperity to those who eat it.

name: Grambo Root
description: This root could be quite edible, if only it tasted completely different.

name: Bitter Root
description: Its bitterness is beyond measure. But its nutritional value is above average among the World of Twelve's crops.

name: Zircomet
description: This comet seems to react when exposed to Wakfu.

name: Diromnathyst
description: This ore is so heavily charged with Wakfu that it can supposedly cure any affliction.

name: Fragmonnite
description: As you hold this unique ore in your hands, you can't help thinking that it used to be host to a unique form of life.

name: Ex-Lex
description: "If you don't have range-boosting headgear, you're nobody," a famous Cra once said. The quote resonated for many years, never failing to amuse Iops, Srams, and Ouginaks when they gathered in Amakna's inns to tease and mock the other classes. The Cra, named Lex, buried himself out of sheer shame and gradually fossilized over time. Now all that's left is this bit of ex-Lex.

name: Primaniola
description: In the beginning was this flower.

name: Maniola
description: This rare, precious flower grows on islands charged with Wakfu.

name: Rozen
description: Some magic spell or scientific experiment has turned this once thorny and dangerous plant into a flower of rare beauty.

name: Sun-Drenched Rozen
description: Prolonged exposure to the sun's rays has turned it into a flower that's as unique and majestic as it is fragile. It crumbles to dust within minutes after it's cut.

name: Astracacia
description: Its fruit shines in the night.

name: Moon of Changing Eras
description: When dawn lightens the horizon, brandish this wood in the direction of the sun. It will then take an hour longer than usual to rise, extending the nighttime darkness and driving morning people mad.

name: Luzyl
description: This firm, solid wood is very difficult to cut. Its sap is delicious when blended with Moogrr milk, but it's toxic and potentially deadly if not heated before drinking.

name: Lazu-Luzyl
description: This wood has a bluish sheen that's invisible to the naked eye.

name: Primitive Headgear
description: Is it the original or a derivative? Only mathematicians know.

name: Primitive Headgear
description: Is it the original or a derivative? Only mathematicians know.

name: Primitive Headgear
description: Is it the original or a derivative? Only mathematicians know.

name: Wingulet
description: Team up with someone and pull on the wingtips. When the amulet breaks, whoever ends up with the biggest piece can make a wish.

name: Wingulet
description: Team up with someone and pull on the wingtips. When the amulet breaks, whoever ends up with the biggest piece can make a wish.

name: Wingulet
description: Team up with someone and pull on the wingtips. When the amulet breaks, whoever ends up with the biggest piece can make a wish.

name: Sharpened Claws
description: These aren't very practical for walking on.

name: Sharpened Claws
description: These aren't very practical for walking on.

name: Sharpened Claws
description: These aren't very practical for walking on.

name: Crazy Breastplate
description: It already passed its madness on to all its previous owners, so it doesn't have enough left to influence you.

name: Crazy Breastplate
description: It already passed its madness on to all its previous owners, so it doesn't have enough left to influence you.

name: Crazy Breastplate

name: Sdisse Helmet
description: This helmet was forged by an incredibly friendly and strong-willed little adventurer, the kind you just don't see anymore. He headed out for adventure a few days before his village had the chance to say goodbye, and they missed him terribly. He carries with him a map of the World of Twelve signed by all of his friends, and by the goddess Pandawa herself.

name: Nightcap
description:
The next time you have a fever, try this old Moogrr breeder's remedy, known as the "three-hat technique":
1) Place hat on bedside table
2) Lie down in bed
3) Drink some bamboo milk
4) Sip and repeat until you see three hats on the table
5) Fall asleep
The next day, you'll be cured!

description: Those who reach their twilight years leave their burdens to the next generation. You'd swear these epaulettes weigh as much as the whole world. But that weight comes solely from the thoughts and emotions of those who came before. Keep moving forward, and keep giving back.

name: Termite Belt
description: Gigantic termites once lived among the rocks of the Misty Isle Savannah. Unfortunately, this species was displaced by the Marvelous Chimera and went extinct. It's just natural selection... or as natural as anything imposed by the design team can be.

description: In isolation, in darkness, or even in the happiness of time spent with others, there is only one memorial service: that of the first sovereign who ever reigned.

name: Sinister Torso
description: Hearts overflowing with affection, love, and empathy can get trapped by the vengeful spirit residing in this breastplate. To regain positive feelings and avoid becoming inveterately sorrowful, a specific incantation must be recited in front of a tombstone: "Here lies my spinning top, I commit to tomorrow's event, and I shall come accompanied by a sun and three Stubbyobs."

name: Lone One
description: Some people like being on their own so much that they do everything they can to be unique. Other people try to become unique (without really knowing why) but end up regretting being all alone.

description: It's not Zuri; it's Kapezuri.

name: Tour Yst
description: There are good and bad Tour Ysts. Good ones enjoy discovering new things and seek out genuine local experiences while respecting customs and culture. Bad ones elbow their fellow travelers on the drago-express without apologizing, speak and shout in their own language at the local inn, and are always disheartened when they see so many people at major tour yst attractions.

name: The Vengerouses
description: Both vengeful and dangerous, the Vengerouses are the latest addition to the family of accessories whose names are formed by merging two existing names.

name: The Vengerouses
description: Both vengeful and dangerous, the Vengerouses are the latest addition to the family of accessories whose names are formed by merging two existing names.

name: Cathode-Ray Helmet
description: The screen on this helmet shows your facial emotions. However, the image quality is questionable, so it's safe to assume that this was Nox's first attempt at creating his own jellivision. It didn't take long for the Clockmaker to improve the sharpness and colors of his experiment, which went on to be a huge technological breakthrough for the World of Twelve.

name: The Chokeminute
description: The gear on this choker rotates at a constant speed. The glass in the middle lights up when it makes one full revolution. So, it would have been easy to determine its rotational speed in revolutions per minute if it didn't tend to accelerate frantically every three revolutions.

description: With these boots on, you'll add thirty years to your age in the eyes of the local population. Which is great if you want to pass for a Xelor retiree.

name: LED Breastplate
description: The screen on this breastplate is a technological marvel: energy saving, brighter, more intense colors, and even panoramic viewing angles. You feel a great deal of excitement as you put the breastplate on and turn it on with trembling hands... only to find out that it never actually worked. CRTs are forever.

name: Gem Ring
description: The gem within this ring is said to be capable of projecting a hologram based on a kind of synergy between the wearer's thoughts, their Wakfu, and the ring's energy. Some people even believe this synergy has a consciousness of its own that can communicate using an unknown form of technomagic. When they listen carefully, apparently they can hear a phrase among its gibberish saying, "My name is JEM. And for all those I treasure, my name is JEM!" Could it be a collective hallucination or a hidden message? It's up to you to find out.

name: Mekape 3.5
description: Several versions of this cape were created. Sylargh used the first one to craft his machines. Only slight improvements were made to subsequent versions, with a change of name and then appearance to arrive at version 3.5. It is now more ergonomic, fashionable, and powerful, having nothing in common with its original version. So why keep updating the old one if it's completely new?

name: The Cogs of Time
description: Destiny's path is set in stone. Time, on the other hand, is less stable. The laws governing the World of Twelve don't regulate it, except through Xelor's inscrutable sorcery. And so his followers created cogs, in order to achieve balance and stabilize the course of time. For most mortals, it's a simple mechanism used for one of the most abstract laws in the world. For followers of Xelor, it's a crucial step on the way to their destiny.

name: The Cogs of Time
description: Destiny's path is set in stone. Time, on the other hand, is less stable. The laws governing the World of Twelve don't regulate it, except through Xelor's inscrutable sorcery. For followers of Xelor, it's a crucial step on the way to their destiny.

name: Toodles
description: Toodles is no ordinary belt. It can't be worn, and it moves on its own. It can hold four items of any kind that can help you at any point during your adventure, but it spends its time hiding from you. To get it to come to you, just shout, "OH TOODLES!" as loud as you can with your fellow adventurers. You'll hear the sound of a bell in response to your calling it, and the belt will be happy to give you the items you need. Ultimately, it's just a little machine that wants a bit of attention.

name: The Dial
description: Sometimes it's hard to find similarities between an item's name and appearance. You can engage in conjecture, taking wild guesses the world over. Well, that's not the case for this helmet. You'll quickly notice that it's made up of several lines inside a circle, forming a perfect dial. Who says a dial has to have 12 hours?

name: The Pendulum
description: The water clock on this amulet has a perpetual pendulum movement. Is it due to its weight or your own nervousness as you imagine seeing the pendulum stop swinging? This amulet alone may yet teach you patience and self-control.

name: The Pendulum
description: The water clock on this amulet has a perpetual pendulum movement. Is it due to its weight or your own nervousness as you imagine seeing the pendulum stop swinging? This amulet alone may yet teach you patience and self-control.

name: Second Hands
description: Each Second Hand is set to move you one foot forward every second, no more, no less. They are synchronized for perfect reciprocating movement, compelling the wearer to be extremely punctual. Now you'll have no excuse for being late for an important appointment.

name: Second Hands
description: Each Second Hand is set to move you one foot forward every second, no more, no less. They are synchronized for perfect reciprocating movement, compelling the wearer to be extremely punctual. Now you'll have no excuse for being late for an important appointment.

name: The Mainspring
description: This charged breastplate is able to store the surrounding Wakfu and then redistribute it throughout its machinery. The exact mechanism underlying this system remains a mystery.

name: The Mainspring
description: This charged breastplate is able to store the surrounding Wakfu and then redistribute it throughout its machinery. The exact mechanism underlying this system remains a mystery.

name: The Time Rewinder
description: Turning back time is a power we all wish we had, whether it's to correct a past mistake or relive a magical moment over and over again. Turning the rewinding key on the time rewinder takes you back in time at a rate of one second per turn. You'll have to be quick and resilient to get anything out of this ring, because it seems to break after the first time you use it.

name: The Time Rewinder

Turning the rewinding key on the time rewinder takes you back in time at a rate of one second per turn. You'll have to be quick and resilient to get anything out of this ring, because it seems to break after the first time you use it.

name: The Resonator
description: Physical and mental balance is a fundamental principle in the Krosmoz. This belt was created to help with the former. It keeps you stable and upright in any situation or adventure. Now, armed with your belt, it's up to you to find your inner serenity. Then, you alone will have exemplified the paroxysm of mind-body balance, AKA harmony.

name: The Resonator
description: Physical and mental balance is a fundamental principle in the Krosmoz. This belt was created to help with the former. It keeps you stable and upright in any situation or adventure. Now, armed with your belt, it's up to you to find your inner serenity. Then, you alone will have exemplified the paroxysm of mind-body balance, AKA harmony.

name: The Complication
description: Nox used to be complacent in complicating his life with horological complications. That was the cause that led him to create this cloak. He designed it as a calendar mechanism, with copious components compacted. It would become an utterly complex complication. The clockmaker finally got it to work by combining several compasses in small compartments located completely at random. Reflexively, he named his original composition "Complication".

name: The Complication
description: Nox used to be complacent in complicating his life with horological complications. That was the cause that led him to create this cloak. He designed it as a calendar mechanism, with copious components compacted. It would become an utterly complex complication. The clockmaker finally got it to work by combining several compasses in small compartments located completely at random. Reflexively, he named his original composition "Complication".

name: Split-Second Hands
description: How can you calculate the time interval between two actions? This question tormented the Clockmaker as he stared intently at his dials in search of a solution. Just as he was on the verge of inventing a new horological complication, he created two split-second hands. A small jolt makes them move to the next mark. It's a simple yet sufficient solution to calculate the time interval between a split-second hand and the second hand.

description: How can you calculate the time interval between two actions? This question tormented the Clockmaker as he stared intently at his dials in search of a solution. Just as he was on the verge of inventing a new horological complication, he created two split-second hands. A small jolt makes them move to the next mark. It's a simple yet sufficient solution to calculate the time interval between a split-second hand and the second hand.

name: Cloakinaut
description:
Papinaut was a brutal and merciless Sacrier who was unmatched when it came to destroying his enemies in a tempest of violence.
The same can't be said of Papinaut, the patient and mild-mannered Bonta mayor of the same name. That Papinaut made many key contributions to the World of Twelve's development with numerous revolutionary ideas and bold, courageous choices. Some of the firm stances he took earned him equally powerful reactions from the populace.
A third Papinaut also drew attention over the years. He was an eminent strategist and tactician who was always a few steps ahead. His one fault? He tended to talk a lot when people asked him questions. Perhaps it was an additional strategy to give his opponents no chance to speak...
Could all of them be the same person? If not, whose cloak was this really?

name: Naelin Ring
description:
Naelin was a Feca adventurer with an insatiable thirst for history and discovery. Her scholarship was every bit as impressive as that of Fecaline the Wise. Some even said she exceeded Magus Ax in that department! 

Her legendary Frigostian equipment gave her a disturbingly icy aura, sometimes leading strangers to assume she was cold and distant. But nothing could have been further from the truth! She never took it off, despite her fellow adventurers' pleas to change her gear at some point.

They knew better than anyone that this Feca was the glue that held them all together. Through her kindness, wisdom, and unifying spirit, Naelin always made sure that their adventures ended well. And for that, they will always be grateful to her.

name: Naelin Ring

name: Riebeck Boots
description:
These terrifically uncomfortable boots belonged to Riebeck, a meticulous Foggernaut who never left anything to chance. When his friends asked him why he chose to endure such discomfort, he simply replied, "To be sure I never end up shaking in my boots."
That's Riebeck for you: Every problem had a solution, and preferably a simple and straightforward one! A brilliant handyman, he had an unparalleled knack for helping others to clarify their own ideas and make them a reality.
His workshop was known for being an incredible mess. Convinced that everything had some hidden use, the Foggernaut obstinately refused to ever throw anything away. If you pointed out that one of his tools was falling apart, he'd invariably reply, "Why throw it out? It still works just fine!" while calmly sipping his oolong tea. What a character!

name: Gabhortom Epaulettes
description:
Some stories have no beginning. Many stories have no end. 
That never bothered Gabhortom, who continued to follow exciting new paths. Analyzing the past to improve the future... That was his scholarly philosophy.
This historian and protector of the archives was a key figure in gathering and organizing the many stories of the World of Twelve.

name: TwinLara Ring
description:
TwinLara was a scholar with a passion for stories and legends. She could cite long passages from writings of all eras with startling speed and precision.
Though somewhat reserved by nature, this noted bow meow lover was always quick to lend storytellers a hand throughout the ages. With her vast memory and keen mind, she played a key role in preserving the World of Twelve's important historical documents.

name: Cube Helmet
description:
You'll visit many different worlds when you put on this strange-looking helmet.
You might sprout wings, be made of paper, or find yourself holding the reins of a pair of dragoturkeys. 
You'll travel on a wide sea or under the tropical sun, in a world split in two or in a strange twilight world.
You'll have adventures, get caught up in some fights, and hunt a few Ghostofs.
So what are you waiting for?

description: This belt has various buttons, each with its own useful function for your monster-hunting activities. Unfortunately, it doesn't work when you're moving, so you may have to take the risk of stopping mid-battle to benefit from its effects!

description: These boots have an incredible ability to keep your feet firmly on the ground. An inscription on the bottom of each sole reads "MegaCorp" to tell you where they were made.

name: Patapo Ring
description: To give this ring its unique appearance, its inventor supposedly took inspiration from a strange tribe. Besides their single eye, these primitive beings had another curious feature: They only moved to the rhythm of drums!

name: Patapo Ring
description: To give this ring its unique appearance, its inventor supposedly took inspiration from a strange tribe. Besides their single eye, these primitive beings had another curious feature: They only moved to the rhythm of drums!

name: Patched-Up Noxine
description: Can be used to unlock this pet skin.

name: Exi's Ancestral Shovel
description: This Enutrof was not known for his greed alone. He was also an extraordinary blacksmith said to have created many patterns.

name: Vampyro's Headgear
description: If you weren't pale and sickly already, then this headgear is just right for you!

name: Freyrr's Bow
description: Everyone knows that Chowboca fought with a crossbow. A lesser-known fact is that his cousin Freyrr was more into bows.

name: Classic Belt
description: This classic needle holder is a favorite of Xelor's disciples.

name: Gray Mage's Wand
description: This wand bears an almighty flame. It used to belong to a powerful mage but was broken during an epic fight with a Gobbalrog.

name: Starry Hat
description: It's like having your head in the clouds... except that... it's in the... stars...

name: Whispered Ring
description: The best ring by a whisper.

name: Royal Moogrr Cloak
description: You'll be the star of the Regional Moogrricultural Convention in this finery. What do you mean you're not going? You have to go!

name: The Watch
description: Now that you have the Watch, time is in your hands! You can be as late as you like!

name: Penn Knives
description: These superb daggers used to belong to Penn the Amaknian scribe. He used them to engrave his stone notebooks.

name: Puppet Master String
description: If you pull on it too hard, a clockmaker with a tragic past might show up to extract all your Wakfu. And that would be a real shame. After all, sometimes the difference between reason and despair hangs by the thinnest of strings...

name: Breadulum
description: This looks like a model straight out of "Popular Bread Mechanics". It's the perfect addition to any flour-based construction.

name: Breading Pong
description: Also known as "baguette ball".

name: Cherubread
description: Divinely soft!

name: Breadcoup
description: As they say in the old country, "Merci breadcoup pour le bon bread!"

name: Ferociraptor Key Fragment
description: Collect the six mechanical key fragments to make the key to the heart of Nox's clock.

name: Primount Key Fragment
description: Collect the six mechanical key fragments to make the key to the heart of Nox's clock.

name: Key to the Heart of Nox's Clock
description: This key activates a mechanism in the heart of Nox's clock.

name: Mirror of Frozen Time
description: It reflects a view of a universe where everyone has forgotten you. Is it a parallel universe? That's a whole other question.

name: Timeline Fragment
description: This gear is a relic of the past. If you find any more like it, maybe you can put it to use.

name: Wakfu Shards
description: They shine with ancient nostalgia... A glimmer of unequaled beauty, just like the moment in time that they reflect.

name: Needleis
description: Be careful, because each time you get hit by this needle, a mysterious curse will befall you... and you'll start dancing while singing, "papuré, papa puré". How strange.

name: Needleis
description: Be careful, because each time you get hit by this needle, a mysterious curse will befall you... and you'll start dancing while singing, "papuré, papa puré". How strange.

name: Mobbwand
description: The Mobbwand can also be used to paint gorgeous dragon tattoos. It's a real godsend for a Dofus seeker such as yourself.

name: Mobbwand
description: The Mobbwand can also be used to paint gorgeous dragon tattoos. It's a real godsend for a Dofus seeker such as yourself.

name: Lumyscepter
description: Once held by a queen who wanted to have her way in every little thing, this scepter is now better used for grinding all kinds of grain.

name: Lumyscepter
description: Once held by a queen who wanted to have her way in every little thing, this scepter is now better used for grinding all kinds of grain.

name: Hexotic Deck
description:
These 200 and some cards are numbered in an unusual order. If you put them in the right order, you'll see that it represented the relationship between the circumference of a circle and its diameter in Euclidian plane - duh.
It's always easier to do 100 Hexotic cards than 100 Eternal Swords, anyway.

name: Shakirapier
description: Using the Shakirapier and its built-in ruler, you too can draw geometric shapes on a board and bisect gobballs! You show them who's the teacher!

name: Shakirapier
description: Using the Shakirapier and its built-in ruler, you too can draw geometric shapes on a board and bisect gobballs! You show them who's the teacher!

name: Yannabow
description: With the Yannabow, your arrows will hit their mark at dazzling speed. Never miss a target, even when blinded - make the right choice and buy a Yannabow!

name: Yannabow
description: With the Yannabow, your arrows will hit their mark at dazzling speed. Never miss a target, even when blinded - make the right choice and buy a Yannabow!

name: Swordaigo
description:
This sword weighs heavily in your hands. Well, it is full of good ideas, delicacy, and potential. Yes, and it can also slice cleanly through any opponent.
These are the two sides to the Swordaigo, which is sheathed on both shoulders at the same time when you grasp the hilt.
On your left, you see a Bontarian whispering to you to mercilessly decapitate the Brakmarian scum.
On your right, there is a Brakmarian giving you ideas related to capybaras.

name: Swordaigo

name: Armadastunner
description:
"What a cool club!"
That's how people tend to talk about this terrifying bludgeon. It was used to smash a great many monsters, including Tal Kasha, who was reduced to dust after getting hit again and again. But what's this club's real strength? You can use it to bash in other adventurers' heads. And this bludgeon has seen its fair share of adventurers buckle beneath it.
Other than that, it's still pretty cool.

name: Axiniyomi
description: It smells good.

name: Axiniyomi
description: It smells good.

name: Zeemass
description:
This is the tale of a Xelor renowned, whose backside happens to be quite round.
His friends can't keep him on the ground, when his enemies in the area abound.
Always seeking to earn a pound, thanks to his drive does his progress astound.
This fire Xelor to undo his gains is often bound, as to him starting over is perfectly sound.

Player, trainer, and even supervisor, Zimas is a most dependable leader.
Whether crossing the world faster or slower, he trains great heroes to be even better.
This Xelor, 500 million kamas in error, took a seat after encountering more than one liar.
Blessed with tact and memory that stoke fear, in the rankings Zimas is certainly premier.

name: Shovelightus
description: You can dig for as long as you like with this shovel, but you'll find nothing but kindness, gentleness, and honesty.

name: Shovelightus
description: You can dig for as long as you like with this shovel, but you'll find nothing but kindness, gentleness, and honesty.

name: Kaid'O Scale
description:
This scale belonged to Kaïdo, a famed warrior who could never be defeated and a tamer of white-eyed blue dragons. With such a resistant shield, you'll have a hard time losing HP. If you carry it, only a being of divine power will be able to inflict damage on you...
As for Kaïdo, no one knows what became of him. Legend has it he no longer needed a shield to protect himself, which wouldn't be a surprise, given his skill in combat - even Magmog was no match for him.

name: Nozadahgue
description: On the hilt of this dagger, you can just barely make out an inscription: "I never farmed Moogrr Dungeon". Yet another line about Moogrrs may not be funny anymore, but these references are still inextricable from the exceptional adventurer who created the Nozadahgue. This patient, curious, methodical, and calculating fan lived through many periods of the World of Twelve, taking special care to spread knowledge and bringing together those uninitiated in theorycrafting under his tutelage.

name: Yafirahplate
description:
This breastplate was produced by a renowned seamstress who worked with fabric like no other, transforming herself into a legend of the World of Twelve.
Although it's made of metal, the quality of this armor is similar to that of Yafirah's fascinating, extravagant outfits.

name: Damdamulet
description: When you wear this amulet, your god's other disciples will grow weaker next to you. Thus, teams of five Ecaflips will fall apart... You gotta keep it varied! Luckily, the Damdamulet is powerful enough to overcome any dangers you run into. You could say it's the bee's knees, if the bee in question is also a nice guy.

name: Kiki Helmet
description: You might think this is just a regular durable helmet, but the Kiki helmet actually has the exceptional power of masterfully baking cakes. But be careful, because this helmet will force you to bake loads of sweet things every single day.

name: Ymokape
description: How would you describe an adventurer as passionate as Ymoka? You could talk about a love of nitpicky questions, an attraction to finely carved stone sculptures, a thirst for literature and great stories... Either way, the result is a sometimes-polarizing Twelvian whose enthusiasm leaves no room for doubt.

name: The Stripper
description: This belt is programmed to come undone every 300 steps the person wearing it takes. It isn't easy to adjust to this unusual timing, but it can come in handy now and then... like during your romantic encounters.

description: They may be sturdy, but these epaulettes have a number of hidden virtues: sensitivity, curiosity, and the lingering odor of wabbits. Wearing them weighs you down a lot. Perhaps it's the weight of lingering love for the dearly departed.

description: This should be good for something...

name: Ikiakit Meatballs
description: A simple and generous dish.

name: Dynawich
description: A delicacy of northern Astrub.

name: Karnivorous Kebab
description: This deliciously seasoned kebab is wreaking havoc at the BBQ!

name: Pekobowl
description: The most elegant yet priciest dish imaginable. The quantity can be lacking, but the flurry of emotions this dish provokes is unmatched.

name: Wakfu Seal
description: This sublimation fits into a relic item to increase the wearer's stats.

description: This sublimation fits into a relic item to increase the wearer's stats.

description: This rune fits into an epic item to increase the wearer's stats.

name: Neo Royal Wool
description: With such a fine fleece, you can understand why all the gobbettes are so keen to get their hands on the Royal Gobball!

name: Neo Royal Feather
description: Appearances can be deceptive - trust your sense of smell. It's probably better you don't know which end of the piwi this immaculate feather was pulled from.

name: Neo Royal Moogrr Mimilk
description: This mimilk helps the adventurer build strong bones and a sturdy constitution, all the way to the end of their short life.

name: Neo Golem Eye
description: It scans the horizon, beyond any wall.

name: Neo Royal Blibli Tusk
description: Don't be annoyed if this tusk acts all defensive. It's just in its nature.

name: Neo Dark Purple
description: A deep purple dye to remind you of Vampyro and that song he always sings in the shower: "Clooooooak in the waaaaater..." Or something like that...

name: Neo Black Crow's Feather
description: This Black Crow's Feather will make sure you always have a bit of fluff!

name: Neo Ice Stick
description: The only thing left from this ice lolly is the stick.

name: Neo Ancestral Treechnid Bark
description: This bark is one of the last existing pieces of the Ancestral Treechnid... You're holding a piece of history in your hands.

name: Neo Cawwot Tuft
description: This fine tuft of hair has been imbued with the delicate and sweet scent of cawwot. It almost makes you want to eat it - but then you'd have hair on your tongue.

name: Neo Remington Fragment
description: A strange fragment from a not-so-precious stone.

name: Neo Pandora's Box
description: Are you sure you want to open it?

name: Neo Ogrest Hairs
description:
You got this clump of hair while grappling with Ogrest, don't you remember?
He gave you a good whack on the head in return. It goes without saying that that whack is probably why you don't remember your whack.

name: Neo Thistle
description: This plants seems to be infused with an evil energy.

name: Neo Tree Wood
description: Taken as a tea, Neo Wood has anti-aging properties. You just have to put up with the diuretic effects.

name: Coarse Archmonster Stone
description: This Archmonster stone can be used to spawn an Archmonster in dungeons of level 6 to 20.
